'a la mi ston cing/ bdag sdug par 'gyur ro snyam phrag dog skyes te bsad par bsams nas/ bu khye'u'i 'tshogs mar khab kyis btsugs te rmayang mi snang bar byas so// khye'u yang ring
lta bor ma len par tsha'adas pa dang/ chun ma 'khams nas chen m la/ khyod kyis nga'i bu bsad do zhes brgal to// chen mas bsnyenanas 'di skad ces mna' bor re// kho mos
khyod kyi bu bsad par gyuran/ kho mo skye ba thams cad du kho mo'i khyo sbrul gdug pas bsad pa dngashog cagi/ bu zhig yodan yung chus khyer ba dang/ spyang kis za bar shog cig/ khomo'i
lus kyang gson por du du bcug cing bu sha za bar shog cig/ pha ma'i khyim du ma shor ta thams cad 'tshig par shog cig ces smras so// de'i tshon de skad ces mna' bor ba'i chen
ma de ni kho mo yin te/ de dag thams cad sakyis myong bar gyur to// dge slong ma de dag gis yang smras pa/ bsod nams ci zhig byas na/ sangs rgyas mthong
zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsunas rab tu byung ste/ 'khor ba'i mthar phyin par gyur/ ud pa las smras pa// sngon bA ra nas 'di'i drang srong lhags zhes bya ba nang sas rgyas dang/
nyan thos dang/ chu stags can mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa mang du gnas so// de'i tshan rang sas rgyas dag cig bsod snyoms la grong du gshegs pa dang/ khyim bdag gi chung ma zhigagis/
mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ bsod snyoms phul nas mtshod pa byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas de nam mkha' la 'phags te/ lus la me 'bar ba dang/ chu 'bab pa dang/ 'gro
ba dang nyal ba dang/ 'dug pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan nas// khyim bdag gi chung ma des/ kho mo yang ma 'os pa'i dus su 'de 'drub thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//
de'atshon smon lam btab pa'i khyim bdag gi chung ma de ni kho mo yin no// de'i phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad nas sems rnam par grol tengagra bcom pa thob bo// 'di ltar dgra bcom pa

thob mod kyi/ lcags tsha ba'i thur ma spyi bo nas zu gnas rkang mthil du byung sta/ rtag tu 'di lta bu'i gnod pa skyong ngo// de'i tshon rigs che zhing mtho ba'i dge slong ma lnga brgya snyadakyis de skad ces
smras pa thos nas/ lus dang sems skyi g.yab ste/ 'dod pa la me ma mur gyi phung po ltar rtogs nas/ 'dod chags kyi sams yongs su zad de/ khyim gyi sdug bsngal la btson ra bas
kyang lhag par rtogs te/ dri ma kun zad nas dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te dgra bcom par gyur to// dge slong ma de dag gisatshig mthun par/ dge slong
ma ud pa la la bdag cag ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas bcings shing glas gas pa las/ khyod kyis chos bstan pas 'khor ba'i mthar phyin par gyur to zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'as
'tsha kyis dge slongs ud pa las ni legs par bstan to// gang chos ston pa'i gcig gis gcig bstan te 'bras bu thob na/ sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa zhes bsngags so// de skad
sgyu ces gsungs pa la 'khor mang po rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga' 'o// dge slongam ud pa la'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//shu do la garana'i le'u'o//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dug pa las las
nas gas tshags bcos du pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ke'u di skya la sogs pa dge slong rten lnga po 'dici'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ma thag tu sa kyi bdud rtsi sngar myong ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ge slong
00 lnga bo 'di dag sngon yang nga'i sha sngar so te bde bar gyur pas 'dir yang chos kyi ro thog mar myong ste/ rnam par grol bar gyur to// kun ngag kha bos yang/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa// dge slong 'di lngas sngon ci bgyis pa bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'as kyis/kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med/ grangs med/

bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dus pa'i snga rolan 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po shu dol garan zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong nyid la dbang byed do// de'itshan
yul der lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab bo zhes ltas mkhan gyis lung bstananas/ rgyal pos de skad ces thos pa dang/ rab tu mya ngan gyis yi mug par gyur to/ 'di ltar mu ge
chen bo byungan/ mi mang bo 'di dag la lad snyad kyi kha zas jiltar red snyam nas/ rgyal phran dang blon po kun bsdus te bgrosan/ bang ban 'bu ji snyedayod pa dang/ da ltar mi jisnyad yod
pa rtsis su sbyar na/ 'bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi'i lul le'i thod du brtsis na yang/ lo bcu gnyis mi thub bo zhes dril bsgrags so// de nas phyi phyir yang muge tsha bar gyur to/ tshe 'phos
pa yang ma nas/ rgyal po des ji ltar byas na/ ma mang po 'tsho bar 'gyur snyam bsams te/ btsun mo dang bo brang skyasasu bas to/ skyed mos tshal du 'chag tu song ba las bsti bat+ti/
gnas shig tu phyin nas/ btsun mo dang mi mang po kun gnyid kyis lag pa'i 'og tu nyal ba las langs nas/ phyogs bzhir phyag 'tshal te/ 'delta bu'i yi dam
la[”]bcas so/// yul 'dir mu ge byung bas thamasacad bza' ba med par gyur/ ltogs kyis bdag gi lus 'di btang ste/ tshe 'phos pasdi'og tu chen po zhig tuskyes nas/ thams cad
yaM bdag ga la za zhing kun 'gras dang shog cig ces smon lam btab nas/ shing zhig la 'dzegs te/ shing kha nas lus g.yang du btang ngo// der tshe 'phos nas chu chen por brdzus te skyes

pa'i ta chen po dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig tu gyur to// de'i tshaul den shing mkhan mi lnga zhig chu 'gram du shang thur dong ba las nyachen po de mthong nas/ nyades mi'i skad du 'di skad ces smras so//
khyadabakras na nga'i sha chod de ni 'dod ba zo zhagi/ 'grangs nas kyang ci thig pa khyim du khyer cig/ khyod kyis sngar pa'isha zos te 'grangs ngasan/ phyir mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang thog mar/
khyed tshos kyi zas myong bar bya'o// yul ma dag la gang bkris pa thams cad kyis kyang ci dga' bar ngasha la long zhig ces sgo zhig/ de'i tsho ma lnga posangasha bcad de bros nas yul mi sbyan te
nas gcig gso gcige sbran pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad 'dus te/ de'i sha labacad cing thos so// rtsib logs gcig za tsaman/ rtsib legs ngos gcig rang bsgyur te/
[Pro ]stong ga zad na 'og ma yang de bzhin du skyego/ de bzhin du stong 'og bsgyur zhing bcu gnyis kyi bar du thams cad kyis sha bcad tsang zes nas/ thams cad de la snying rje ba'i sems skyes pas
risha zos pa de dag khrums cad 'dus byas pa yang mthogi kyi lhar skyos so// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bo nyar gyur pa de na de ltar nga yin no// shinge mkhan lnga po thog mar pa'i sha
bcad de zos pani/ dge slong ko'udon la sogs pa lnga po yin no// skye bo mang po phyis nga'isha zesapani lha'i sras po brgyad khri dang/ nga'i zhi gnas rnam par grol ba rnams yin no// de'i
tshon sngar mi lnga po de la byin te/ 'tshobs srog skyabs pas 'dir yang sngar chos bstanate/ chos kyi sku'i yan lag gis dug gsum gyi mi zhi bar byas so// kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang po/
rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga' 'o// shu do la gne'i le'u ste nyi shu drug go/ @#/rgyal po a sho ka'i le'u 'o//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigen/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'adzin bcom ldan 'das kun dga' bo dang
bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/ lam na byis pa dag cig sa la khang bu dang/ bang mdzod dang/ ni po cher bsngos nas rtse zhing 'khod do// de la khye'u gtsag cig gis sas
thubya// rgyas rgyang ma nas gshegs pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/ sbyin pa bya bar bsams nas// bang ba zhes bsngos pa'is 'as snyam pa gang blangs te/ sangs rgyas
pa 1la dbul bar gzas pa las/ khye'u chung sangs rgyas ches pas ma slob nas/ grogs khye'u gcig la khyod sa la dgu zhag/ kho bo khyod kyi stong du 'gyed ste lhung bzed du blug go zhes
smras nas/ grogs pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras te/ khye'u des grogs po'i phrag pa la 'dzegs te/ sa snyim pa gangasangs rgyas la phul la// sangs rgyas kyis kyang lhung
ts+tshA bzed smad nas sa phul ba bzhes so// bzhes nas kun dga' bo la gtad de/ sa 'di 'jim par gyis la gtsug lag khang la byugs shig ces bka' stsal to// kun dag 'a ba bu
chung dus dga' ba'i sems kyis nga las phul te gtsug lag khang la bskus pas/ de'i bsod nams kyis nga mya ngan las 'dasanas/ le brgya len pa'i 'og tu rgyal po a sho ka zhes bya
bar 'gyur ro// khye'u cag shos na de'i blon por 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang byed cing/ dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan kyang yul thams cad du bsgrags nas// ring bsrel
la yang rgyas par mchod par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling du mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong cig car byed par 'gyur ro/// kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
[z/ ]la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon bsod nams ci zhig mdzad pas/ jib srol la yang mchod rten de snyad cig bgyid par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
la pa/ brtag par nyon la shin tu yid la zung zhig dang/ khyod la bstan par bya'o// sngon bskal pa gras mdab 'das pan/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po gsal thul

zhes bya ba/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyad la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo// de'i tshon sa ngas rgyas pur sha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rgyal po des blon po dang bcas su yo byad rnam
bzhi sbyar te/ sas rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo// de'i tshe rgyal po de dang yul mi rnams ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang phrad de phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ rgyal
phran gzhan dag na bsod nams kyang mi byed pas/ mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal phran dang shul ma dag bsod nams byed du gzhug pa'i phyi'i/ sas rgyas kyi sku gzugs bris 'a/ rgyal
phran la sbyin no snyam bsams nas/ ri mo mkhan mang po bsdus te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ri mo la brisangashog ces bsgo ba dang/ ri mo mkhan dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song
sto rna sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bltasanas/ ri mo bris pa las mtshan gcig bris nas/ gtsag mi 'dra bar gyur te/ ri mo mkhan gyis ri mo bri bar ma nus so// sangs rgyas nyid kyis
tshon rtsi sbyar te/ sku gzugs gcig bris nas/ ri mo mkhan rnams de la bltas te/ sku gzugs mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bris nas/ rgyal
phran re re la sku gzugs re re bskur te/ sku gzugs de la rgyal po dang yul mi thams cad kyis me tog dang/ spos dang/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod de phyag tshol zhig ces bsgo'o//
rgyal phran de dag dang yul ma de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas/ rab tu dga' mgurangs te bsnyan bkur byas so// de'i tshe na rgyal pogasal thub de ni da ltar nga/
yin te/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyad khri bzhi stong bris te/ rgyal phran kun la spel ba'i bsod nams kyis/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang mtho ris su brgya byin lha'i
dbang po skyes te/ byad gzugs bzang bo dang/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob ste mngon par sangs rgyas so// mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rang bsrel
la mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong nyid byas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la/ kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang bo mngon par dga' nasarjes su yi rang ngo
rgyal bo a sho ka'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// (gser gyi bum pa'i le'u 'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
[j]yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyar so sor tshul du zhugs nas/ tshul nas byung ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das
gang na par lhags so/ bcom ldan 'das dag slong dag dang yun rade dum phrad pas/ de dag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i phyag btog ste/
dge slong de dag la bsti stang dang bcas pas khyedan bar ma gyur tam/ bsod snyoms kyis ma brel lam zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po dang ldan pa de/
dge slong rnams la bsti stang mdzad par dge slong kun dga' bos mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni
'jig rten gyi gtso bo// yon tan dpag tum mchis pa// yongashes bsam gyis ma khyab pa lags na/ ci'i slad du thugs smad de dge slong rnams la bsti stang mdzad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon bskal pa grangs mod/ tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di/
yulapA rAnas ni/ khyim bdag so tshes la mkhas pa zhig yod de/ nor ci rnyed kyang gser du bsgyur nas/ gser gyi bum pa gcig byas des 'og tusbas so// de bzhin du nor rdzas ni
red kyang lus la mi spyod de/ gser du bsgyur nas phyis ring zhig lon pa dang/ gser gyi bum pa snga phyir bsags pa bdun du gyur nas/ thams cad sa 'og tu
gras so khyim bdag de phyis nad kyis btab nas tshe'i dus byas pa dang/ gser gyi bum pa la chags pas sbrul gdug pa zhagi tu skyes te/ gser de la bsrung ngo// phyis yun ring
zhig lon pa dang/ grong khyer de yang zhig nas su yang mi gnas te sa stod du gyur to// sbrul de yang lo grangs mang du len pas tsho'i dus byas nas/ phyi'i yang de nyid kyi lus su skyes te//
sgyu gsar gyi bum pa la 'khri zhing nyalal// de bzhin du la khri phrag du ma lon pa dang/ nang gi skye ba tha ma la lus des skyo ste 'di snyam dubasams so khag na gsor 'di la chags pas 'di
zla 'dra ba'i lus su ma sdug ba myong bar gyur gyis/ dani bsod nams kyi zhing la phul nas lam dang nye bar song ste/ rtswa khrod du lus sbas la ma dag 'os na 'bod do snyam ste/ de'i tshe sbrul gdug
ka ba des mi gcig lam nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ sbrul gyis mi de la bos pa dang/ mi des nges pa'i sgra thos nas phan tshun bltasan cang ma snang bas lam du zhugs te song song ba las/ sbrul
gyis yang bos te/ kyi kho bo'i drung du ston cage ces smras so// mi des smras pa/ khyod kyis kho babs te ba zhig khya/ khyod ni'i shin tu gdug pa can yin pas kho bo bsad du 'ong ngo//
[ns sbrul gyis kho bos gnod par bya na/ khyod drung du ma 'os kyang gnod pa byed nus so zhes smras pa dang/ mi de skra gnas sbrul gyi drung du bsnyen to// sbrul gyis smras pa// kho bo la 'den gsar
gyi bum pa gcig yod kyas/ khyed la bsod nams shig bya bar bcol na nus sam/ jasto ma byas na khyod la gnod pa bya'o// mi des kho bos nus so zhes smras pa dang/ sbrul gyis mi de
gsar gyi bum pa'i drung du khrid de/ gser gyi bum pa gcig bskur te 'di skad ces smras so// khyod gsar 'di khyer la dge 'dun rnams la mchod ston zhig gsol cig/ mchod ston gsol
ba'i nyin bar kho bo yang 'ong gis bsu zhag ces bsgo'o// de nas mi de gsar khur du khyer te dge 'dun gyi gnas su song nas/ dge slong gi gtsang sbyoral gsor phul to/ 'din sprul gdug
ba zhig ga gser lags kyis/ gser 'dis dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol cig ces mchi'o// gser 'asi mchod ston sbyar te/ mchod ston nam gsol ba zhag dus brtsis nas/
de'i nyin bar mi de gatheb cage thogs te/ sbrul gdug pa de gang na 'dug pa der song ngo// sbrul gdug pa des kyang mi de 'ong ba mthong nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ mi des sbrul gzab kyi
nang du bcug nas khyer te song ba las lam du mi gcig dang phrad de/ mi des khyod gang nas 'ongasazhis lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang/ sbrul thogs pa des cad ma smras pas/ sbrul de khros
nas gdug pa 'byung ba las 'di snyam du bsams so// mi 'di ci zhig cesan/ pa rol pos lan gsum gyi bar du drisin/ gtam gyi lan ya ngami sta Am ste/
phyir yang khres nas gdug pa 'byung ba las phyi'i bkog ste/ yad 'di snyam du bsams so// mi 'di bdag gi phyi'i bsod nams byed n (byas pa gzo ba'i drin yang dran par ma byas par
g+haM gdug pa ma de byung ngo snyam bsamasaM te/ mi 'di bdag la phan pa'i don byed kyis/ nyes pa zhig byas na yang bzod par bya'o zhes sa dben par phyin pa dang/ re zhig sa la zhog cig ces smras
sgyu nas/ mi des sbrul de la sems smad du/ bdag gi nyes pa 'gyod cing bshags so zhes smras nas/ phyir yang khur du khyer te dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa dang/ dge 'dun dag kyang
zla gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab pas/ mi des dge 'dun la me tog khrims te/ sbrul de dad pa'i sems kyis ma rtog 'grim pa la blta'o// de nas dge 'dun dgu zas kyi bya ba byas nas ba 'ag
bkrus te sbrul de la chos bshad do// sbrul de rab tu dga' nas/ gser gyi bum pa drug kyang dge 'dun la phul te/ bsod nams kyi 'os byas nas de nas tshe 'phos so// tsha'i dus
byas nas de'i bsod nams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so// kun dga' bo de'i tshon sbrul khur du khyer ba'i mi de ni da ltar nga yin no// sbrul gdug pa de nishA ri'i bu yin no// 'as
[zal]pa'i dus na yang khur du sbrul khyer ba las sprul gyis smyos te/ de la yang sems smad pas// dayang dge slong rnams la sems smad pa yin no// kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas/
kyis gsungs pa la yi ring nas mngon pa ni dga' 'do gsar gyi bum pa'i le'usnyache'u brgyad pa'o/ 'a 'bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u 'o// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ba khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshalanadage slong gus med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshayul de na bram ze shin
du dbul zhing 'phos pas yang mi bdog pa zhig yod de/ bram ze de 'bos ches nas kun la ji ltar byas na/ tsha'adi nyid la longs sbyod dang ldan par 'gyur zhes dris so// de la mi zhig
gse smras pa/ ci khyod miroshes sam/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba da ltar 'jig rten du gshegs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don mdzad do// de'i nye gnas
'od srungs chen po dang/ mo'u 'gal yan dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ ma 'gags pa la sogs pa 'phags pa bzhi yong rtag tudabul 'phongs pa la phan pa'i don byed kyis/ gal te
khyod dad pa'i sems kyis 'phags pa de dag la zhal zas kyis mchod na/ 'phags pa de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag dang ldan par mdzad do zhes smras so//
de'i tshon bram zes ma des smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' sto/ kun tu rgyu zhing slong mo dang gla zes nasa'o cung zad tsamig red de/ phyir khyim du 'os nas zhal zas sbyar
ti 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs nas bshos gsol to// 'jig rten 'di nyid la phan par re'o// de'i tshon bram ze de'i chung ma bab zhes bya ba des dge 'dun bshos gsol nas//
wanyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshig mnos so// de'i tshon rgyal po gsal rgyal 'chag tu song song ba las/ phyi'i 'os pa'i lam du nyes byed pa'i btson zhig lamakan shing la bcings shing/
'dug pa mthong ngo/ khatson des rgyal po gshegs pa mthong nas dus te kha bras shige bslangs pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang sbyin no zhes byas nas phyi de pho brang du gshegs pa dang/ brjod
ba las de'i nub mo nam phyed tsaman/ btson la kha zas sbyin par byas pa dran te kha bas bskyal bar byas nas/ pho brang nang gi min gcig kyang 'gro phod pa med de/ nam phyed la zas bsuradu
laman 'dre gdon dang srin pos 'jigs pas/ srog dang bsdos te 'gro nus pa med do/ de'i tshon rgyal po ma di'i sdug bsngal ba dang bkres pas nyen pa dran nas/ de la shin tu snying brtse ste//
yul 'din su zhig btson de la kha zas skya'anusan/ gser srab stong sbyin no zhes bsgrags kyang 'gronus pa ma byung ngo// de'i tshon bram ze'i chung ma bde pa nges gtam du thosan 'jig rten pa/
su yang rung ste/ nyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshig brgyad mnosan/ 'dre gdon la sogs pas ma bste/ gdon thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes thos kyis/ bdag nirgyal/
pos gar btang bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas chas so// de nas rgyal pos bde ba la khyod kha bras 'di dag khyel/ tshe ge mo zhagen btson 'dug pa de la byin cig dang/ gser srang stong
sbyin no zhes dam bcas so// de nas bde ba rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du kha zas thogs te/ tshul khrims dran par byas nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las/ grong khyer gyi pha rol tusrin mo
'am pa dang phrad do// de'i tshasrin mo de bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyin te/ bde ba 'ongs par mthong nas bza' bar gzasaso// de'itsho dge ban ma tshul khrims ma
cams pas srin mo mthong nas phyi'i skrag ste/ dge bsnyen ma khyod khyer ba kib thas las cung zad cig bsrung ngo zhes smras pa dang/ dge bsnyen mas kyang nyung du ma zhig byin te/ byin pa nyung mod
kyi srin mo'i mthus mang du sprul nas bas/ srin mo ma smad shin tu 'gras par gyur to// de nas srin mos dge bsnyen mal/ khyod kyi ming ci zhes dris pa dang/ kho mo ni bde ba'o
zhes smras so// khon kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyis/ kho mo 'dug pa 'di gsar bum pa gang yod kyis phyir ldog pa'i lam du khyer cig/ khyod phar 'gron khomo'i
nu mo a lam ba yang lam kan 'dug ste/ khyod dang phrad kyis kho mo'i 'phrin du khyod bde 'am/ kho mo yang bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so zhes gyis shig/ de nas dge
bsnyen ma lam du zhugs te song song bas/ ring bo ma len par a lam ba dang phrad do/ a lam ba la bu mo'i 'phrin spring ba dang/ gulnga brgya bde bar btsas so zhes gtam byas pa dang/
alam ba dga' ste dge bsnyen ma la khyed kho mo'i mo'i 'phrin dang gtam snyan byas pa 'jigs kyis/ kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'dir gsar bum pa gang yod kyis// phyir log pa'i

rgyu lam du khyer cig/ kho mo cag gi ming po gcig kyang lam kan 'dug gas/ de dang phradan kho mo cag spun gnyis kyi 'phrin dang bu lnga brgya bcas ba'i gtam yang gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo// de nas
g.yang bor ma byin par srin mo gnyis kyi ming po dang phrad de/ de la srin mo gnyis kyi 'phrin dang bu lnga brgya yang bde bar btsas pat+ti gtam byas nas/ de yang rab tu dga' ste/ khyod kho bos
sring mo gnyis kyi 'phrin byas pa legs kyis/ kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di nagasar bum pa gang yod kyis/ phyir ldog pa'i lam du khyer cig ces bsgo go/ de nas dge bsnyen mchas
te song song ba las/ btson de'i drung du phyin te kha bas bstodanas/ phyir ldog pa'i lam du gsar bum pa gsum yang med// rgyal pos kyang gsar srang stong bya dga' byin pas/
bram ze dbul bo khyo shug gnyis yul den shin tu phyug cing 'ani bo mang bar gyur to// rgyal pos kyang de bsod nams las gyur par shes nas blon por bcug ste/ shin tuphyagapar gyur
bas lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad ba'i sems skyes te/ sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs nas mchod pa chen po byas so// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas/
sems rnam par grol te/ rgyund zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob go/ 'khor mang bo dang kun dga' la sogs pa sas rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yaring nas mngon par dga' ko/
bram ze mo bde ba'i le 'u stanyid+d+hishu dgu bgo/ sgrubam po brgyad pa/ sbyi na pachen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ni/ 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i la/ dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshon bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'ud rgya lasogs pa la/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i g.yog gtsag dgos so zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de nas kun shes ko'u rgya stan las
langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi
zhing chos gos dang lhung bzed bzung ngo zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko'u din khyed nyid kyang rgas 'khogs te/ khyod 'di la yang bsnyen bkur
byed pa dgos kyis/ ko'u din khyod nyid stan la 'dug cig ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin du 'od srungs dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal ya na lasogs pa// nye gnas lnga
'a brgya stod kun gyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang maganang ngo// de nas tsho dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen bkur bya
sbyo ba'i dge slong gang la dgyes snyam brtags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' ba la dgyes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas/ nyi ma'i
'od gzer byung ba na nub phyogs kyi ngos la shar tsang lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgongs shing dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas/ tshad ldan
pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang/ kun dga' bo dang lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing dga' ba'i gtam rnam pa du ma byas/
nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal ya nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
[4]bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i
don cher 'gyur ro// btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsun bkur byed bar ma dod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasan bsgrub par dka'/ bzod
par dka' go/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'bar ba bsgrub par dka'/ bzod par yang dka' ba yin te/ de ltar de bzhin du sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsgrub par dka'/ bzodapar
dka' bas na/ bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstan bkur bgyid par mi dad de// de nas tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal yana'i bu chen pos/ kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras
so/ kun dga' bo khyod la bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pan/ 'di lta ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i pisha phyogs kyi skar khung nas/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer byung na nub phyogs
kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes kyis dad par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don tsher 'gyur rozhes smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal ya na chen po jo ste/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ded pa 'di gsum gnangan/
dbcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dad do// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi gso' bzhi paza' bdag 'chang du mi stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das
mi gsol ba'i bshos kyi lhag ma bdag la mi 'tshal ba dang/ bdag dus ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchir gnang bar bgyi na ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur
'tsho bgyi bar dad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal yan chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bstan bkur byed du dad par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ ba com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad par
bgyis na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnangan/ gdod bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dad pozhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so mo'u 'gal yana'i bu/ dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang/ rjes su
smad pa'i tshig gi chos phyis 'byung bar mthong bsan/ bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'di skadadu/ dge slong kun dga' bo ni gis dang zas kyi phyir ston pa la bsun/
ba kur byed dozhes smra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de'i dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// dge slong kun dgarabon mkhas pa can te/ dus shes
shing dus rig pa lags shing/ dus shes par 'gyur bani/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi blta bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang/ dus la ma bab pa dang/ gzhan
yang mu stags can kun tu rgyu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang/ dus la ma bab pa dang/ gzhan yang mu stags can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la lan ldon par spobs so// 'di dag lan ldan par ma spobs so// bca' ba dang bza' ba 'dini/ bcom ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par
'gyur 'din bde zhing bsod bar mi 'gyur ba'ang shes pa'i phyi'ite/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i domatshar rmad du byung ba'i tshosaso//
de nas shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par dad par byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
kyang kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa na te/ dus shes shing dus rig go zhes bsngags pas/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
dge slong kun dga' ba 'di su'i rgyu ni'i rkyen gyis dus dang tshod la mkhas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'as kyis/ shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa// sngon 'das/

pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i nga rolan/ rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo// de'i tshe grong khyer b.ru du zhes bya ban bram
ba ze n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mkhas pa rig pa dang ldan pa/ smrang dang/ gtsug lag dang/ skar ma la mkhas pa zhige pas rgyal po'i ston pa byed de/ rgyal phran brgyad khri
bzhi stong nyid kyang de la rgyal bo tshan bo dang 'dra bar bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsgo ba'i tshig kyang nyan to// bram ze de phyug khyad rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/ de la bu med pas rtag tumi
dga' sta/ sams khos su chud cing 'dug pa las ji ltar byas n bu yod par 'gyur zhes/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ dbang phyug dang nyi zla dang/ skar ma dang/
ri dang tshudang/ nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing rjengad/ lo bcu gnyis lenanas/ chung ma chen ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ bud med mkhas pa dag ni soms can dang
ldan ma thag tu bu khyi'u 'am/ bu mo yin pa nges par rtogs pas/ de yang khye'u yin par shes nas bram ze la gtam smras so// bram ze de de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ras/
chung ma'i rim gro lhag par cher skyed do// de nas zla ba dgu tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te/ gsar gyi mdog can skra mthon mthud du 'dug pa bzang ba mdzes pa mtshan dang ldan pa zhig
go/ de nas btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan bkug ste mtshan bltas nas/ ming sbyin pa chen bo zhes btags so// khye'u de'am gyis cher skyes nas/ dbyar dgun dang ston dpyidakyi
gnas kyang so sor byas tolongs spyod byed du bcug go/ khye'u de yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig pas rig byed dang/ gtsug lag rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs te/
sgyu rtsal gang yang mi shes pa med do// phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la gsol taM bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltadamo ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang/ shi pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu
'gro'o zhes lam srang phyag bdar byed du bcug ste/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas ma tog gis gtor te/ bdug spos kyis 'dug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas/ sbyin pa/
chen bo glang po rini bom sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/ dril bsgrags/ dra brdzus/ rolamo dang/ sil snyan dkrol te/ 'khor brgya stong skad kyis bskor nas/
grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu song// yul ma thams cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon du khang bu brtsegs ma'i steng nas mag mi 'dzums par blta zhing/ 'di'i byin dang gzi brjodonatshangs
[« ]thu@#/ pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags so// de nas song song ba las/ mu tob dag gos hrul po gyon cing snod chag pa dag thogs te nyung bang bslang ngo zhes 'bodang//
pa/ sbyin pa chen pos thos nas de dag la khyed ci'i phyi'i 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so// de la kha cig ni 'di skad du/ bdag cag la pha ma dang/ phu nu dang/ bu smad dang/ gnyen
bshes ma mchis pas sdug ge zhes zer ro// de la kha cig na bdag cag yun ringos sund kyis bab pas mi sos te sdug go zhes zer ro// de la kha cig ni bdagatsag bag ma byas pas chos po
bcom ste/ ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do zhes zer ro// sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas mchim dku su song ngo// de nas yang pha zad cigen/ shan pa gcig srog chags/
bsad nas pags pa bshu ba dang bsnyal gtub pa dag mthong ngo// sbyin pa chen pos a mato/ 'di dag ci byed ces sen/ bdag cag ni pha mes brgyad kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod
pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o nas zer ro// de la sbyin pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod bar song ngo/ de nas pha zad du phyin pa dang/ zhing ba dag zhing rmos
te zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la/ bya mang po dang sprul dag thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang/ 'di dag zhi byed ces drasin/ bdag cag nizhing rmos te sa klogs pa'i shul
dus bon btaban/ sa mang du skyes te/ nges 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya la 'bul la zhes zer ro// sbyin pa chen pos de la yang dogatshar du gyur nas phazad song ba dang/ rngon pa dag bya
rgya phres pa dang ri btsugs nas bya rnams gsher ba dang/ so mas can dag tu rgya dang so bzhi nas lus rdebs shang 'then kyang mngasher te/ snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas nigashan tu 'jigs skrag
pa dag mthengs/ khyod ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang brgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba gsod pa'i sa byed pas 'tsho'o zhes zer ro// sbyin pa chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/
shin tu yi mug sku yad pa zad song ba dang/ nya pa dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang du khrin te/ thang la phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gal ba dag mthong nas/ 'di dag ci byed ces
in/ badrag cag brgyud kyi 'os gzhan mi byed kyi 'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho bar byed do zhes zer ro// sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so//
sems can 'di dag ni dbul 'phongs pa// bgo ba dang brgal ba'i phyi 'di lta bu'i kho na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni tsha'apos ma thag tu ngan song gsum
du lhung sta/ mun panas mun par 'gro zhing thar pa'i dus med do snyam bsams nas/ phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de soms shing ma dga' nas/ pha'i drung du song sta/ pha la
bdag gsol ba zhig mchis kyis gnong zhig ces smras so// phas kyang bu khyod ci zer/ khyod smra ba bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so// yab bdag sngon phyi rol du 'chag/
[°]51 tu mchis pa las/ mi mang bo gos dang kha zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang/ brdzun dang/ dbang za ba dang/ ma dge ba'i las rnamasna tshogs brgya'i
ba mthos/ de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyis/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las 'phongs brel ba dag gi phyi'i/ yid bzhin du spyod du gnong zhig/ phas smras pa sa bad
y+Yo mdzodadang/ rin po tshemang du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par thadan/ ci'i phyir khyed zer bas nyan ces smras so// de nas sbyin pa chen pos phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas// ul/
skum thams cad la sbyin ba chen po sbyin gtong chen po byed kyis/ thams cad 'dus shing shog cig ces bsgrags so// de'i tshe dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ dbul zhing 'phongs pa// mgon
med pa dang/ nad pa la sogs te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo// de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang/ nyis brgya dang/ sum brgya dang// bzhi brgya dang/ lnga brgya
dang/ dpag tshad stong gi lamanas 'os/ khatsagan debag tshad nyis stong dang/ sum stong/ bzhi stong/ lnga stong nas dpag tshad khri'i bar du lhags te/ de dag spyin bzhin du bas
nas/ thams cad la yid bzhin du sbyin pan/ gos 'dod ba la gas/ zas 'dod pa 'a zas/ na po tshe gsaradang/ dngul dang/ ba rludang/ mu sa ra ba dal ba dang/ bzhon
ba dang theg pa dang/ khyogs dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ zhing dang/ rkang 'gros la sogs te/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so// de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te/ yun ring
zhig len pa dang/ bang mdzod sum cha gcig ba nas/ mdzod sus kyis/ bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so// sras kyis bang mdzod nas sbyin pa byas nas/ sum cha gcig ni bod/
sum gnyis las ma lus na/ phan tshun 'grul ba'i skyos dang tshong zong tsa sa bgyid/ dgongs shag ces smras so// kho bon bu 'di la byams pas ngo ma zlogs kyis/ bang mdzod
stongs kyang bya'o zhes bsko'o// de nas yaring zhag 'ano pa dang/ bang mdzod sum gnyis n zid/ sum cha tsam lus pa dang/ mdzod srungs kyis yang bram ze la// dan bang mdzod
sum gnyis tsam na zid/ sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang tshong thong pa las bya zhes smras so// bram ze des bsgo ba/ kho bo'i bu sdug ches te ngo ma zlogs pas
smra mi phod kyis/ khyod bdag gis thabs ci lags su byes la/ dril tsang ma khom pa ltar blo snyad thogs shig/ mdzod srungs kyis bram ze 'as lung thob nas/ mdzod sgo bcad de
naganyer du song// de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thod du lhags nas/ bar 'ga' ni mdzod srungs ma red de mdzod sgom byed/ gal te mdzod srungs longs
na yang yidi bzhin du mi ster bas/ sbyin pa chen pos 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di ltar gyur ba 'di ni mdzod srus kyis thugs mi thub kyi/ 'i man ngag 'os kyis/ yong yang bus
ba'i bang mdzod stongs par bya bar mi 'gos kyis/ bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na rin po che yadi bzhin du red de/ skya ba mang bo la phan thogs par 'gyur ba bsams nas/ mi dag la
'di skad si so// 'jig rten na las ci zhig byas na/ ni po chu yade ba 'di red de/ nor dbyig mdu rud cing bod ma shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang/ kha cig nang mang du rmos
na nor dbyig mang por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel te kha sngogs byas na nor mad du red do zhes zer ro// kha cig ni lam ring por tshong sngogs byas nanor mang du red do/
zhes zer ro// kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// sbyin pa chen pos de dag gis smras pa thos nas/ zhing rmo ba dang/ rkang 'gros
sprul ba dang/ lam ring por tshong la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin gyi/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha'o zhes smras nas/ rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam bsams te/ pham la 'di skad ces
smras so// bdag ni rgya mtshos rin po tsha mang po blangs te/ dbul ba phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du gyi'o// bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong zhig ces smras so// de'i
pha mas de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rtenan dbul 'phongs pa dgan blo med de/ lus dang srog dang bsdos nas 'gro bar byed do//
khyod nas 'bongs na de lta bur sems/ khyed sbyin pa byed 'dod n/ khyim n yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin pa byas shig/ rgya mtshor na 'gror mi rung ste/ rgyu mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang/
dba' klong 'khyil ba dang/ chu srin dang/ klu gdug pa dang/ srin mo dang/ ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te// shin tu ya nga ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar par dka'an/
khyod nas 'phosan srogadang sde bar byed/ 'di lan nyan pa med kyis ma sams par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o// sbyin pa chen pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ bsams ba bzhin
du ma grub pas yi dam bcas te// bsams pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la kha bub tu nyal te ma ldang ngo snyam bsams nas/ yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod nug/
bdagan bsams pa bzhin dum grub kyi bar du/ kha bub tu nyal ba 'di las ma ldang ngo zhes smras so// de nas pa ma ma dga' sta/ gnyen bshes dang bgros nas/ rgya mtsho'i
nang du bgegs ga nga ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang rmang bas bcu gnyis kyi bar du sgu kun la mchod de/ khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/
dam dor bar zan kho nagi ces zhag gtsagi zhag gnyis nas/ zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar ji skad smras pa lasal zlogs so/ kham
'a skrag nas lang 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam gyi bar du bya bar brtsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na brgya la phyir ldog kyang
spyi srid kyi ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye brag 'bya ste/ da ni btung dgos so snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste lag pa nas bzung nas/ bu langos la zin tho zhig/
'di bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ sbyin pa chen po yang langs te/ bza' ba zes btung ba'akhrungs so// de nas phyi la tu phyung sta/ mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po
che len du 'gro'o// khyad su 'gro'i dga' ba rnams dang 'grogs te 'dong gis/ ded dpon yang kho bos byas la/ yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro zhes bsgrags so// de'i tshon mi lnga
brgya tsam yang 'gro bar khas blangs nas/ so so nas yo byad sbyar te/ nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas/ dus bzhin du lam du zhugs te chas so// lam du 'jug pa'i tsho/ khye'i
ba ma dang/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon bo la sogs te/ yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs btab bo// pha mas kyang dus te phyi phyag byas nas/ zhagadu
ma'i lam 'das pa dang 'brog stong du phyin te/ nub mo'i dgongs mal du mi rgod kyis bcom nas nor rdzas kun grogs so// de nas song song ba las grong khyer zhu par zhes bya bar
phyin nas/ grong khyer de na bram ze ka ba la zhes bya ba dang phrad de/ bram ze de'i khyim du song nas bram ze de las sbyin pa chen pos gser srang sum stong bslang bar byas so// de'atshon
bram ze de la bu bo gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing khar 'dug pa/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong nyid kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis bslangs na yang ma star ba gcig yod de/ de'i tshon
sbyin pa chen po bram ze'i sgor song ste/ bram ze ka ba la 'dug gam zhes dras pa'itsho/ bu mo khyim gyi nang nas sbyin pa chen bo'askad thos pa tsam gyis/ sgo phyin skad grag pa 'ang kho mo'i khyom
thob yin no zhes pha ma gnyis la smras so// de nas bram tho de sgor byung nas phrad pa dang/ khye'u de la 'din nges par gzhan bas 'phags so snyam bsams te/ khye'u des gsar bslas
pa dang bram zes kyang sbyin bar gnang nas/ lag pa ya garbagau tu gser thigs/ lag pa ya gcig gis bu mo khridi de/ bu mo 'di yang khyodakyi chung mar sbyin gyis long zhig ces//
[h ]thu@#// gasmras pa dang/ sbyin pa chen pos smras pa// bdag ni rgya mtsho chen por rin po che len du 'gro ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang bas/ kho bo 'khor ram mi
'khor gyi gtol med de/ khyod kyi bu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs ma thub go/ bram zes smras pa/ khyod bde bar 'khor na bu mo 'dichung mar leng zhig ces smras pa dang/ sbyin pa chen
bos kyang phyir 'khor na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so// de nas bram zes kyang gser srang sum stong dang/ gzhan yang yo byadaci dgos pa kun sbyar te/ de nas chas pas rgya mtsho'i rigs
su phyin to// de nas klu btses togru'i nang du zhugs nas/ de nas thag pa bdun gyisabartod de/ gru'i nang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgya mtsho'ani na bgegs 'di dag yod de/ 'di
sku ltasto rlung nag po dang/ srin po dang/ chu'i dba' rlabs 'khyil ba dang/ klu gdug pa dang/ chu'i mdog lta bu'i ra dang/ chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs ya nga ba mang du yod/
kyis khyad las 'grol ma dad pa zhig yod na 'di las phyir log cig/ phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ pha ma dang/ phunu dang/ budang/
chung ma dang/ gnyen bshes la ma chags pa 'dang ngo// gal te bde bar phyin na rin po che sna bdun gyis bu tshar bas bdun tshun chad phyug par 'gyur te/ longs spyod zad mi shes par
00/'gyur ro// zhes smras nas thag pa khag cig bcad do// de bzhin du khyim bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan ni de skad smras nas/ bstod thag re re bcad de rlung dang sbyar te/ g.yorashing bsgrung
bas mgyogs khyad mda' bzhazhi song ngo// de nas tshong ba dag dang rin po che'i gling du phyin nas// sbyin pa chen po mang du shes pas ni po che brtag pa la yang shin tu mkhas te/ ni po tshe bzang
ngan[– ]nga/ lci yang dang/ jitsam ri ba'i ni thad phan tshun tshong pa rnams la bstan nas/ na po tsho kha dog 'di lta bu ni ya mod kyi rin che'o// rin po che 'di dag ni lci yang na chung gis
ma len cig/ ha cang yang mang chesan gu lta bas 'bying ngo// ha cang nyung ches na yang nyon mongs te song song ba'i don med pas/ 'di tsam zhig ni ran no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad kyang
bsta[… ]nas/ rin po che grur bsdongs te/ ci yang ma rag nas/ da phyir 'dong ngo nas chas pa dang/ sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang du 'ong du ma btub nas/ tshong pa rnams la kho bo ni klu'i rgyal
po'i pho brang nas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po tshem theb kyi bar du e ldog go zhes smras so// de nas tshong pa rnams kyis dus te/ mya ngan gyis yi mug nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
cag tshong pa 'di rnams ni/ skyes bu ded dpon khyed kyi g.yog tu'ongs te/ dakhyed kyis 'dir dor te ma 'gro na/ bdag cag kyang phyir khyim du mi phyin te/ thams cad 'khyams par
@#// 'gyur ro sbyin pa chen pos smras pa// tshong ba khyed kyang mnyes par yul du phyin par kho bos kyang smon lam gdab bo zhes khog bor lag tu blangs te/ phyogs
bzhi'i mchod nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni rin po che blas te/ sems can 'phongs pa la sbyin par ma zad kyi/ ltar sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams des sas rgyas su 'grub
pa'i khyi'i ro// bdag gis smras pa 'ad bden te smon lam bshAn du 'gruban/ tshong pa 'di dag rin po che dang bcas pa nyen yod par 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar phyin bar shog cig ces smon
lam btab nas/ thag pa bcad de ga rangang bsgrung nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bde ba dong ngo// de dag song ba'i 'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las/ zhag bdun
gyi bar du na pus mo tsam las mnub bo// de nas yang zhag bdun gyi bar du ni borla drung tsam las ma nub bo// de nas yang zhag bdun song ba las skad pa tsam las ma nub bo// zhag
bdun len gyi bar dun phrag pa tsam du phyin to// de nas zhag bdun ni rkyal la// de nas ri zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang/ shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegasanas/ zhag bdun gyis
rtse mor phyin to// ra rtsir zhag bdun song song nas/ yang zhag bdun gyis shad du ru 'gram du phyin to// chu 'gram du phyin pa dang/ chu'i nang na pad+magasar gyi mdog can yod pa la/
sbrul gdug pas bad+ma'i rtsa ba la dkris shing 'dug pa mthong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas// sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
zhugs te/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon zhesdadang phrag dog byas pa'i rkyen gyis 'dilta bu'i lus mi sdug pa myong ngosnyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba'is mos skyes pas/ sbrul gdug
pa de'i gdug pa kun zhi nas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma de'i sten gnas gom pa dor te song song ba las/ zhag bdun gyis sbrul gdug pa de dag las rtol to// de nas yang song
song ba las srin po dang phrad nas/ srin po de dag mi'i dri tshor bas kun tu 'tshol la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems tshu gtsag tu khyams pa'i sems kyis brtags pas/
srin po de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gnas 'os/ gang du 'gro zhes so// de la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni yid bzhin nor bu rin po che 'tshol du 'os so zhes smras so//
denas srin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/ 'di na bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig go snyam bsams nas/ 'din da dung klu'i pho brang las shin tu ring// nam yang mi phyin pas nyon
mongs par 'gyur gyis/ mthu zhagi bstas tabaskyal lasnyam nas/ nam mkha' la khyeratodapag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol tu phyin nas/ phyir yangs la bzhag go/ sbyin pa chen po
de nas yang song song ba las/ ring po ma len par dngul gyi mkhar zhige mthong nas/ klu'i gnas yin na snyam bsams te nyo bar song ngo// mkhar de'i phyi
la khongs me pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pa 'jigs su rung bas gang ngo// sbyin pa chen pos de dag mtho nas/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni sdod zhe sdang che
ba'i lan gyis/ 'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs sunang ba myong bar gyur to snyam ste/ de la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams shing snying rje ba'isims skyes te/ de ltar byams pa'i sems
zla bskyod pas/ sbrul gyi gdug pa yang zhi bar gyur nas// sbrul de dag brdzus te klu'i mkhar du song ngo// mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te/ klu'i mgo mkhar sgo la bstan to//
( klu de gnyis kyis sbyin pachen po mthong nas/ mgo bteg ste gdug pa 'byin pa las/ sbyin pa chen pos byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/ gdug po yung zhu nas mgo smad de nyal 'o/
sbyin ba chen pos klu'imago la brdzisazhas/ mkhar gyi nang du so ba dang/ mkhar gyi nangan klu 'thig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthodang/ klu'i rgyal po des
byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang/ dngangs te 'disnyam du bsams so// 'i gnas 'di 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/
[z/]glu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs la gruban/ 'di lta bu su zhig yin snyam ste 'dug pa las langs nas bsu ste/ bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas
ni bo che'i khri la bzhag ste/ kha bas rnam pa sna tshogs byin no// kha zas zos nas khyod 'dir mi 'ongos/ ji ltar panaces sa so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'dzam bu'i
gling ga midagan de bul 'phos pas/ ra dang/ ges dang/ zas kyi phyir/ gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/ tsha'aphos ma thag tungan song gsum
du ltung ngo// bdagan de dag la snying brtse ste/ de dag gi mgo na bya ba'i phyir/ lam ring po nas nyon mos pa dang bsdos te/ rgyal po chen po khyod lanar bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so// yid
bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can la phan gdags pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal gyis/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'ga' bar ni po che stsal bar gsol lo// ku'i
rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di bo chen shin tu yang rnyed dka' ba yin te/ khyod don 'di'i phyir 'ongs na 'di'i zla ba gcig cag 'dug ste/ bdag gi mchod pa cung zad bzhes
la bdag cag la chos kyang bstanan/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so// de nas klu'i rgyal pos
nyin gcig bzhin du/ kha zas brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te yulanas/ rol mos byang chub sems dpa' la mchod de// byang chub sems dpas
kyang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos kyi yan lag zla ba gcig gi bar du bstan nas/ phyir 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' nas spyi bo'igatsug phud las yid bzhin gyi
nor bu rin po che bkrol te yul le// skyes bu chen po 'gro ba la phanapa'i don du yi dam langashani tubartan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o// nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ bdag
kyang khyed kyi nye gnas mchog tugyur cig ces smras so// de nas klu'i rgyal po lan khurani ngo ma 'di la mthu stobs na yod cesasan/ smras pa/ nor bu'adin dpag tshad nyis stong khor
khor yug dudagos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'be bas nus so// byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ nor bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis bsams pa'i
don chen bo sgrub nus pa ma yin no snyam bsamasanas/ klu'i rgyal bo 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo// de nas yang song song ba las rgyang mnas bo zurma sngon po'i mkhar rtsiga mthong ngo//
mkhar de 'dod par song ba dang/ mkhar drung du phyin na/ mkhar de yang bobs rami pa bdun gyis bskoro/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ngo// byang chub sems
dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas sprul de dag la brdzus te song ngo// mkhar sgor phyin pa dang/ klu gnyis shiga mkhan
sgo na nyal ba yad byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis/ klu'i gdug pa zhi nas mgi la bsdus te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo// de'i mkhar de na klu'i rgyal po gcig/
zhi bo tshi sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pas/ rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhreng nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di la 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang
na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/ klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan su yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ mi 'di lta bu su yin/ gang nas 'os snyam ste ya mtshan du gyur nas/ bsu ste
bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas/ rin po che'i gdan la bzhag go/ de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te bulanas/ byang chub sems dpas kha bras bres pa'i
'og tu khyod 'di'ici la'os/ don ci yod ces dris so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// bdag ni rgyal bo khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so// klus smras pa/
rin po chen ngebani tu yang rnyed par dka' ste/ khyed 'dod pa yang dag na/ kho bos gsol ba bzhin du zla ba gnyis shig 'di'i 'dug ste/ bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan
hubya/// nas bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/ rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang/ sbyin pa chen pos kyang de bzhin du bya'ozhes smras so// de nas klu'i rgyal pos zla ba/
gnyis kyi bar du/ kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te pul nas/ rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod de/ byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyirkang pa bzhi'i tshes
a kyi rnam grangasazla ba gnyis kyi bar du bstan to/ phyir 'gro bar bsams nas/ klu'i rgyal pos kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te yulanas/ skyes bu chen po yi dam la/
shin tubartan ba khyod gdon me tha bar 'tshang rgya'o// nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas khagyi'o zhes smras pa dang/ de bzhin du gyuratsag ces smras so/
ra bu ni bo tshe 'di' mthu stobs ci yod ces drisan/ nor bu 'din dpag tshadabazhi stong kho ra khor yug tu rtsi 'dod ba thams cad char bzhin du 'babs so zhes smras so// byang chub
sems dungs yang 'di snyam du ni po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ bdag gi bsam ba grub pa ma yin no snyam nas/ klu'i 'khor gyis sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems dpa' bskyal
to denas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas gsar gyi mkhar rab tu 'tsher ba zhagi mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du song nas phyin pa dang/ mkhar de yang 'obs rim/
ba bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nangan sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' pad khams pa'isams bskyod pas/ sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi/
nas de la brjes ted de// mkhar de la yang klu gnyis shig 'khyil te mgo sgo ril du bstan nas nyal ba/ byang chub sems dpas mthong nas/ mgo bcug ste gdug pa 'byin pa/
las byang chub sems dpas snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyod pas/ gdug pa zhi nas de'i mgo la brdzus te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo// mkhar gyi nangan klu'i rgyal pos//
ni po che'i gzhal med khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas mthong nas 'di snyam du/ bdag gi gnas 'din rtobs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug
bas gang bas/ klu dang gnod sbyin mgatogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ mi 'di su yin gang nas 'ongs snyam ngo mtshar du bzung ste rgyang ma nas bsu nas
bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che'i gdan la 'dug tu bcug go/ de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas/ kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu
khyod su zhig gang nas 'ongs zhes dris so/ de la byang chub sems dpas bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gdenas mchis te/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga sems can dag bsod nams chungs pas nor dang/
zas dang/ skom gyi phyir gtsi u0f7a la gtsagi rnam ba sna tshogs pas 'tsho zhingagasod de/ mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par byed pas/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan

ba song gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal mang bo myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag ni de dag la snying brtsi ste mgon bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal bo chen po byed l yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so//
'a klu'i rgyal pos smras pa// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po chen rnyed par sla ba ma yin te/ skyes bu khyod bdag la re ste 'ongs na/ bdag gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi zhig 'dug ste/ bdag
zla cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/ rin po che yang dbul le zhes byas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas yang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i bar du ba byas
ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phulanas/ rol mo mang pos kyang mchod do// de la byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen phu zhing bstan pas/ klu'i rgyal
@# po rab tu dga' sta/ klugazhan dang gnod sbyin gzhan la ma ltos par/ yo byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du sbyar te// de lta bu'i tshul du zla ba bzhi byas nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' 'gro bar chas pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pos gtsug phud nas yid bshun gyi ni bu ni bo chebakrol te/ byang chub sems dang la phul nas skyes bu chen po yi dam la brtan pa khyod
[8 ]gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o// nam mngon par sangs rgyas pan/ bdag kyang sku gnas mchog tu gyur te/ bsnyen bkur byed par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo// byang chub
sams dpas kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas/ nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ji tsam 'gi yod ces dras so// klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ rin po che 'di ni dpag tshad brgyad/
stong kher khor yug tu rin po che char bzhin 'bobs te/ tsa 'dod pa thams cad 'bab bzhas smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gdod dga' nas 'di snyam du/ 'dzam bu
glang ga sa khyon ni dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/ nor bu rin po che 'dis bdag gi re ba skong do snyam bsams nas// snga phyir rnyed pa'i rin po che gsum char gos kyi mtha' mar
bur te mkhar gyi sgor byung ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal nas so son dong ngo// byang chub sems dpas pa zad cig tupaninas/ nor bu ni po che rnams lag
tuthogs nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/ nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dgan/ bdag nam mkha' la 'phur bar gyur cig ces smras so// de skad
ces smras ma thagatunam mkha' la 'phur te/ rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas// rgya mtsho'i ngogos su phyin par gyur te/ de nanyung zad bsti zhing la sos pa'i mal du gnyid kyis
[g]bya// log pa dang/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i klu dran rnams 'di skad ces bgros so// rgya mtsho 'din nor bu rin po che 'di gsum las med de/ gsum char mi 'dis khyer/
gyis nor bu 'di ni yon tan dang ldan pas khadag cag la yang dgos kyis phyir brku'o zhes bgros nas/ byang chub sems dba'aganyid kyis log pa'i tshon yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
che klu rnams kyis phyir brkus so// byang chub sems dpa' sadanas bltasan/ nor bu rin po che mad pas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di ni gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus
kyis/ bdag gis mthun yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu banus te bskams par bya'o snyam bsams te/ nor bu phyir ma thob kyi bar du lag pa stong par mi 'gro'o snyam yid m bcas nas/ rgya
mtsho'i ngogs su song ste rus sbal gyi khog pa zhig blangs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i chu bcus so// de'i tshe na rgyu mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas de la 'di skad ces smras so//
rgya mtsho 'din gting zab cing yas te/ dpag tshad stong phrag sum brgya sumacu yod pas/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi miwims cad leg kyang/ rgya mtshoskams par byed enes na/
khyod gcig bus nus ba lta ci smos te don mad do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// ma gcig gis snying nas las su byas na ci yang mi 'grub pa med de/ bdag gi rin po che red/
0 pa des 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya bar bsams te/ de'i bsod nams kyis mngon pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems ma zhuman/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di
bskams par ma nus zhes smras so// de'i tshon lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas/ rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lus yid mthun pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te/ 'gro ba
mang po' don du dka' ba byed pa mthong nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la bstang ngo snyam bsams te/ gcig nas gcig tu sbra gnas / thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i drung du
lhags te/ byang chub sems dpa' snod kyis chu bcu ba mthong nas// lha de dag thams cad so sor legs phud de/ tshur bsgugs nas lan cig bskugs te phyir phyung bas/ rgya mtsho'i
chu dpag tshad bzhi bcu bri'o// yang lan gnyis bstugs pas dpag tshad brgyad cu bri'o// lan gsum bstugs pas dpag tshad brgya lishu bri nas/ klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/
byang chub sems dba'i drung du lhags nas 'di skad du thong zhig/ rgya mtsho'ache skams par ma byed cig ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dang sa btang ngo// de nas klu rnams kyis
byang chub sems dpa' la khyed kyinor bu ni po che 'di ci zhig tu dges/ smras pa/ bdag gis sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos so// klus smras pa// sems M can la phan
ba'i don du dgosan/ rgya mtsho'i nang na yang sems can mang du yodan/ ci'i phyi re bskur zhes smras so// smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yang soms
[«]1 tsan yin mod kyi/ del 'bongs ba'i sdug bsngal yod de/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dag ni nor gyi phyir/ gcig gisagatsagi rnam par 'tsho zhing gnod pa byed de/ mi ge ba bcu rdzogs pa'i
byed pas/ tsha'aphos nas kun sems can dmyal bar skyo ste/ bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po cha'adi dgos so zhes smras pa dang/ klu rnams kyisanor bu rin po che phyung ste/
slar phul lo// rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar brtson 'grus la brtan pa mthong nas/ 'di ni gdon mi zo bar 'tshang rgya'o snyam sems te/ nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa/
bdag kyang nye gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyi'i theb nas// stong gi nam mkha' la 'phur te gnas su 'ongs nas/ sngar
pagyi tshong pa grogs po rnams yod dam/ bde bar phyin tas zhes dris so// tshong pa grogs po dag bde bar phyin nas/ de dag gcig la gcig dga' nas grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshar
ya mtshan du bzung ngo// de nas bram ze ka pi yakho sgor song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshonas phyir 'pheg go zhes thos nas thams cad kyis sgor bsu ste/ rab tu dga' nas tshong pa
grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' ston chen po byas so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dbasaran po thogs te khyim du 'ongs pa dang/ bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang ba
gyur to de nas bram ze ka pa lase rin po che su tshogs kyis bu mo brgyan nas rin po cha'i chusnod bskur te/ byang chub sems dpalus dang rkang lag bkrus nas/ bu mo'i lag pa nas
bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la gtad/ byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas/ bram ze rab tu dga' sto/ bu mo'i g.yog tu bu mo lnga brgya dang/ glang po che lnga brgya yang 'an po ches/
brgyan ta rol mo byas nas/ byang chub sems dbar la bordza sa so// de'i tshon sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu du bas// pha ma gnyis ka'i mog ldes par gyur
te bu rgya mtsho nas lag pa dang pha ma dang phrad nas/ bus pha ma la phyag 'tshal to/ lag pa nas 'jus nas bu yin par rtogs so// sbyin pa chen po khyod kyis nged bor te song
ba'i 'og tu mig kyang ljongs so// khyod rgya mtsho songasong nas ci red ces dris pa dang/ sbyin pa chen pos nor bu ni po tshe pha'i lag tu byin te/ bdag gis 'di rung ngo zhes smras nas/
bas lag tublangs te bsnams nas/ 'di lta bu'i rdo pani nga'i mdzod na sngon yang mang du po na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs ba dang bsdo ci dgos zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpas
nor bu bya byas te/ pha ma'i mig shus pa tsam gyis ji ltam+b+harlung drag pos sbyin bus pa bzhin du/ pha ma gnyis kyi mig kyang gsal bar mthong bar gyur to//
de nas pha ma gnyis dga' ste/ 'di ni nor bu rin po che yin yang dag pa lta ste/ nyon mos bden yod par gyur to zhes smras so// de nas yang sbyin pa chen pos ni po che thogs te/
khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni bo che yin yang dgan/ kho bo'i nga ma'i 'og tu ri po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung zhinge/ rin che'i bla res stong khebs par shog cig ces smon lam btab
ma thag tu de bzhin du grub nas/ rgyal po'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang gang bar gyur to/ des rgyal pos pho nyagacig glang po tshe dpag tshad brgyad du 'gro ba zhig la bskyon te/ 'dzam
bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtshonas pa dang nor bu rin po che red de/ nor du yon na can nges da ste zhag bdunan/ ni bo che la sogs pa gos dang/
bras dang/ dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyis so so nas ci bde bar yod zhig ces sgrugs sa/ de ltar kun tu bsgragasanas/ sbyin pa chen bo khrus
byas te/ gos gsar ba bgos nas/ lag la'i thang du mnyam por rgyal mtshan btsugs te/ yid bzhin gyanor bu rin po tshe rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas/ bog por lag
tu blangs nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni dbul 'phongs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la phan gdags dgos kyis/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'an po che yin te/
mi brdzunan/ so so nas cad ng cadegos pa de dang de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob cig ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nag po g.yos nas deb thog tu mi gtsang
ba'i nyal nyil thams cad 'phyugs te/ char zim bu mi drag pa zhig phabs/ rdulami 'thul ru byas pa'i 'og tu theg mar bza' ba dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs char
bzhin du bab bo// de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du bab bo// de nas gos char bzhin du bab bo// de nas rin po che char bzhin du bab ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling ni rani po che'i phung pos yongs su
gang nas na po tshadag gsog ma 'am gyo mo lta bur byas te/ byang chub sams dngas de ltar kun tsheg par byas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la 'di zhes bsgo'o// 'dzam bu'i gling
gi sems can dgan ges dang/ zas dang/ nor gyi phyir gcig la gcig gsod cing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos 'ba' zhig byed do/ tshe'i dus byas
nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste/ mun panas mun par 'gro bas/ bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang nyon mongs pa mang du khyad du bsad de/ khyed rnams bde
bar bya ba'i phyir rgya mtsho nas nor bu rin po che blangasanas/ nga khyed kun nas kyang mi khril te bde bar gyur gyis/ khyed rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lus dang/
ngag dang/ yid bsdus te brtson par gyis shig ces/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan cing bskul to// de ltar bstan cing bskul te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed du/

bcug pas/ 'dzam bu'i glenge gi mdeg tshe 'phos nas mtho si kyi lhar skyes so// de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de'apho bram zin+ya gro d+hand ltar nga'i yab bras lagatsang ma yin no// de'i mar gyur pa ni da lta
klu ba yum lha mdzas yin no// sbyin pachen pon nga nyid yin no// dngul gyi mkharan 'dug pa'i klu de rig pa'i bu yin no// brgyud+ma'i gokhan 'dug pa'i klu de ni mo'u 'gal yan yin
no gsar gyi mkharan 'dug pa'i klu de ni kun dga' bo yin no// rgya mtsho'i lha de ni ma 'gags pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'di klu'i rgyal bo byed pa na yang nga la bsnyen bkur byas te dus la
mkhas daltar gyi bar du yang su la mkhas kyis/ 'dod pa gsum yang yid bzhin du gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas/ pus mo'i lcengs la
btsugs te/ bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar dud bzhin gshegs pa la bstan bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor mang po rnams
0la lan rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob panas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bod du thub bo// la la ni rasas rgyas su gyun/ la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// la'ami
phyi'i ma ldog pa las thob nas rjes su yarengs te mngon par dga' 'o// sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// rgyal po ma long gdong ga lebu lo/
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcogin/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal powikhab rgya gro d+ha'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshon khatsam ldan 'das tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin la sogs pas
bskor zhing bzhugs pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan dang/ dpe byad dang/ gser gyi mdog lta bu'i skul 'khor mang po thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin te bstod cing bsngags
de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang bo las 'phags te thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
zhus ba dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa// daltar 'di 'ba' zhig tu 'khe kun las 'phags te mchog gtso bor gyur pa ma yin gyi/ sngon 'das pa'i dusan yang 'di
dag kun las 'phags te gtso bor gyur to// de nas dge slong dag gis sdon ji ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par gsol pa dang/ del bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skudaces bka' stsal to//
thubya// sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tumad/ bsamagyis mi khyab pa'i snga rolan/ 'dzam bu'i klong 'dir rgyal po chen po rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi/
stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/ de la bun ldabargya yod do// dus phyi zhig na btsun mo chen mo las bu gcig btsas te/ lus gser gyi kha dog can sku mthon mthing lta bu lag mthil
na 'khor lo rtsis stong dang ldan pa'imtshan yod pa// rkang pa g.yon gyi mthilan rta'iri mo yod pa/ rkang pa g.yas kyi mthal na glang po che'ir mo yod pa// bsod nams dang mtshan du
ldan pa zhig btsas taM/ ming yang ma leng gdong zhes bya bar btagasas// rgyal po chen po dand kyis btab ste tshe'i dus byed du nye ban/ blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nangan
rgyal tshab tu gang bzhugs/ rgyal po'i debang gangal bskur zhes zhus pa dang/ rgyal bo des yon tan dang mtshan rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ rgyal por chug la dbang bskur cig ces
bsgo'o bcu gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi mdog gser lta bu la skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthilan 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang/ rkang ba
g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang/ rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthilen rta'i ra mo yod pa dang/ rgyal bo'i gos bskon na lus dang 'tsham zhing ma tshe ma chung ba dang/ rgyal po'i stan la
'dug na gzi brjid dang mthur ldan pa dang/ rgyal phran rnams kyis bkur sti rim gro cher byed de/ btsun mo dang bo brang sras rnams kyang de la dga' nying phyag byed pa dang/ lha rnams
kyi rten du khridin lha rnams kyis phyar phyag bya ba dang/ yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus ran po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang/ btsun mo
chen mo las btsas pa dang bcu ste/ yon tan 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyal por dbang skur tsag ces bsgo nas/ mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur te tshe'apos so// de nas rgyal bu dang
blon po rnams 'dus te/ rgyal bu nang gi chen po nas mthar rgyas yon tan bcu gang la yod pa brtags na/ rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni lus kyang gser lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/
skra mthon mthing du'adug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i mthal na 'kher leb mtshan yod pa ma yin/ rkang pa'imathilan glang bo che dang rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gos dang 'tsham pa
ma lani/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag pa na dngangs pa ltar 'greng bar gyur/ rgyal phran dang blon pa rnams bsti stang dang phyag mi byed de/ btsun mo dang po brang sas rnams dga' ba dang
phyag bya ba ma yin/ lha'i rten du khridan lha rnams phyag bya ba ma yin/ rin po che'i char 'bebs nus pa ma yin/ btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/ rgyal bu lnga brgya las
mchan gcig tsam dang ldan pa khag kha ya ma byung sta/ srasanang gi tha chung 'ba' zhig lus gsar gyi mdog can la/ skra mthonamathing mdog lta bu/ lag pa/
gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan dang yang ldan/ rkang pa'i mthilan glang bo tsha dang rta'i ri mo yang yod/ gos dang lus su 'tshams/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na gzi brjid dang
byin che rgyal phran thams cad kyis bsdu skong dang bcas pas phyag byed cing/ btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang dga' bas phyag byed/ lha'i rten du 'ongs na lha rnams phyag khyed/ rin
po che phob cig ces smras ma thag tuchar bzhin du 'bab/ btsun mo nang gi chen mo las btsas te/ mtshan rdzogs par ldan pas/ rgyalaphran dang blon po rnams kyis rgyal por dbang
bskur te/ tshes bco lnga'i nang par nyi ma thog mar shar ban/ gsar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ che khyad dpag tshad gcig pa shar phyogasanas 'ongs te/ de la pus mo
btsugs nas/ gal te bdag yon tan dang ldan targyal por 'gyuran/ 'khor lo 'di bdag gi drung du nye bar shog cig ces smras pa dang/ nam mkha'i phyogs nas sku bar 'ongs
so// glang po rin po chen ri spos kyi ngad can nas 'ongs te/ mjug ma la nor bus brgyan pa rgyal po de la zhen nas nam mkha' la 'phur te/ nyi ma phyed kyis glang bzhin/ ]
'khor te/ gal te rkang pas 'gron rkang pa'i rjes gang zhig bsagasar gyi bye mar 'gyur re/ rta rani po che na ba dag mthad kal ji ldog dmar ba/ rin po che sna bdun 'bab pa/ rgyal po de
la zhen nas bun gcig bza' na tsam gyis glang bzhi nas 'khor te mi dal ma dug bo// nir bu rin po ni 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te// rgyang grags brgya nyi shu tshun chad 'od kyis snang
bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi char bzhin du 'bab cing thams cad la sbyin bar byed do// bud med ran po cha na bzang ba mdzes pa/ rgyal por yid tshim par byed do// khyim bdag
rin po chen rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun cu dgos pa yid bzhin du sbyor te/ zad mi shes par byed do// blon po rin po chen rgyal po la dpung rnam bzhi dgasan/ bltas pa tsam gyis dpung
gi chogs rnams 'dus te rtsal dang mthur ldan no// de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas/ de 'di snyam du sems so// thabs 'di lta bu thob pa yang sngon gyi bsod nams las skyes
kyis/ rgyal po'i gdung brgyudam 'chad par bya'o snyam bsam mo// sbos chus khrus byas te/ gos gsar ba gtsang ma bgos nas/ lag na pog por thegs te/ shar phyogs
legs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so// shar phyogasan skyes bu 'phags pa bzhugs pa rnams/ bdag gsol ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol zhes smras pa dang/
@#/// shar phyogs nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri stod rgyal bo'i pho brang du gshegs so// ltudang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du gsol ba dang/ de dag kyang/

so so nas rang sas rgyas te khri stod rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so// de nas rgyal bo dang blon po rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar te mchod pa byas so// de nas rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong
snyad phyir yul du 'gro bar gsol te/ phyi phyag 'tshal ban/ rgyal phran rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams la/ shas kyi bdag cag kyang mchod par 'tshal te/ bsonganams bgyi'o zhes
gsol pa dang/ rgyal bo dang blon po rnams kyis 'bargyad khri bzhi stong gi par du/ rang sangs rgyas brgyad la yideba'in du mchod nas/ tshi'i dus byas nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so//
dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po me long gdong de ni de ltar ng yin no// rgyal po de'i phan po'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no// btsun mo chen mo ni nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no// rgyal po lnga brgyu
rishAkyaragis lnga brgya yin no// de'i tshon yang thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur te/ da sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i mchog gtso bor gyur to// 'khor mang po rnams sas
rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su ya ris nas mngon par dga' 'o// rgyal po ma leng gdong gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// kalegs 'tshol dang nyes 'tshol
gyi le'u'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so//
de'i tshe na lha sbyin rab tu byung mod kyi/ rid pa la chags pas mtshams med pawi las ri bsnyil nas sangs rgyas mnan pa dang/ zhabs la shing gi tshal pa 'dzugs pa dang/ glang po che
dmags pa gtang ba dang/ 'dum pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang/ thag pa zad pa'i dge slongam bsad pa dang/ mi dge bawi'as 'di dag byas nas/ skye ba phyi ma rnam par
smin pas 'jigs te/ mu stags can gyi ston pa drug gi thad du song nas dras so// ston pa drug gis kyang ngan nga/ra lta ba'i chos sdig pa byas kyang sdig par mi 'gyur la// dge ba byas
kyang bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba chos bstan nas/ de la yid ches te dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad do// de'i tshon kun dga' bos phu nu bo la sAng brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag tumi dga' sta sa
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// lha sbyin gti mug can ni mi dge ba'i las kha na ma tho ba bgyis te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas shAkya'i rigs kyang sun par bgyis
so bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ lha sbyin 'di ni tshe 'di 'ba' zhig la red pa dang grags pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad par ma zad kyi/ 'das
pa'i dus na yang red pa dang grags pa'i phyir/ lus dang srog kyang sbyor ba'i las byas so/// de la dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas/ kun dga'
po 1bos ba tsam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha sbyin gyis 'das pa'i dus na red bdang grags pa'i slad du/ lus dang srog stor ba'i las bgyis pa ji lta bu lags zhes
'a gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo sngon 'das pa'i dusan bskal ba grangs med/ dpag tumad/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
pha rol na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dare lul bAdAn in/ bram ze ma haya yi zhes bya ba yod de/ de rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon par chung ma sems can dang ldan par
rgyur te zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u zhag btsas so// de nas btsas ston che byas nas/ bu'i ming yang legs 'tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ ma ma la gtad nas gsos so//
da nas yang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ sngon ma de mnyen zhing des pa las/ soms can dang ldan pa'i 'og tugatum zhing khro bar gyur te// de nas zla ba tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te/
deltar ma yang sngon las gyur pas bu'i ming yang nyes 'tshol zhes bya bar btags te/ ma ma la gtad nas gsos so// khye'u spun gnyis phyis cher skyes nas spun gnyis rgya mtsho rin po che len
bar dad de/ so so nas grogs da 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya red nas sdaphyir lam du zhugs so// lamarang bsan zhag bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin par brgyags chad de srog dang bral du nye nas//
legs 'tshol dang grogs tshong pa rnams nyam thag ste/ thams cad lha rjed cing/ lha rnams la mchod pa byed do// de nas 'brog stong dan rgyang anas skye shing bzang po gcig mthong nas//
thams cad skyed/ nga gi drung du lhags pa dang/ shing gi drungan chu mig bzang po gcig kyang yod de/ tshong ba rnams chu mig de la'athungs na// bdag cag gi lha mchod pa'i rtags 'di'o
zhes smras pa dang/ lha mngon du smra ste skyed shing gi yal ga chog cige dang/ 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ngo zhes bsgo// de nas yal ga gcig bcag pa dang/ btung ba zhim po byung ngo//
de nas yal ga gcig bcag pa dang/ kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa thams cad byung nas/ de dag kun gyis tsham par thos so// yang yal ga gcig bcag pa dang/ gos rnam pa sna
tshogs byung ngo// de nas yal ga gcig bcag pa dang/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs byung ste/ khal thams cad lengs so// de nas nyes 'tshol la sogs pa yang der lhags te//
snga mas yal ga bcag pa las/ rin po che sna tshogs khal longs pa red pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bsams so// snga ma 'di dag gis yal ga las kyang rin po che chog par redan/ shade
'dra'i rtsa ba phyunganani rin po che snatshogs mang du rnyed do snyam bsams nas shing gi rtsa ba rko bar gzas so// de nas legs 'tshol mi dga' ste smras pa/ bdag cag gi'aphos/
tesrog dang bral ba 'ashing 'dis bdag cag gi srog gsos kyis/ khyod shing 'di la gcod cig ces smras na/ nyes 'tshol ma nyan te shing gi rtsa ba 'byin te/ danas legs 'tshol yang mthong
'tsha ma 'dod pas/ khal dang chas song ba'i 'og tu/ shing gi rtsa ba nas srin po lnga brgya byung ste/ nyes 'tshol dang tshong pa kun thos so// kun dga' bo pa'i tshade'i dus na/ legs 'tshol de
ni da ltar nga yin no// de'i phan de ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no// de'i ma ni de ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no// nyes 'tshol ni da ltar gyi lha spyan 'di yin te/ kun dga' bo lha spyi
gyis da ltar 'ba' zhig nga la gnod pa byed par ma zad d/ rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad du pa la gnod pa byas na/ ngas phan pa'i chos bstan to// phan pa byas kyang/
lha sbyin ni nga la dgrar 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/ 'khor mang po rnams rjes su yi rang ste mngon par dga' 'o// legs 'tshol dang nyes 'tshol gyi
le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o///bam po dgu pa//// rgyal bu dge don gyi le'u'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//nas srin po lnga brgya dang gcis smras 1 gzas so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i rol dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshon tshod ldan pa kun dga' bos lha sbyin gyis thabs rnam pa sna tshegs
kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod pa bya bar bsams kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pan lha sbyin dang sgra gcan 'dzin gnyis la mi 'dra ba med par dgongs te/ rtag tung la thugs brtse
bar dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// lha sbyin 'dis dus 'di nyide na nga la gnod sems
bskyed par ma zad de/ skye ba gzhan du yang nga la gnod sems bskyed do// dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas/ kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol te// lha sbyin 'dis skye ba gzhan dag na/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ji ltar bgyis zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces/
bka' stsal to// sngon 'as pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ tshadamed/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i pha rolan/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po rin chen go cha zhes bya
ba rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed ba zhig byung ngo// de la btsun mo dang po brang slas lnga brgya snyad yod kyang bu mdad/ nyi zla'i lha la sogs te/ lha thams cad la gsol ba byas
gnas lamang du len yang bu med nas mi dga' bar gyur te/ 'disnyam du bsams so// bdag la bun gcig kyang med kyis/ de'u re tshe zad pas rgyal
[«]1 phran lnga brgya yang gcig la gcig mnyan na/ thams cad 'khrugs nas yul mi bde bar 'gyur ro snyam sems khongs su chud de/ lag pa 'gram pa la brtenanas 'dug pa las/
'phyi de'atshan lha zhig rgyal po'i bsam pa shes nas/ rmilam du rgyal po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// pho brang gi phyi rol tshal gyi nangan drang srong gnyis yod de/ gcig gi lus gser gyi
mdog can du 'dug gis/ de'i gan duso nga la gsol ba thob cig dang/ bur skye bar 'gyur re zhes bsgo ma thag tu gnyid log pa las sad nas/ drang srong gnyis gang na 'dug pa
'tshol du song ste/ drang srong de dang phrad nas/ bdag la rgyal po'i rigis 'tshob pa med kyis/ khyod bdag giragis su skyes te/ rigs sobs shig ces gsol ba btab nas/
drang srong des de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so// drang srong gcig gis kyang bdug kyang khyod kyi rigs su skye bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bo rab tu dag nas/ khyod kyang bdag gi rigs
su skye bar ngashog tsag ces smras so// de nas rgyal bo phyi'i le gnas dus phyi zhigan/ drang srong gser gyi mdog can de'i tshe'i dus byas nas/ btsunamo chen mo'i ming la skyes te/ bud med
mkhas pan bu yod pa shes/ bu phor shes/ phyi mo r shes te/ bdag la nges par bu tho yod do shas rgyal po la smras nas/ rgyal pos kyang btsun mo'i rim gro bskyod de/ zla ba
dgu tshang nas bu khye'u gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa// mtshan dang ldan pa cig btsas so// rgyal po rab tu dga'anas btsas ston byas te/ mtshan mkhan gyis
mtshan bltasanas/ bu'i ming yang dge don du btags so// de nas yang btsun mo gcig kyang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ drang srong cig shos kyang tshe'i dus byas nas btsun mo de'i
mngal du skyes so// de nas yang btsas ston byas te/ mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan baltasanas/ khye'u'i mnge sdig don du btags so// rgyal po bu la byams shing sdug pas/ bu
'dug pa'i gnas dbyar dgun dang/ ston dpyad so sor byas te/ bags kyis chen skyes nas/ rig pa bco brgyad la sogs te/ gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par gyur te/ phyis
dge don gyis rgyal po la gsol te/ bdag phyi lo'i tu'achag cing ltad mo ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang/ de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu'agro'i zhes/ lam srang phyag bdar byed du bcug ste/
rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas me tog gis gtor te/ bdug spos kyisi'adug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas/ dge don glang bo che rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon to
dril bsgrags/ rdzabardungs/ la mo dang sil snyan dkrol te/ kyi brgya stong nyid kyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol tung ngo// yul mi cha mas cad lam
gyi g.yas g.yonan khang bu brtsegs pa'i sten gnas mag ma 'dzums par lta zhing/ 'di'i byin dang gzi brjidi ni tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags so// de nas song song ba las/ mu lte ba
dag cag gis hrul po gyon zhing snod chag pa thegs te/ cung zad bslang ngo zhes 'bod pa dag don gyis thosanas/ de dag la khyed ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so// de la kha
cig na 'di skad du/ bdag cag la pha ma dang/ phunu dang/ bu smad dang/ gnyen bshes ma mchis par sdug go zhes zer ro// de la kha cig ni bdag cag yun ros sund kyis btab pas
rgyu mi sos te sdug ge zhes zer ro// de la kha cig na bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom pos bcom ste/ ca yang mi bdog pas slongs yo byad ces zer ro da/ ge don gyis de skad ces smras pa shes nas/
mchi ma dku ste song ngo// de nas yang pha zad cig na shan pa dag nug srog chags bsadanas pags pa bshu ba dang bsal gtub pa dag mthong ngo// dag don gyis a ma'o 'di dag ci byed ces dris
na bdag na ye mes brgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o zhes thor ro// de la dge don ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod par song ngo// de nas yang pha
zad phyin pa dang/ shing padag zhing rmos te/ nang rmos pat+ti shulan srin bu mang du byung ba la// bya mang po dang sbrul dag thu zhing za ba mthong nas/ 'di dag ni byed ces dris na/ bdag cag
