rol gyi maredapa la yide dga' ba dang/ pha rol gyi redapal yid dga' ba dang/ pha rol kyi dpaba'achadam byed pa dang/ 'alegasana mngon par dga' ban b.ruba'o// chos bcu bo de dag ni 'os spyod chen por 'gyur ba ste/las

za0 'din de ngas spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o/ de la shes rab 'chalapar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhen/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i tshes bcu ste/ btsugang zhen/ 'al gang brag dge sbyong dang/ bram ze mkhas pa
dang/ mkhas pa'i grangs sugatogs pa gang yin pa de dag gi gan du 'gro yang yongs su ma 'dri/ yongs su 'dri bar ma byed/ ma bstan/ mi bstan/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang/ 'chal pa'i shes rab can la
bstan cing bstan bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa gcod pa dang/ legs par bshad pa rnams yos su srong bdang/ nyes pa bshad pa rnams kun tu 'adzan pa dang/ dam pa'i chos m yin

ba yongs suston pa dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su spongab dang/ chos sgrub rnams la legs so zhes bya ba mi sbyin pa dang/ log par lta ba la bsngags par khyadapa dang/ yang dag par lta ba la skyod pa'o// chos
bcu po de dag nanga shes rab 'chal par 'gyur bsta/ las 'dinge shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'o/ de 'anga shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las gang zhan/ shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i chos bcu sta/
bcu gang zhen/ 'di la gang zag dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i grangs su gtogs pa gang yin pa de dag gi gan du 'gro sta yongs su 'dri zhing/ yongs su 'dri bar byed la bstan
cing bstan te bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams la ma bstun/ mi bstan/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang/
mkhas pa rnams lam 'jigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang/ legs par bshad pa rnams yongs sum sgreng ba dang/ nyes par bshad pa rnams yongs
su slong ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su ma sbyong ba dang/ dam pa 'chos ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang/
leg par lta ba la smod pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba la bsngags par byed pa'o// chos bcu po de dag shes rab chen por gyur ba ste/ las 'ani shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o//
de la sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i los gang zhe na/ soms can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i ches bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa chob
'a dang/ ngag gi nyes par sbyod pa che ba dang/ yid kyi nyes bar spyod pa che ba dang/ chad bor lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ med pa lta ba dang/ byed pa med par lta ba
dang/ byas pa gzo ba dngo/ mtshams med pa'i los la skur po 'debs pa dang/ log par lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni bcu pa'o// chos bcu po de d gnas ems/
can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ las 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'o// de la dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhan/ dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshes
0 bcu ste/ bcugang zhe na/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa 'bring dang/ ngag gnyes par spyod pa 'bring dang/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa 'bring dang/ 'dod chagasakyis kun nas bslang ba'i las
snatshogs dang/ zhe sdang se kun nas bslang ba'ishes sna tshogs dang/ gti tshug gse kun nas bslang ba'i las sna tshogs dang/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sbyin pa dang/ dman pa'i mong
gis gshe ba dang/ smon lam gyis 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ sanga'i 'i skyes pa'i rabs lta bu dang/ ngag gi nyes par spyod ngas 'gyur ba bram ze dbyar khrid spre'u'i skyes ba lta bu 'o//
chos bcu po de dag ni dud 'gror skya ba'agyur ba ste/[”]los 'di ni dud 'gror skya par 'gyur ba'o// de la ya dogs su skye bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ yi dgas su skyo ba'agyur ba'i
chos banu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ lus kyi nyes par spyod ba chung ba dang/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa chung ba dang/ yad kyi nyes par sdod pa chung ba dang/ chags pa dang/ yang bas
chags bang/ log par 'tsho ba dang/ sor skabyed ba dong/ sAn pa 'gog pa dang/ bkres shing sgom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang/ dngos po la chags bzhinadu 'chi ba'i
dus byed pa'o// chos bcu po de dgan lo degs su skya bar 'gyur bo ste/ las 'dane le diges su skye bar 'gyur ba'o// de la mare skye bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/ mare ste bar
'gyur ba'aches btsusta/ banu gang zhe na/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma bzhi par len pa dang [！ ]'dod pa 'ga'og par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phram
nga/ ngag rtsub bo dang/ tshig bkyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba ma dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag sbyong ba'o// chos bcu po de dag ni
mi de skyo bar 'gyur ba ste/ las 'di nemo'i skyo bar 'gyur ba'o// de la 'dod pa na stod pa'i lhar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'degs par/
sbyangs pa la mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ los 'a ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ltar skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ de la gzugasan stod pa'i ltar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
gyis legs par mnyam par gzhag pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i de ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te/ las 'di ni gzugs de spyod pa'i lhor skya bar 'gyur ba'o// gzugs med pa
spyod pa'i lor sku par 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las rnam pa thams cad du yang
dgo par 'dos ti/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub nas/ snatshogs kyi 'du shesa rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skya mched las rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par 'das nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shesamatha' yas skye
mchod nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skyamachod las rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par 'dus nas ci yang mdado zhes/ ci yong mod pa'i spyi mcho pa nye bar bsgrubs
te gnas pa dang 6 ci yang med pa'i skye mched las rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par 'dasazhas/ 'du shes med 'du shes mkhan mchod nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ las 'di
ni gzugs med pan spyod pa'i lhor bya bar 'gyur ba'o/ de la des bar skyo bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhen/ dge ba 'ales gang byas nas/ 'dis bdag 'di lta bu zhig tu skyo bar gyur cig ces
yongs su bsdob dang tshe/ mtshams med pa lta rnams te/ 'dan nges por skye bar 'gyur bko/ de la skye bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i las gang zhen/ dgo ba'i las gang byas nasacir
yang yongs su ma bsngo ba ste/ las 'di ni skye bar 'gyur bam nges pa'o// de la yul gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/ 'di'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las
gang byas pa yul gzhan du song nas rnam par smin par 'gyur ba ste/ dper na tshong pa mdza' bo'i bumo lta bu ste/ las 'di nogazhan du rnam par snyan par 'gyur ba'o// de la
byas la bsags pa ma yin pa'i las gang ldan/ las gang byas nas ngo tshab dang/ 'dzom pa dang 'gyod pa dang/ snod ba dang/ 'chags pa dang/ 'grol ba
[“” ]dang/ 'don pa dang/ song ba dang/ ma'ongs pa na sngon bar med bsta/ las 'ad de bas 'du bsags pa ma yin pa'o// de la bsags la mkhas pa'i las gang zhin/ las gang
[à ]lus kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba de sems kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas shing/ chog tu yang las 'di bya'o zhes smras l de ma byas pa ste/ 'dus 'di na bsags la ma byas
pa'o// de la bsal bsags pa'i las gang zhen/ las gang byas nas ngo mtshib dang/ mi 'dzin pa dang/ mi 'gyod pa dang/ mi smod pa dang/ mi'achags pa dang/ mi
'thol ba dang/ ma 'dor ba dang/ mi spong ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa na ston par ma byed pa ste/ las 'di na byesal bsags pa'o// de lam lus lam bsags pa'i las gang
tsan+d+ho nu/ las gang ched du ma bsags par byas pa ste/ las 'di ni ma byas la ma bsags pa'o/ de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/
sems can dmyal ba pa'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa sa zad par byas nas 'chi 'pho ba'i les gang zhan/ 'di la gang zag 'ga'azhig gis sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
bsags par gyural/ de las des ngo ma tshe pa dang/ ma 'dzom pa dang/ ma 'gyod pa dang/ ma skyed pa dang ma 'chags ba dang/ ma 'brel ba dang/ ma'odor ba dang/ mi slob
dang/ mge shung ba dang/ smod par ma byed pa dang/ yang gnod par bya'o zhes shar gnyer ba tshol bas/ dpal na lha sbyin lta bu 'o// 'dan las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sems
can dmyal ba rnams su skyes to/ sems can dmyal ba pa'itsho yongs su rdzogs bar zad par byas nas 'chi'i pho kha'i losaso// de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sems can
ngagul khams su skyes te/ sems can dmyal ba'atsho byed bod bar btsan 'cha'i tho ba'i las gang zhe na/ 'di la gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ba'i las
byas nas ngo tsha ba dang/ 'jim pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ smod pa dang/ 'chags pa dang/ 'thol ba dang/ 'dor ba dang/ spong ba dang/ ma 'ongs ba na sdom par byed pa ste/
'dono les gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i phud zad par byas nas 'chi 'pho ba'i 'os so// de la las gang dang ldan
na/ gang thag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes ma thag tu 'chi'i lo lo'i 'os gang zhen/ 'di la gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
bsags par gyur la/ de las de bsapas nago tsha ba dang/ 'dzem pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ snodapa dang/ 'chags pa dang/ 'thol ba dang/ 'dor ba dang/ spong ba dang
de shin tu yid la gcags pa yin yang yid la gcags pa des las de sel bar ma nus pa ste/ dper na rgyal pom skyes dgras pha bsad pa lta bu 'o// de skad du/ shin tu mi bzad las rnams
t+tA byas pa na// bdag la smod dang ra da tu bshags pa dang// sdom par byed pas de dag bsrabs 'gyur gyi// shin tu rtsa nas phyir ces ma sA'o// zhes gsungs so// 'di na les gang
dang ldan na/ gang zag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes ma thag tu 'ama'eba'i saso// de laM las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sngabade bar gyur la/ phyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
ba'i las gang zhe na/ 'di la gang zag 'ga'azhag sbyin pa sbyan ban/ yade rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes la khyon nas 'gyod pa yin te/ gang zag de gang gi
marnyemasakyi nang du skya ba na phyug pa dang/ no che ba dang/ longs spyod tshab dang/ nor dang lo khyad mang ba dang/ bongag dbang bamang ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ nye du
dang/ snag gi gnyomatshimasamang ba dang/ mdzodadang bang ba longs su gang ba'i khyi/ rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ khyim de lta bu dag tu skyes nas shin tu skyidel/ bzhon pa la zhenazhing
bde bar spyod la/ de'i longs sbyod de dag phyis longs su nyams shing yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ de'i gzhis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'dane les gang dang ldan na/ gang zag
sngar bde bor 'gyur la/ byaso sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i 'os so///las rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba bam po gnyisopa ste tha ma'o//
de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang thog sngar sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ phyis bde bar 'gyur ba'i las gabazhin/ 'di la gang zag 'ga' zhag sbyin pa sbyin pa na sdug bsngal bar 'jug cing/
sdug bsngal bar sbyin pa byin nas name'agyod par gyur cing/ ga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pa mAni ti/ gang zag de gang gi tshe ma nems kyi nang du skyob na ( dbul po bza' ba dang/ btung ba
dang/ kha zas nyung ba sdug bsal bas 'tsho ba'akhyome rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba sta/ der sdug bsngal bar bza' ba dang bgo ba redal/ des ma 'gras su gyur pa dang/ longs/
spyod de dag 'phel zhing skyo bar 'gyur ba ste 'di ni 'is/ ngo dang ldan nA/ gang zag sngar sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ phyis bde bar 'gyur ba'iles so// dol las gang dang ldan
ni gang zag sngar yang bde bar gyur la/ phyis kyang bde bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhen/ 'od 'ogang zaga'aga' zhig sbyin pa sbyin pan8 mde dga' bzhin du byin te dga' ba dang
mde bde ba skyes nas/ byin nas kyang ma 'gyod pa yin te/ gang zag de gang gi tshe man+d+hems kyi nang du skye ba na phyug pa dang/ nos che ba dang/ langs stong che ba dang/
nor dang yo byad mang ba dang/ bdag dbang bamang ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ nye dudang/ snag ga gnyen mtshamasamang ba dang/ mdzod dang bang ba yongs su gang ba'i khyim
rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ khyim de lta bu dgag tu skyes nas shin tu skyidal/ bzhon pa la zhen zhing bde bar sbyod la/ de'a'ongs spyod de dag phyis kyang 'pha' ba ste/ 'di ni re sa/
gang dang ldanon/ gong zag sngar yang bde bar gyur la/ phyis kyang bodi bar 'gyur ba'i las so// de la las gang dang ldan na/ gong zag sngar yang sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ phyi'i
kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i las gang nan/ 'di la gang zag 'ga'azhage ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur te/ de sus kyang sbyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa yani/
des kyang sbyin pa ci yong mo byin pa yin/ des dag ba'i 'os kyang ci yang ma byas shingem bsags pa yin te/ gang zag de gang gi tsho ma rnams kyin du skya pan dbul po bza' ba dang/ btung ba
dang/ kha zas nyung ba/ sdug bsngal bas 'tsho ba'i khyim rnams su skyo bar 'gyur te/ deder skyes nas sdug bsngal khar bza' ba dang bgo ba rnyed par ma 'gyur la/ de'i longs spyod de dag
phyis kyang mi 'phel kha ste/ 'di ni las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sngar yang sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ phyis kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i las so// de la las gang dang ldan na/
gang zag phyug por gyur la/ gtong ba dang ldan pa'i las gang zhen/ 'al song zag 'ga' zhig gis snod bzang po gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa dpagatumed pa byin pa yin/ des gtong
ba goms khor byas paM lan te/ des bsod nams dag bsgoms pas phyug por 'gyur/ gtong ba bsgoms pas gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'danalas gang dang ldan na/ gang
zag phyug por gyural/ gtong ba dang ldan pa'i lasaso// del las gong dang ldan naM/ gang zag phyug por gyur la/ ser sna can du 'gyur ba'i las gang zhan/ 'di'i gang zag 'ga' zhig
gis snod du gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa cung zad tsam byin pa yin gyi de gtong ba la cher goms par ma byas pa yin ti/ gang zag de ga tshoma'anang du skyo ban phyug pa dang/ nor ched dang//
longs spyod chab dang/ nor dong yo khyad mang ba dang/ bdag dbang bam bzhems su skye bar 'gyurato/ snod bzang po rnams la phul bsan skyod pa 'gyur/ gtong ba la goms pas
byas pa son ser sna can du 'gyur to/ 'deni les gang dang ldan na/ gang zag phyug por gyur la/ so snacan du 'gyur ba'i las so// de la lasaM gang dang ldan na/ gang phrag
[@]// dbul por gyur la/ gtong ba dang ldan pa 'gyur ba'i las ga zhen/ 'alegang zag 'galazhig gis snod du gyur pa ma yin pa rnams la sbyin pa mang du bde ba yin te//
de 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tsho bsod nams de dag yongs su nyams shing yongs su zad par 'gyur/ gtong ba'i rgyu yang phu phye zhing bsgoms pa lane ti/ de bsod nams yongs su thad pa'i phyi'i dbul
por 'gyur/ sngon goms par byas pas gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'ad delis gang dang ldan na/ gang thag dbul bor gyural/ gtong pa dang ldan pa'i 'os so// de la las gang
dang ldan na/ gang zag dbul por gyur la/ sar sna can du 'gyur ba'i las gabazhin/ 'di 'gang zag 'ga' zhig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur te/ de sus kyang sbyin pa/
yang dag bar 'dzin dum bcug pa yino/ des kyang sbyin par yong ma btang ba lan/ sdige pa'i las kyang ma byas shing ma bsags pa yanete/ gang zag de gang gi tshe mnems kyi nang du skyo ban
[% ]dbul po bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kho zas nyung ba/ sdug bsngal ba sdug bsngal bas 'tsho ba'i khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de de na sdug bsngal bar bza' ba dang bgo ba nod par
'gyur ro// gtong ba ma bsgoms pas dbul zhing ser sna can du 'gyur te/[“]'di ni las gang dang ldan/ gang zag dbul bor gyur la/ ser sna can du 'gyur ba'ilas so// de la
0 las gang dang ldan n ( gang zag lus bde bar gyur la/ sems kyis ma 'a/napa'i las gang zhin/ bsod nams byas pa'i so so'i skye bo ste/ dpan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/
lta bu ste/ gang zag 'di'i lus bde bar gyur la/ sems kyisom yin pa'o// del las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag sems bdo bar gyur la/ lus kyisem yin pa'i las gang
zhon/ bsod nams ma byas pa'i degra bcom pa ste/ bar na gnas brtan l kun tsikalta bu ste/ gang brag 'di'i sems bde ba gyural/ lus kyisem ldan pa'o// de la
lus kyang bde la sems kyang bde ba'i gang zag gang zhen/ bsod nams byas pa'i dgra bcom ste/ bar n gnas brtan shab lo lta bu ste/ gang zag 'dane lus kyang bde
la/ sems kyang bde ba'o// del lus kyang mi bdel/ sams kyang ma bod pa'i geng zag gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ bsod namasam byas pa'i so so'askyo bo ste/ gang zag 'ani/
lus kyang g ba de la/ sems kyang mi bde ba'o// de la gang zag gang gi zad par gyur la/ las ma zad pa gang zhin/ gang zag gang sems can dmulo bzhag sha 'i phos la///
sems can dmyalabar skye ba dang/ dud 'gronas shi 'phos la/ dud 'gror skye ba dang/ la dgas las nga shi 'bosal/ yi dgas su skyo ba dang/ lhalasashi 'phos la/ lhar
thubya/ sa pa dang/ ma las sha 'thos la/ ma'i skyo ba ste/ gang zag 'di tsho zad par gyur la las ma zad pa'o// de' gang khrag gang ga'i sazad par gyural/ tshe
[}]mkhyad pa'i gang zag gang zhin/ gang zag gang sngar bde ba gyur la/ phyisosdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang/ sngar sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ phyis bde bar gyur pa ste/ gang brag de na las
zad par gyur la/ tsham zad pa'o// de la gang zag gang gi las kyang bdalo/ tshe yang srid pa'i gang zag gang zhin/ gang zog gang sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te/ dung
[– ]'gror skye ba dang/ dud 'gro nas shi 'phos te/ yi dgas su skye ba dang/ yags las shi 'phos te/ lham yin gyi nang du skye ba dang/ lhag yin las sha'aphos te/ me nang du skya ba
dang/ mi 'os shi 'phos na/ lha'inang du skyab ste/ gang zag de tsho yang zad la/ las kyang bad pa'o// de la gang zag gang tshe langamu zad cing/ las kyang ma zad la/ de'i
nyon mongs pa rnams zad pa'i gang zag gang zhe na/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa ste/ gang zag de na tshe yang ma zad cing/ las/
kyang g zad la/ de'i nyon mongs pa rnams zad pa yani// de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang brag ngan seng rnams su skyes la/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/ blta na/
sdug pa dang/ mdog snam ba dang/ bags pa snam pa dang/ mge tu sdug par 'gyur ba'i las gang zhen/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i ngang tshul ngan pa ste/ 'di'i las gang dang
ldanon/ gang thag ngan song rnams su skyes la/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ bstan sdug pa dang/ mdzes pa dang/ mdog snum pa dang/ bags pa snum pa dang/ mig tu sdug pa/
'gyur ba'i las so// de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag ngan song rnams su skyes la/ mdogam sdug pa dang/ lus rtsub po dang/ blta ba dang ma mthun par 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/
zhe sdang gis kun nas bslang ba'i deng tshul ngan pa ste/ 'di'i las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag ngan song rnams su skyes l/ mdogami sdug pa dang/ lus rtsub pa dang/ bltanam sdig pa dang/
bltab dang mi mthun par 'gyur ba'i 'os so// de la las gang dang ldan na/ gang zag ngan song rnams su skyes l/ drame zheme ba dang/ u0f38khang po ma gsal ba dang/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur
ba'i las gang zhon/ gti mug gis kun nas bslang ba'i ngang tshul ngan pa ste/ 'di ni les gang dang ldan na/ gang zag ngan song rnams su skyes la/ dri ma zhim pa dang/ dbang po
ma gsal ba dang/ dbang po ma bor 'gyur ba'i lasaso// de la ma dgab bcu'i lasakyi lam 'di dag mang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus pha rel gyi dngos po bcu chud par snang ba gangazhin//
srog gcod pa rnamakhar sminar san/ sa'amathu yongs su nyams par 'gyur 'o// ma nipalen kha'i nemakhar smin pas// sar ba dang/ bya ba dang/
ma srin dang/ mu ge la sogs pa'i byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'dod pa la 'ag par g.yem pa'i rnam par smini bsan/ btsa' dang/ sa 'bab pa dang/ rdul dang/ rlung dang/ chor drag po 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// brdzun du skya pa'i rnam par smin bsani/ dri ma zhim par 'gyur ro// phrama'i rnam par smin pas// mtho dman dang/ ngam grog dang/ 'dam rdzob dang/ g.yang sa dang
ldag ldog dang/ ngan skyugs kyi ljan ljin 'byung bar 'gyu'o/ ngag rtsub pa'i rnam par smanebasazhi/ 'bras bu ngan pa dang/ regatug bzod pa dang gsog ma dang/ gyo me dang//
tsher mtshang tshong dag 'byung bar 'gyuralo tshig bkyal pa'i rnam par smin pasazhi/ rtswatshang tshang dang/ nags thibs po dang/ 'khri shinge tsher ma tshang tshang can dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
brnab sems kyi rnam por sman bsan/ lo tog la sogs pa 'bras bu nyung du 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sems kyi rnamapar sman bsan/ 'bras bu dang/ saM bon tsha ba dang/ kha
ba'abyung bar 'gyur ro// log pa lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus/ 'bras bu yod pa dang nyung ba'i sa bon 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di deg yang dag
[p]]bar blangs pa'i rgyus phyi rol gyi dngos po bcu rgud par snang ngo/ dge ba banu'i las kyi ma rnams lang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus phyi la gyi de ngos po bcu phun sumatshogs par snang te/ bcu
grangazhen/ srog gcod pa sangs pa rnam por sman pas na/ sa'i mthu med par ma 'gyur ro// ma byin par len ba sbongs pa'i rnam par smin pas nai/ sor ba dang/ bye bo dang//
srin dang/ mu ge la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyu'o// 'dod pa la 'ag par g.yem pa spongs pa'i rnam par smin pas nai/ btsa' dang/ sa 'bab pa dang/ rdul dang/ rlung dang//
char drag po 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba rnam par spangs pa'i rnam par smin pas// drami zhim pa 'byung bar ma'agyur ro// phra ma spangs pa'i snem rar sman pason/ ngas
grog dang g.yang sa dang/ 'dam rdzob dang / lcag lcag dang/ ngan skyags kyi ljon ldan dang/ dong rnams 'byong bar ma 'gyur 'a/ ngag sgrub pa sbyang sa'i rnam par smin pas
ni/ gsag mdang/ gyo me dang/ gyo dum gyis reg pa 'byung bar ma'i gyur ro// tshag bkyal pa spangs pa'i rnam par smin pas na/ rtswatshang tshi dang/ nags thibs po dang/ tshor
ma tshang tshang rnams 'byung bar ma'agyur ro// brnab sems spangs pa'i nem par smin pas// lo tog la sogs pa 'bras bu dang bcas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gnod sems spangs
khanum khar smin pas naA/ legs pa dang/ 'bras bu dang/ sa bon khe ba dang/ mtshebanams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// log par lta ba spangs pa'i snom par/
smin pas na/ 'bras bu med pa dachung ba ma yin pa'i sa bon rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bcu po'od des yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus phyi rol gyi dngos po
bcu bo 'di ga phun sumatshogs par snang ngo// bram ze'i khye'usrog gcod pa'i nyes dmigs bcu po 'di dag go par bste/ bcu gang zhen/ shor gnyer ba mang ba dang/
mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba dang/ sdig pa rnams sams pa dang/ de'asems can mas 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma khedi bzhin nyala'ang ma bed bzhanasod pa dang/ sdig pa can
gyasne lem ba dang/ rnags te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba dang/ 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang/ tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i los byed cing sogs ba dang/ lus dang bralanas shaba'o
kheg tu ngan song ngan 'growog par ltung ba sems can dma'o ba rnams su skye bar 'gyura'o// ma byin par len pa la nyes dmigs banu'age par bya ste/ bcu gangazhin/ khen
gnugs su 'gyur ba dang/ degaso par 'gyur ba dang/ dusam lon par sgrub dang/ dgongasakar sgrub dang/ sdug pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen/
[z/]gyis rnam par spangs pa dang/ ngang tshul don pa dang/ rgyalapo'i gnod pa dang/ chad pa'i gnod pa 'byung ba dang/ longs srod kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byed rung sogs pa dang/
lus dang bral nas sha khe'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dma' rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa lolog par ga le ma laskos dmigs banur 'go bar bya ste/
bcu gabazhin/ gang dag gi chung mal nyal po byed pa de dag ri la glags 'tshol bar 'gyur ba dang/ de'atshungam dartsod par 'gyur ba dang/ dge mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/
de'ige ba'i chos yongs su 'grub cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ba dang/ bdag ma sbes shing ma bsrungs pa dang/ de'i bu dang/ chung ma dang/ nor rnams ma sbas shang ma bsrungs pa dang/
dgas par 'gyur ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ 'du dang/ snagakha genyin matshamasa rnams yade'i rton pa dang/ byi ba byed ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i las khyad cing sogs
ba dang/ lus dang bralanas sha po'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gror rnam par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ brdzun du snub la nyes dmigs bcur rig par bya ste/
banu gang zhin/ nga kha mnam par 'gyur ba dang/ de'ilus las lho rnams m 'phangs pa dang/ mame yon po rnams kyis de la glags red par 'gyur ba dang/ bden pa smos kyang
de la gu lang 'dems pa'i m 'gyur ba dang/ brdzun sgrub 'gyur ba dang/ yid ches par bya ba'i gnas rnams su mkhas ba rnams de la drir bya ba la sems pa dang//
de'i bden pa ma yin pa'i bsngags pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ sgadang/ tshigs su bcad pam yin pa 'byung ba dang/ gzung ba'i tshig tu ma 'gyur ba dang/ skur pa 'debs par 'gyur
ba'i los byed cing sogs pa dang/ lus dang bral nas sha ba'i 'og tungan song ngan 'gro leg par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skya ba'o// 'bru dang 'bros bu'i chang bag med pa'i/
gnas la nyes dmigs sum cu rtsa drug tu ragi bar pa sta/ sumanu rtsa drug gang zhen/ tshe 'dale nor srid pa dang/ nad kyigazhire'agyur ba dang/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ rtsod pa
'phel ba dang/ gsang ba'i gnasaMston pa dang/ shes rab nyams por byed pa dang/ mthob pa'i longs sbyodacha masam thob pa dang/ longs sbyod thob pa rnams las yongs su nyams
par 'gyur ba dang/ gsang rdol bar 'gyur ba dang/ las kyi mthu'u rnams longs su nyams pa dang/ myungan gyi rtswa bar 'gyur ba dang/ nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ mar mi shes par
'gyur ba dang/ par shes bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge sbyong du ma shes par 'gyur ba dang/ bram zer mi shes par 'gyur ba dang/ rigs kyi gotso gol 'am gri med par 'gyur ba dang/
sangs rgyas la gus bar ma'agyur ba dang/ chos la gus ba 'gyur ba dang/ dge 'dun la gus pa'i m 'gyur ba dang/ sdig pa'i grogs pos longs su zin par 'gyur ba dang/ ge/
pa'i khoshes gnyen gyis rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ ngo sod pa 'gyur ba dang/ 'dzem pamadabar 'gyur ba dang/ dbang po'i sgom bsdams pa 'gyur ba dang/ bungamed rnams lashin tu
bag med par 'gyur ba dang/ spyi bo mang po'i yid du ma ro bar 'gyur ba dang/ skye bo mang bo dang mumathun pa dang/ nye du dang snag gi gnyena mtshams btsun pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba
dang/ dam pa'i tshesam lan ba las su'adzinib dang/ dam pa'i chos longs su sbas pa dang/ yid ches bar bya ba'i gnas su mu khas pa rnams kyis de gzhag par mi bsam pa dang/ bag med
pas yal ba dang/ de la ngan las 'das pa'ong bar 'gyur ba dang/ myos par 'gyur ba dang myos par 'gyur ba'i las byed cing sogs pa dang/ lus dang bral nas shi kha'i 'og tu
na song na 'gro sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba'o// bram ze'i khye'ude bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtenalaMthal mo sbyar ba'i yon 'gan bcu bo 'di dag sta/ bcu gang zhe na/ rgyu
chen po'i khyim du skye ba 'thob pa dang/ rgyatshaba'i gi thugs dang/ rgya che ba'i g.yog 'khor dang/ rgya chab 'i mechod pa dang bkur sti dang/ rgya che ba'anor dang/ rgyatshaba'i thos pa dang//
rgya che ba'adedub dang/ rgyaba' dren pa dang/ rgya che ba'i shes rab dang/ rgya ba'i rtogs pa thob ba sta/ bcu po de dgan de bzhin gshegs pa'imachod rten la thal mo sbyar
ba'i phan yono// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshochod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i phan yon banu ste/ bcug zhan/ gzugs bzang sta mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ mdzes
te mag tu sdug par 'gyur ba dang/ skad snyan cingagazung ba'atshagatu'agyur ba dang/ bgatsha ba med par 'khor gyaneng du 'gro ba dang/ lha dang ma rnams dga' khar 'gyur ba dang/ gzape/
chen por 'gyur ba dang/ gzi brjiden kho'i ngazag 'di ltasta/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kya nyen thos rnams dang
'a 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po 'di deganadi bzhin gshegs
ba'amechod rtenal phyag 'tshal ba'i phan yon no// de bzhinagshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyags pa'i phan yon banusta/ bcu gabazhin/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ bltan sdug par
'gyur ba dang/ mdzes par 'gyur ba dang/ skad snyan par 'gyur ba dang/ de'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtamu srab par 'gyur ba dang/ lam du 'gron rtsa ba dang/ gsagam
nga/ gyom mas med par 'gyur ba dang/ btsun pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan/
las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dgan de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchodarten la phyogs pa'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs bamechod rten la gdugs phul ba'i phan yon bsu ste/ bcu
gangazhen/ 'jige rtenan gdugs lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ lus la gdung ba med par 'gyur ba dang/ sams la gdung ba med par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang/ bdag
bor 'gyur ba'i las byed tshang sogs ba dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yang dang yong 'thob pa dang/ dbang cho bar grags par 'gyur pa dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho
ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu bo 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtenalagadugs phul ba'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs
ba'i mechod rten la drile khu phulakha'ican lan bdu sto/ banu gang zhen/ gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ba dang/ sgra snyan par 'gyur ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba smra ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang//
kal bang ka'i sgra lta bur sgrub dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ gzung ba'i tshig tu 'gyur ba dang/ rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ kun tu dga' ba'i rgya chen po'i skye 'thob pa dang/ 'khongs
ka@#// spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho'asisu skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du longs su mungan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kachod rten la/
dril bu dbul ba'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la padan dbul ba'i phan len bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'jig rtenan rgyal mtshan lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ mdza' bshes
dang/ blon po dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyenA mtshams rnams kyis bsasteng du byed/ bla mar byed/ ramer byed/ mchodapar byed pa dang/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de'i
grags pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ sgo dang/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon du 'byung ba dang/ gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes par 'gyur ba dang/ skya ba gzhan rnams su tshe ring zhing ro'i

ba dang/ myag du yongs su mya ngan las 'dabasta/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i echod rten la ba dan phul ba'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la
gos phul ba'i nyen yonabcu gnyisote/ bcu gnyis gang na/ mdzes shing bltan sdug par 'gyur ba dang/ pags pa 'jam po dang/ pags pa snam pa dang/ pags pa
0 srab pa dang/ de'i lus la rdul dang dri mam chegs pa dang/ de'i gos bzang por 'gyur ba dang/ gding ba dang bgo ba phramo rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel med pa phun sum
tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod cha ra'agyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste

dang/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshamasa rnams su de'atshul khrims kyi dro'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur po dang/ 'jigarten gyis mngon du 'grobar bya ba'agyur ba dang/ sdug po'i chos rnams
'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dgon de bzhin gshegs

kya/ ba dang/ lus kyi dri nga ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang/ phyogs dang phyogs rnams su tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i nged ldang ba dang/ rtag tu dri zhim par 'gyur
ba dang/ brgyan par 'gyur ba dang/ g.yog 'khor me da par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyas pa dang bdamad rnams kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang/ langs stod cha par 'gyur badrang/ mtho
ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya nganalasa'adu' bste/ bcu po de dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'phreng ba phul ba'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs/
pa'i machod rten la moram phul ba'i phan yonakhanusto/ bcugabashan/ 'jigetonan mar me lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ sha'i ge rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang/ lha'i mog 'theb par
'gyur ba dang/ dag pa dang ma dge ba'i chos rnams la shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ marig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa sal pa dang/ shes rab kyi snang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ de
'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe nam du yang mun pa na gnas bar ma'agyur ba dang/ longs spyodachab r 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skyo bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bsta/
bcu bo de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten lamar ma phul ba'i phan yonano// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la sos phul ba'i phan yon bcu sta/ bcu ga zhen/ 'jige/
rtagan spos lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ sna'i dbang po rnam par dag por 'gyur ba dang/ lus kyi dromazhim pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu drizhom par 'gyur ba dang/ gzugs bzang
ba 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten gyis mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ sdug kha'ichos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba
dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngana' sa 'da' bsti/ bcu po de dgan de bzhin gshegs pa'imachod rten la spos phul ba'i phan yon no// de bzhin gshegs ba'i mchod rten lo rel mo so'i
snyan phul lo'i phan yon bcu ste/ banu gang zhon/ gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug par 'gyur ba dang/ skad snyan par 'gyur ba dang/ yid du 'ong bar smra ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/

bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du longs su mngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dgan de bzhin gshegs pa'i machod rten la'ol mo sale snyan phul ba'i
phan lonano// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byed pa'i phan yon bco brgyad de/ bco brgyad gang zhen/ rgya chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ba thob pa dang/ gzugs bzang bar
'gyur ba dang/ mdzes shing ma tu sdug par 'gyur ba dang/ dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ba dang/ g.yog 'khor chen por 'gyur ba dang/ g.yog 'khor ma
phyud par 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mngon du 'gro bar bya bar 'gyur ba dang/ rten du 'gyur ba dang/ phyogs bcur brjod pa dang/ sladang tshigs su bcad pa rgya

dang/ tshe dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ lus rdo rje'i tshogs ltar 'gyur ba dang/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ba dang/ mtho risis skyo bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du longs
su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byed pa'i phan yon no/ khri stanasbyin pa'i phan yon bcu sta/ bcu gang zhon/ 'jig rten gyi glu
ma'i gnas su 'gyur ba dang/ bsngags par 'gyur ba dang/ skya bo mang po la grags pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ sbradang/ tshigs su bcad pa mang po mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ba
dang/ bde ba dang yade bde ba medabare'agyur ba dang/ bzhon pa dang/ khri stan dang/ me gro byed pa dngami ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang/ 'jigerten gyis mngon du 'gro bar byakhar

de dgan khri sten sbyin pa'i na len no// lhag phyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhon pa rnams kyis brel bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ rkang pa legs par gnas pa
'gyur ba dang/ lam du 'gron stobs dang ldan bor 'gyur ba dang/ de'i lus ngal bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ de 'gron tshor ma dang/ gsag ma dang/ gyo ma rnams kyis nad pa
snad pa ma 'gyur ba dang/ rdzu 'thul thob par 'gyur ba dang/ de 'am gro byed pa dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba
dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag na lham sbyin pa'i phan yon no/ stod spen pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'jig rton gyi yon tan
gyi snod lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ mdog snum par 'gyur ba dang/ sams kyis rgyud mnyen par 'gyur ba dang/ skom par ma 'gyur ba dang/ sgom na yang chu 'byung bar 'gyur ba
dang/ yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang mnems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ las spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dngo/ myur du yongs
'a@#// su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ banu bo de dgan snyid spen pa'i len yon no// kha zas sbyin pa'i phan yon banu ste/ banu gang zhen/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang//
kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ stobs da ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ dran pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ bgatshab med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba dang/
'khor 'dun par 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang marjems 'dunu'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho sa su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su
mya ngan las 'da' bsto/ bcu po de dag ni kha zas sbyin pa'i phan yon ko/ bzhinapa sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gabazhin/ rkang pa yon tu gzhon par 'gyur ba dang/ rkangangashano
tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ rkang pas 'gro na lus ngalabaram 'gyur ba dang/ bde bor 'gyur ba dang/ mi mdza' ba mang bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya chen po 'thob
par 'gyur ba dang/ bzhon pa rnams kyis khral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ ma gro byed pa dang maldan bar m 'gyur ba dang/ mtho rasisu skya bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya
na las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dgan bzhon pa sbyin pa'i phan yon no// gnas sbyin pa phan yon rab tu mang ste/ mang po gangazhin/ de la 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// gdang

ka ba dang bgo ba shin tu'ajam po rnyed par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod ba'i phan yon lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de ma la kye ma bdag rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim du
skya bar gyur cig ca'am/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim du skye ba gyur cige se 'am/ khyim bdag shang sA lachen po lta bu'i khyim du skye bar gyur nug can/ de'i smon pa de
'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod d kyim bdag grong gi gtso bor gyur cig/se 'am/ grong khyer gyi gtso bor gyur cig ca'am/ grong rdal gyi gtso bor gyur cig ce 'am/ ri dwags kyi rgyal bor
gyur cig ce 'am/ rgyal phran du gyur nug ca'am/ rgyal po btsan bar gyur cigace 'am/ de'i smon pa de de bzhin du 'grub bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de glang gcig gi rgyal bor gyur
cig ce'am/ gling gnyis kyi rgyal por gyur cig ce 'am/ gling gsum skye 'bo gyur cigace 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal por gyur cige can/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro//
gal te 'dod de rgyal chen bzhi'i 'os kyi lto rnams dang skal khamanyam par skyo bar gyur cig can/ 'i smon pa de 'grubo ba'agyu//sumacu rtso gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan
dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cige chen/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de ma la kyag
nubya// bdag tshangasaras kyi lha rnams dang skal khamanyamapa gyur cig can/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang/ tshangs chen dang/
'od chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshod med dge dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sngonamid dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ ma
chab dang/ ma gdung ba dang/ gya nom snang dang/ legs par mthong dang/ 'og megyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur tsag can/ de'i smin pa de 'grub par 'gyur//
gal te 'dod de nam mkha'amatha' las su mched kyi 'du shes sa lte bar 'gro ba rnams dang/ rnam shes mthu' yas mchod kyi 'o shesasu nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang/ su yang med
ba'i skyamachod kyi 'du shes su te bar 'gro bo rnams dang/ 'dushes med 'du shes med mnekyi snyemachad kyi 'du shes su rtobar 'grola'i lho rnams dang skal ba mnyam par gyur cig can/
do'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyu'o// gal te 'dod de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya'o zhin/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod di lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'akhebras bu dang/ phyi mo 'ing ba'i 'bras bu dang/ [“]dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang/ rang byang chub mngon du bya'o zhin/ de' smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te
[s ]'dod de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cigecan/ la sgen ba de'agrub par 'gyur te/ mang po de dban genas skrun pa'i phan yonan//
skom sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ banu gang zhen/ dbang po thams cad yongasasu tshang bar 'gyur ba dang/ dpral ba dag cing 'dzum pa'i bozhin du 'gyur ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan par
'gyur ba dang/ sems kyi rgyudaman par 'gyur ba dang/ skom par ma 'gyur ba dang/ skoman yang chu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ ya degs su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ langs sdod
cha bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni skom sbyin pa'i phen lonAno// rab tu 'byung ba'i phan yon bsu
sto bcu gang zhen/ nge budang/ chung ma dang/ nor la srod pa'i m 'gyur ba dang/ de'adod pa longs su 'dzin pa mi 'gyur ba dngo/ dgon par gnas pa' dge 'a b.red pa dang/
sangs rgyas la gus bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdud kyi spyod yula rnam par spong ba dang/ bde 'gro thob par byed ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'tshol ba dang/ ngan 'gro thob par byed pa'i chos
rnams rnam par sbyong ba dang/ lha dang ma'i smon par byed pa dang/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur
[p]@#// du longs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni rab tu 'byung ba'i ban lon no/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ banugang zhen/ 'du 'dzi rnam
[“” ]par slong ba dang/ rab tu dban pa la brten pa dang/ de'i sams bsam gtan la dmigs par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la smon pa dang/ dga' ba dang//
bad pa dang/ yid bde ba lus la skyod pa dang/ de la bar du gcod bam 'byung ba dang/ ltar thos ba'i chos rnams kyi donargya cheshes par 'gyur ba dang/ zhi gnas thob pa dang/ lhag
mthong thob pa ste/ bcu po de dag ni dgon pa la gnas pa'i phan yon no// bsod snyegs pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhan/ de 'gro ba la goms par 'gyur ba dang/ de spyod yul la
goms bag 'gyur ba dang/ de nga rgyal bcom par 'gyur ba dang/ bdag rnyed pa la sbyor bar ng/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams la rab tu 'god pa dang/ ston pa'i bstan pa longs su ston pa
dang/ me'iskya bo la snang bar byas par 'gyur ba dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod po rnams la nyam nga ba med par byas bar 'gyur ba dang/ dma' ba'i sems nye bar gzhug par 'gyur ba dang/
bsod snyoms kyis yongs su dul ba'i dag slong phyogs la mun pa mad par snang ba'o// 'jigs pa med pa'i phan yon bcu sta/ banug bzhen/ 'jages ba med pa'i grong du 'jug pa dang//
'ges pamed par gron gnas 'byung ba dang/ 'gis bzhed pa'i khyile rnams su 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs ba med par kha khor la chos ston pa dang/ 'jiges bsad bar dge 'dun gyi steng du 'jug
ba dang/ 'jigs pa med por slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs ba med par byams pa'i sems kyis slobama'i gan du 'gro ba dang/ 'gasapa mad par gos dang/
zas dang/ malachadang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yakhyod rnams yongs su sbyor ba dang/ 'jiges pamed par kha ton 'don pa dang/ 'gis pamed par 'chi ba'i dus byed ba'o/
bram ze'i khye'u deltar na sems can rnams na las bdag gir 'gyur ba/ las kyi skyo gnas can/ las kyi bgo skal la spyodang/ las la rton pa ste/ sems can rnams 'is
kyis btsun pa dang/ dma' ba dang/ dgun pa dang/ bzang po'i rnam bar phu'o zhos das gang smras pa de lasa'adalas bsoms te smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
bshad pan to'u ta la'i khu bram ze'i khye'u natso/ bcom ldan 'das la samasa mngon par dad do// de nas to'u te la 'bu bram ze'i khye'unatsos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// go'u ta ma khyod mnyan du yod par dge bsnyen gyi khami dag tu gshegs par dgongs pa ltan/ de ltar to'u te la'i khyim du yang gshegs par dgongs su gsol/ des
to'u ta ma'i khyon du kun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang ma gsung bas to'u tu pa'i bu bram ze'i khyo'u
na tso la gnang ba mdzad do// de nas to'u to la'i bu bram ze'i khye'un pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mgosung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa laman
bar dga' ste rjes su mi 'ong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas song ngo// las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin si tre dang/ dAn khe
dang/ mun khrilam dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhusanas gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar Nadra
b+ha sod tu ma sU trenadrarA dzanAmamahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsir 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amedo// bam po dang po/
ka 'das pa dang/ mon pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ bdachub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos thams cud la
phyag 'tsha' go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gan/ bya rgod pa ri chos kyi dbyings// zab mosangs rgyas spyod yulan// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas// dag
[m]cing rdola rnamasumed pa la// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams l// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste// mdog naganatu zab pa dang/ gangs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gsar
'od dam pa 'da'achad do// phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// byin gyi rlabs kyis bya'ibarlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogasasu// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs
su 'od dpal mad kyisanub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis na phreng phyogs su/ sdig pa thams cad gzhig ba'i phyire/ bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sngage ba'i las rnams zad byed
ba bde pu thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'ag byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis legs brgyan pa// byin gyi rlabs de brjod
par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshazad pa dang tshe nyams dang// phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang// lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang// mdza' sdug skye bo sdang
ba dang// khram ze lasogs gtses pa dang// phan tshun mthun lam yan dang// nor 'gribasab dang gnod pa dang// mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang// 'jigs pa dang na phongs pa dang//
gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang// mi bzad gdon gyis rten pa dang// mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// tha'em sdug pa mthong n yang// des na rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo sde
ka hu'u/ dam pamanyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sams dang// gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te// zab ma sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di rten par byed na//
mdo sde 'de yo gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi bzad 'di dang 'dra// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang// blon potshogs kyi dbang
phyag bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba dum yiso// de dag lan srung bar byed// lhamo chen mo dbyangs can dang// na 'dzanar gnas pa dang// 'byung bo mamo 'brog ma dang// sa yi lhomo/
bortan m dang// tshangs pa'i deb nga dang lha dbang dang// klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang na// mi 'am ci dbang lhamin dbang// de bzhinanam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon/
tha pa dang/ dbacas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mam g.yal bar// de dag lan srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gsang ba ste// bskal
@ pa bya bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'a'ib tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyen pa dang// gang dag gzhan la chos byed dang// gang gurjes su la red dag/ gang dgamachod par byed pa rnams//
do dag lha dang klu dag dang/ mi dang ma 'am deg dang// lhachen gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa khri bar mchod par 'gyur/ srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams
phung bon/ mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang// bsam gyis ma khyab skye bar 'gyu[=]// phyogs bcu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// de bzhin zab mor sdod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis kyang// rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba lani// kha tsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos/ drazhig ba yi ges 'chab zhing/ byams pa'i sems na nyer gozhab/nas// g.yel ba med pa mchod
par bya// rang gi sems n du med cing// rgya cha bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pagatan par gyis/ gang dag mdo' nyen pa// de dag mazhing
legs par 'ongs// ma mo srid pa legs par thob// tsha ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/ gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang// bshad pa 'di na grags 'gyur ba// de dag dag rtsa sbyangs pa ste//
sangs rgyas mang bos rab tu bsngags// gsar 'od dam pa gdo sde'i debang po'argyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o/ ga yang de tshodo'i dusanargyal
bo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dba'achen pomadzes pa'i tog ces bya ba ston gyi rgyal ba 'khasnyan bkur byas pa/ gu brtse ba bskyedal/ sangs rgyas
bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag mang bol mi gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyugang dngarkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo rgyahunag thub ste/ 'di
rgyu// ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ rgyuganyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshor ba 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhen/
'dalta sta/ srog gcod pa spongs pa dang/ kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pasazhi/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med ba mang por sreg
gcod pa sangs par gyur panas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lem gyi bar du yang dag par blangs te gnas pa gyur/ bras kyang phyi nang gi dngos bo rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ tha
rang gi lus kyi sha dang/ khrag dang sa pa dang/ rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam go// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas
la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'alta bu'i tshul gyis bsag pa 'di dag sems pan/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya cha' bskrublasngon bolas grub pa/ lha'ilen bo du mas spras pa// de
bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo/ lha'iles 'das pa'i sres kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur to/ khri de dag
las kyang lha'i khri lde'i res bcos bu'an po che'i phugasa rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khridi dag las kyang lha'i tog pad ni po che du mas sgras ba/ de bzhin gshags bas kha dag
bsgyur ba dag byung ngo// pad+made dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ba'akhyeng bar gyur te/ shar phyogasanas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrugs pa byung/ lho phyogasanas ni de bzhin gshegs/
pa zhi chen togo byung/ nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs patshadapagamed byung/ byang phyogs nasazhi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung// seng ge 'i khri de dag la las sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyalakho'i kheb kyi grong khyatshon po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyuto// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang/ phyogs

bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi der dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha me tog dag gi char yang bab/ lha'isolasnyan gyi sgra mdu byung ngo// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong/
gsum gyisteng chen po'a'ajig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan bar gyur te/ sems can dbang pom tshang ba rnams n dibang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sams
can dmus long dag nameg gis gzugasa rnams mthong// sems can 'on pa dga' rje bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smon pa gnadren pa so se ne da/ samasacan g.yong ba dag ni
sems ma g.yeng bar gyur/ samasacan sgron mo rnams 'i gos bgo bar gyur/ sems cenabakras ba dag ni lto 'grangs parogyur/ sems can skom pa dgan skom pa dag dang bral bar gyur//
ubya// sems can nad kyis btab pa dgazhand dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag na debang bo Atshabar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmadad byung ba'i tshes rnams cher byung
bar gyur to/// de nas bang chub sems dpa' madzes pa'i tig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ da chem 'dzems la yarangs shing rab tu
dab/'aste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams la rjes
su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nan tan rjes su dran zhing/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pa 'di lta
lo brgyad cu zhag thubasta/ skutshe thung ba 'di rje lte bu 'di zhig snyam du bsam pa de soms shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing
mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sams dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad cesakhaka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'disnyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du
ma soms shig/ deci'i phyi'i zhin/ ragisakyi bu de bzhin gshegs l dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ bdud
xxx
ba shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi phyi mo 'amatha'atshubur du yang rtogs pa zhus ba ded kyis su la dma mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku tsha'atshad bshadeb brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshosangs rgyas kyamathus lha'i bu 'dod pan spyod ba rnams dang/ gzugasan spyod pa rnams dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ze dang/
lham man dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am deng/ lto'abu chen po'i bar dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa chags
su bcad de mdor bka' stsal ba/ rgya mtsho'achunams thams cad kyi// thigs pa duganabagrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'itshad/ sus kyang bgrang bar mnyes so// reb
rnams na thams cad kyang// phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i skyotsho'atshed// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// saM' gang dag yod pa la// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa//
thamasacad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku 'tshod mnyes// gal te la las nam mkha' la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dang ga 'dod kyang// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i
tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mnus so// rdzogs pa'i sangasargyus 'disridi bzhugs// bskal pa dgan 'odi snyed cig/ bskal pa bya ba brgya dag ces// grangasan redapar mi rung ngo// gang
phyir de la rgyaganyisan// rgyu dang rkyenakyang rnam gnyis te// sdig pa'i 'tsho ba sbyangs pa dang// kha zasamang bo byin ba ste// de phyir bdag nyid chen po yi// sku tshe'i grengasan me rnyed de//
bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tsomamadapar 'gyur// thatsomacung zad ma zazhago/ rgyal ba'i snyatsha'i the ma yi// grangasan gang du'ang ma
dmagasaso// de nas de tsho 'khor de slob dpon lung ston ba bram ze ko'u dbye zhes bya ba dang// bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa yongs su mya nganalas 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phrul la sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ gal
te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtsi ba/ thugasarjechen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed ba/ sems can thams cad la pham lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par
ka gyur pa/ zla ba lta bu snang ba mdzad pa// shes ba dang la shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing/ gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigesan/ bdag
lo dag pa cig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung ba ragyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi'athus 'khor der lats+tshaba gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
ga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u din la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'adas la dam pahrig gsol lam/ bdag
gis khyod la dam ba cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ latse ba gzhon nu bdagagason bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang/ ring bsrel gyi phyam dgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
rang bsral lus 'bru tsamo la bsten pa 'dod// ring bsrel lungs 'bru tsam stakhAngon bar mchodan/ sumacu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams kya bdag po 'ba'a'age 'thob ces grag ge kyi
latsA bA gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa med nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu 'amtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa/ gser 'od
dam pa'imado'achaces grag gisonyonacige/ kyalats+tshe bA gzhon nu gsar 'od dam pa'i medono/ de ltar shes par dka' zhing/ rtogs par dka' bsan/ kho bo cagamatha' 'khobakya gling
gi bram ze rnams// gang btungs na sems can rnams myur du sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsral yungs 'bru tsamazam tog gi nang du bcug
bcas kyang rung ngo// kye lats+tshabI gzhon nu khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lasa'ang bsrol lungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsralagyi za ma tog tu bcug ste bcangs pas sems can rnams sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob pa'i dadakaM/ kyi lits+tsha bA gzhon nu kho bos ni deb pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas 'ats+tshapA kazhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyiso mthong na dga' bas/ slob
dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di tu latshigs su bcad pa 'di dog gse slar sbas pa/ nam zhag gang+gA'i chu rgyu la// me toga rnams n gyis pa dang// bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang// khu byug
dung mdog 'dra 'gyur dang/ 'dzam bur ta la'i 'obuchags dang/ 'bra gor ama'i dogo ba chags/ de'i tshon khungs 'bru tsam// rang bsrel du gsal bar 'gyur// nam zhigor
stsal sdu rnams las// gos su'ags par btags gyur te/ dgun gyi grong ba sal byed// de tsho rang bsral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sgrungabu'irkang lagalas// yang thog
legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing 'o ba tum g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyug/ nam zhage srin bu bod pa kun// sonadakar por skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa
[o ]/na de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ra bong ra rnams las// skasan legs par byas gyur ba// de tshar ng bsrel med par 'gyur/
namazhig gsan di 'dzegs te// khes zla ba bza' ba dang// sgra gcan l lang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyug/ grong rgyuba'i sbrang bu las// nam zhigerdza ma'i nang
'thungs te// khyim n gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de ming bsrol yod par 'gyur// nam zhige bong bu bde gyur la// gauchu dmar bam pa'i dra'agyur cing// gru gar rnams lamakhas
gyur pa// dacha'ing bsrol yod par 'gyur// nam zhige 'ug pa bya 'og rnams// dben par dong nas rtsa ba dang// phan tshunamathun par 'gyur ba na// de ring bsrel yod par 'gyur//
po la sha yi ma rnams/ na chen sgo gsum gdugs gyur te// chara'ab ba skyabs sunamagyur ba// de tshurang bsrol yod par 'gyuraM// nam zhig rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrulaM
'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig byan 'ug pa yas/ dar ba spyis kyangedaldangab// mtshul thogs te 'gro
gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel med par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa khram zeko'u rgyas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sanas/ litsebA gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyisa mthong an dga'
kha latshigs su bcad pa 'di deb gses snas ba/ legs so 'gasaso gzhon nu mchog rgyal ba'i sras po tsheg pochi// pagazhang 'apos 'amakhas ldan pa// lung
bstan ban des pa 'og 'ge namagon po skye pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsho ba nyid// bsaMm gyis ma khyab go ramis bzhin// gzhon nus bdag lamanyan par gyis// sangs
rgyas yulan bsamam khyob// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs bstod// sangs rgyas thamasacad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung// sangs rgyas mas cad kha dog
mtshungs// 'di'i sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'dasan becosamamago// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rjelta khur sra ba'iskye// sprul pa'iskyonaston par mdzad//
drang srong chen po'i ring bsrelani// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya brjod// sku la rus pa khrag med na// rang bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams lo phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis rang
bsal pa zhig par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi skyo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mado pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'dus kyi skyo de 'dra/ bdag gis
'di shes shes nas ni// bdag giso dam ba gsol ba khas/[” ]/detade khon lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong giso// de bzhin gshags

'asku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus mas bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog par rab tu dga' nasasgra dbyangs//
gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras so// sangs rgyusamyangs lo ngam 'da'// chos kyang nub par 'gyur to// sems can yongs su sbyino mdzad 'i// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsamamakhyage/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can ms la phan pa'i phyir// bkod ba rnam ba snatshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems
dang 'amadzes pa'i tog gso/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyisolas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i skyo tsho'i ched bstan pa thos nas/ tshamazhing
mgu la yi'angs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang ladebade ba skyes nas/ dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab pa gyur te// de bzhin gshogs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di beshad ba'i
tsha sems can grangasamad dpag tu med pa ga bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ma snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo/
sde'i debang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'ichod bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o//
kyis lag pa'i rmi laman/ gsar gyi rje kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo// phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin poche'i shing drung na/ rin po che bskruslob khrinems la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltasanas chos ston pa mthong ngo//
de nas nga skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rje de brdung ba mthong ste/ ru'i sgra de las bstanaba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung bzhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' madzes pa'i
tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran// rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo sad pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen ponas byung ste/ srog chags stong
phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'a'i gi la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa'imadzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo
sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgrolas bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gsar 'od dam pamado sde'i debang po'i rgyal po las/ rnalama mthong ba'i le'u zhis
bya ba stagasum pa'o//kanub gcig g.yel ba med par yang// bdag gi lem gyur pa// mdzes pa'i rje chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du na gsar gyi da// ji/
ltar nyam bzhan du'abar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge sta// phyogs bcu dag tu snang bar gyur/ kun tu rin chen shang drungan// nechen bzumu dgag/ khri lasangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/
brgyastong phragan dem la// 'khor dbus mdunagyis bltas pa mthong// bram ze'i gzugasan 'dra ba zhigo/ rngachen rab tu brdung ba mthong// de yis de la brdungs pa dang// tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag byung// gsar 'od dam pa rnga chen sgra lasan// stong gsum 'jig rten 'garten gsum 'dazhi// ngan song sdug bsngal ga'i rdzo'i sdug bsngal dang// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
sdug bsngalozhi bar shog/ rdza ba tsho pa rjeskad 'di losen/ 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhigyur cig/ ltar thub dbang 'jigasachad 'jigesazhi lto/ sems can 'ajigs med 'jigs dang
bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu'i ting 'dzin byang chu ga gan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgyas tshor
gyur// rnga bo che yi rje skad 'di yisani// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i debyangs ldan gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog ro gshog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dag bskor gyur cig/ bskul
ka[g]// pa bsam gyi so'i khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyi'i chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms 'gyur sdug bsngal zhi kheshog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
mug 'gyugagi/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i rus la galce rab 'bar ba// de dag chen khasgrags ba thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tsheg thos
shog/ sems can kun gyisatsho las brgya dag dang// tshe rabs stong phrag bya ba skyo dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtagatu dran gyur cig/ de dag gzhi chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che ya sgra
skad 'di lo sen// sangs rgyus rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs red 'gyur// sdug kha'i las rnams rnam par sbyong bar shog/ khyu ba dge ba rnams n spyodagyur cig/ ma deng lha dang srog chags thams
cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yan po// rdabo tshe yi sgra skad 'di losan// de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cige/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal ma bzad skyes//
lus lam rtse kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabasamadam ngan bcas shing yongs khyab pa// ma rnams m lus rab tu 'kherangashog/ sems dmyal yi dogasam la 'gertenan// soms can
sdug bsngal m bzad drag po gang/ jo bo che la sgra skad 'di losan// de dag rnams n sdug bsngal kun zhashog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang// skyabs med par n gyur pa dag/
de dag nams la skyob pa dang// dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam ba dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i shugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten/
na/ bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag giso sngan cad sdig pa'i las// shan tum khe zad gang bgyis dang// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams
cad bshags ba'i bgyi// pham dag tu ma 'dzin dang// sangs rgyas rnams su ma'adzan dang// dge ba dag tum 'dzan pas// sdig pa bdag gis gong bgyis dang// phyug ba'irgyags pas
dregs ba dang// gos dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang// gzhon pa'i rgyags bas dregs pa las// bdag gis sdig ba gang bgyis dang// nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang// nyesabar
bgyis pa'i las rnams dang// nyes pa'i dmags sum ltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// byas ba'ikhro yis 'jug pa dang// mashesamun pa'isoms dang ni// sduge
ba'i grogs po'i debang gyur dang// nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang// rtsedamo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang// rlungan dang nanyid dbang dang// nor gyis mchog rten pa las// bdag gis
sdoge ba gang bgyis dang// phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sngage pa gang bgyis dang// 'bongs pakhyung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams
kyi'ajags rgyudang// phyag dog yin gyur ba yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// g.yo ba'i sems kyis dbang nyid dang// 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang//
bkras dang skom gyis nyen pa las/ bdag gis sdug pa gang bgyiso dang// bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang// bud med rgyudang gos kyi'i// nyon mongs gdung ba snatshogs kyis// bdagagis
wA sdig pa gang bgyis dang// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug/ nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyiso ba// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs/
rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang// de bzhinenyanathos rnams l yang// gus pa ma lags gang bgyisol// de dag thamasacad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang// gus pam lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang// gus pa ma lags gang bgyiso
dang// chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bga'achags so// bdag gis rtagatum shes pas// dam pa'i chos n sbyongs pa dang// pham rnams lan gus gang//
de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang khyog pa dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// ngargyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so//
bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenadu// stobs bcu rnams lamachod bar shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur samasacan rnams// sdug bsngal kun lasa'adon gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis
mkhyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nias kyang// thams cad de bzhin gshags gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// dekun thar pa gyid nus
sridedu// sams cade'i'i khyo yong na// bskal pa khri bar spyod par shog/ gsar 'od dam pa zhes bgyi khe// laMs rnams thams cad myong byed pa// zab mo dgan ston pa 'ad// soms
can de dag ston gyur cige/ gang gis bskal ba stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tum bzad bgyis// lan cig ra ga tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis/
las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad gyur pa// gsara'od dam pa dge ba gi/ bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ zhichen 'byung gnas mchog bcu go/ sa bcul
genasal bgyi// sangasaMrgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i metsholas bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtshonu bo dang// yon tan rgya mtsho khrab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan
bsam yas kyis// thams cad mkhyen dardzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang// gzungasa rnams khasam gyisom khyob dang// dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis/
stobs bcu dam bar 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni//
nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ bdag gis bskal ba brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag mye ngan sems// 'phos dngam ngana'ajiges pas gzir//
sdige ba'alas la 'jigs par bgyid// yid rtegatudaman par gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' mamachis// sangs rgyas thamasacad thugs rjeldan//
ga 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel ba// nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs ba dag las bdag thamadzod// bdag gi nyomongs las rnams kyi// drim de bzhin gshegs bsashol//
sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la// snying rje'achu yos bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thamasacad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang// da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang// de
skudag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i lasa rnams kun// sadachad ma bgyid bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang// sdug de brlag bar ma bgyi'o//
lus kyi lasana rnam gsum dang// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi go dang// yid kyi dem pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'gas so// lus kyi so bgyis dang ga bzhes// da kyiso
rnam par bsams pa dang// las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi de ga'i las bcu spangs zhasasu// dge ba bcu po bstan bgyis te// sa bcu lan
bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gse sdige ba'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'brasabu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas// de dag thams
cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'od 'i gang dag dang// 'gi rten khamasan gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyis pa// de dag kun la ya reng ngo// lus dang ngag dang
lad kyis kyang// bdag gas bsod nAms gang bsgrubs pa/ (bdagan dege ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyamangar byas pa'i blo yasen// shan tum khezad
sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ stobs bcu mamanyam spyan sngar mchis nas// sdug pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skyo ba nyam nga srid ba nyamang dang// 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam
bag/ lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gse sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so// bse ba khran byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang/ sngage ba'i grogs dang phrad ba nyam nga dang//
sridapatam nga 'dod chags nyamang dang// zhe sdang gatshug mun panyam pa dang// dal pa'inyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang// bsod nams bsgrubs pa'i nyam nga dag gsekyang// rgyal ba mnyam/
d mngon sumamachisogs// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags bar bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog la snyinga' rib 'dra// lonatanargya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal
a ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi// rgyal ba de dag rnams lamagos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gas na drilemed pa'i gsar 'od// med rnam dgapo zurlu yi yan lag sbyan// sangs
rgyas te me dpa la gzigrags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ thugs rje'i 'od gzer dag gi semun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag 'am tu dri med 'a ba bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas tu so yan lag
med gsar 'dras khyab// nyon mongasazhes gdungs lad tonu' bor ba'i 'dragra/ thub pa zla ba'i 'od gzer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchogasum tu gnyis kyis dbang po la na lag
mdzes/ dab byad bzang bo dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od gabar 'dra ba las/ 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs//
dritshad rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs be DUmu/ skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin mnalag dmar// 'od gtse'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pa// thub chen khyod ni to me bzhin du de
gis mdzes// mya ngana' khrub pa'i khyod la 'a ba'i dba' rlabs can/ 'khor ba'i klongache'abongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cingeshugs drag po//
bde gshegs te me'i 'od gzer mang po rnams kyis skams// yan lag gsar gyi mdog tu rnam par snang// ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis/
yan lag rnams sdus pa// sangs rgyas gsar sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'atshun dpag med dang// ngaltar sa la sa rdulamatha' yas dang// jaltar na reb rdo mtha'
mtshungs med dang// ji ltar nam mkha'imatha'an mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mnus so// bskal pa du mar
gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par ma nus so// chun skye la rtsomo'atshed tsam dang// rdor bcas pa'i bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na
shes bar nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha'ashes nus// yon tan kha dog sAn dang grags pa dang// dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang// dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cus brgyan pa so// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur bar shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gisaM// 'jig rtenama'ang sosargyas 'agyur bar bgyi// 'gro la
phan phyi'i chos kyang bstan par bgyi// sems can sdug bsnga'amang gzir thar bar bgyi// stobs bcas sngar bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor la dge ba bskor bar bgyi/
kun// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab ba/nas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'achu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs ba ltar// pharel phyin drug bla

mad rdzogs bar bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags gtatshug zhe sdang zhi kher khagyi// rgyu ba brgya dang skyo ba bye ba stong// kha dag ni rteg tu skye ba dran par bgyi
thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gsung zhigyi chen mos bar bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdug ba'i las
mas rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dag rnams spyad par bgyi/ nga rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang// 'jig rten dga' sdug bsngal kun gyur// sems can
dbang po mtshang yan lag nyams// de kun pa'i dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chulus nyams dang// phyogs bcu dgan skyabasamad gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las
sgyu thar gyur cig/ nadamed stobs dang dbang po nyid bar shog/ gang dag rgyal pochom rkun sgro 'u bsngagis gsod thug dang// sdug bsngal rnamar sna tshogs brgya las 'phongs gyur ba/ sems can
nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jags mchog mi becad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdeg cing bocing bas bcings gzir ga 'bongs ba snatshogs dgan gnas
00 gyur cing// nyon mongs stong phrag dums dkrugs nas kyang// 'jigs bam bcad mya ngan sna tshogs red// de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cig/ brdeg ba dag brdeg las klur/
gyur cig/ gsad ba rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ 'khongs gyur thams cad 'gas pamed par shog/ sems can thams cad bkres srid skom gyis gzir// de dgazas skom snatshogs/
rnyed par shog// leng bas gzugs rnams snyatshog sa'athong gyur cig/ 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos pa ngashog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos red 'gyur// sems can dbul pos
gter rnams rnyed par shog nor 'bru ri'i chon sna tshogs mang bo yiso// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan pa shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sa mas can thams
cad blta na sdug pa dang/ gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul dushes ba shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur ge/ mde kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dge/ bsams ma thag tu de
dag grub gyur cig/ rdzor tsang to'u pi wang sgra snyan dang// chumagAmatshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dang// gser gyi ut+pal pad+macan// zas skom gos nor mu taganor bu dbug/ rgyan gsar
ni chen sna tshogs ba cha chu// de dag bsams la thag tu grub gyucig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgram byung// sems can gcig kyang ma 'phroda mthong am gyur// de dag thams
ka @#// cad kha dog rgya chen dang// phan tshun du na 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi la'og rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsams par skye ba de dag gyur// bsam pa
thams cad bsams ma thag tu gang/ khasod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ gros dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug ba dang// gos dang gam tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las
dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dga' gyur ge/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang// rdul
bral dri med bstan pa'i chos la yang// phyogs bcu rnams sumachod pa byed pa rangashog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad stong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal
bo dam pa thob gyur cige/ rtogatusangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tumathon po'ajigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang/
gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa dumar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu bor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu
byang chub phyo'i spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcudaganan cher shing dbang drung// sangs rgyas de bzhugs na chen bzlumu'// khri la bzhugs pa dag na methong
can/ gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag khos par shog/ bdag gis sdug pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pan// srid pa nyam ngas sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag ma 'ded 'bras
klob ba// de dag las cad ma lus zad gyur ge/ sems can gang dag srung bar btanges gnas kug/ 'khor ba'i zhogs pa'i thog pas dam bcings pa// shes rab 'gags bcings
ba bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams los thar par gyur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang// gang dag 'jig rten khamasan gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna
tshogs zab mo rnams byed po// de dag kun la rjes su mi 'ong ngo// lus dang ngag dang yadekyis bsgrubs pa yi// bdag gserjesasu ya reng bsod nams de// bdag gis smon grub 'bras bu
yod pa shog/ byang chub rdul bral khrumed thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang// dri med mad kyis phyag 'tshal bstod ba dang// yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yos// bskal pa
drug cur ngan song sbyong bar gyug/ tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di deb gsi// skyes pa bud med bram zargyal gis las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal kha gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skyo badran
par 'gyur/ (yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan snatshog sa rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyalapos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag kun ni de 'drar 'gyur/
@/// gang dgarna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di'i gragagyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig ga lenanas dgab byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yan bzhi lam yanelngaman bcul min//
de ltar sangs rgyas stong ga gonas nias dge ba byas m yin// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal kholas/ bshags pa'i le'uzhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o/
pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'khrido bam po gnyisil////denas bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par
bsdus pala'adasked ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal bogasar gyi log pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad la bstod ba pad+ma'i
'byung gnas 'dis 'das ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar khyung gyur ba dang// phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten dgan gang gzhes pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gse bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhanem par dag/ skun gser gyi med/tu rab tu
gda'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgo dbyang sa' btu bsgrags par gsungs// bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i debu// mthon mthingelcang 'khyan tse sha
'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar batshoms// rtag tu gser ltar rnam bar madzes par gda'// sbun ring zhing mthonamathing dri mamad/ ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljagasanachi/
zhing lags la pad+ma'i mdog/ bad+ma'adrab snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhalagyimadzod/ pad lta dung 'dra yong// bozurlu mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'izla ba phra zhang zad de 'dra//
sku la lci ba khung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhalamatho'i shangasanartig tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing go la'i gsar ltar kha dog bzang// rtag pa rgyun durgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam
zhing dam pa'i mchog rab 'phags// sku la bu gnasa'i ra skyas// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tshor zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar
sngol mas// bltamasam thag tu sku lis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jigartan dgan thams cad gang// 'ge rten gsum na sdug bsngal matha' yas// bde bkun gyis sems/
can rnams kyang tshim// sams ngamyalaM'agro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag/ mi dgas lha gnas am lo 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag waMms cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams
themasacad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gsar dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btso ma'i gegs ltar rab tu snang ba'isku/ bde gshegs zla bo rab tu drimed zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri
med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'dra sku lus yan lag 'jag/ sang ga 'dra bar rtsalagyis non pa'i mchog/ gang phyag na reb tu'ang ba ste// sA la'i lcagamarlung gis
bskyod pa bzhi// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od gzer rab tu gtong// nyi ma stong bsarab tu lhag che'o// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchogadri mamad// zhing rnams mtha' dus thoms nyid rab tu
snang// sangs rgyas 'od na rnyes par lhang nge bas// zhing masamatha' las brgya stong rnams su yang// mtshan byed zla ba nyamamang pa dag/ de dag thams cad 'od 'i dpar gyur// sangs
rgyas te me 'jig rtan sgron ma ste/ sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag sto rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin gshegs po me sems can mthong// bsod
za nams stong phrag brgya de ldan pa'i sku/ yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sne 'drargyal kha'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes me mad// sa yi snying ga rdul

dang mtshungs 'dra snyad// phrab 'i tshul snyadasangs rgyas gong 'das dang// gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyad byung ba dang// gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyad bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni reb dang ba'i
ngag 'de lus kyisom tog dbul ba dang// spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dang ni// dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dgaragyur pa// snying po/
mchog rab snatshogs dum ste// bdag gas bskal ba stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyus don tan brjod par mnus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad
brjod m nus// bdag gse rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan gcige rgyas barjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur to// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang
baT skra yi chos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi len tan gcig la mni// lus dang ngag yade 'a btudang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas//
