bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang// des na sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cige/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa
ni ma 'ongs bskal ba mtha' yasa rnams su yang// gang dang gang du bdag skye ba na// rmulom duna'adi 'dra'i rdzalta zhing// debazhi bshags ba 'di 'dramanyan par bgyi// rgyal stod
pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skya ba de dang der nArId par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yasa mtshungs med dang// gang dag bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan
bar bgyi// nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal matsho las thar bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bar bgyi// byin nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi//
bdag gzhingan lhod pa med gyur cig/ sduphula rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang// rgyal ba thams cad 'ayang bstod pa'i skyes// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar
bgyi// da ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gsar gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gsar gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'un gang yan 'ad gnyis kyang// dor na bu pho de dag gnyis ka dang// byang chub
bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems M can gang dag gnasamad rten med cing// skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang
dbangaganyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnasagyuraparashog/ sngonamatha' 'das pa de dag ji sridang// ma 'ongs bsal
par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa yAn pe'agos pa yis// bdag ga sdog po' mtshosgoms par shog/ bdag gi 'dusakyi rgya mtsho bra gyur cig/ bdag gi nyen mongs
rgya mtshothad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par
shog/ byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gosar 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba
rnam dag gyug/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni sneng bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhug ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur/
gi/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan bar shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho lasan sgril ba dang// bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi//
'jig rtan gsum n sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/ de dge zhing na rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ yon tan mtha' las khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' las mas kyis bdag gi zhing//
ma 'ongs dusan de 'drar 'gyur bar shog gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ dalta byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
bstod pa me tog pa 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad ba 'di dog gsungs so// bsam gyis ma khyab mdo
rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bsazha mdo mchog dam pa 'di// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yane// sems can blo chung rnam par
mishes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes ba'i mi nus te// de lta bsan mdo mchog dam pa 'di'i// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun gyis tshe zhes shes
'gyur dang// sems can 'byung ba'i phun snying rje dbab// thabs dang tshul dang rgyugazhana rnams kyis ni// mda mchog dam bu dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di
grong khyim stong pa ji bzhanato// dbang po rnams ni demago dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gonas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par ma shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs
gyur rnams l rgyug/ rnaba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par sbyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri snems 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag turolargyug lus kyi dbang po mkhas pa 'ag pa dag la rgyug/ yod kyi
dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'ad de phan tshun du// rangarang yul du rab tu 'jug bar byed// samasaMn sbyam bzhin du gal ba yin// dbang po drug na yulal
rnam par sbyong// ji ltar mazhagi grong stod rgyug pa dang// dmag dngachomadun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems n lul druga gnas bcas shing// dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab
tushes/[0f8b ]/de ltar sems n yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang ra ba shes te// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dra rnams dang// ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/
soms na debang bo drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed// lus g.yo ba
0 mad cing byed ba med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin longs su rtogalas byung// grong stong las kyi 'khrula 'khor 'dra ba gnas/ sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams/
grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogasan gnas// dpar na sbrul gdug gnas gcig zhibazhin tu// rtag tu phanatshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sprul rnams khazhi po de dag kyang//
gnyis n snying 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gtes gnyes te// khams sbrul de dag thamasacad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbyol dang chu la sbrul dag dang//
'du gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yane/ mi yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrel dag dang// 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam
shes kun tu gnas nas dang/ lha dang mi deng ngan song gsum dag tu/[” ]/jaltor byas ba'i las kyis srid la skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shig can dang ngan skyags rnams kyis
gang// mngon par mi deg pa srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dga' 'thor ba ngashing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyed chos 'ang rnams la ltos// 'di 'ol sems can de bzhin gang zag dang//
chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong ba ste/ ma gi ba la rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung bachen po 'di dag 'byungamin// ma byung ba las byung zhing ma 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni
'byung ba ma 'byung ba// de phyi'i 'byung ba zhes sa brjed do// mgi ban gzhan yang yod min la// mag pa rkyen las byung pa ni// mgi ba 'di yod pa ma yin
de bas ngasanamag 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shosaming dang gzugs bcas dang// skyemachod drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang/ srid dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang skya dang rgya
sgyu shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang 'byung dang// tshul bzhin ma yin soms
kyis rnam dpyad dang// bdag gis lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis/ ye shes ral gris nyon mongasargyam drol// phung po gnas 'astong par gyur paltos// byang chub lon tan rgya chen reg par

thi gyis// ngasan bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang spyi// bdud rtsa'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni red rtse grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngon bdud rtse'i khu bas bdag chem bya// ngasan chos kyi
rngachen dag pa brdungs// ngasan tshes kyi dung gi mechog kyang bus/ ngas chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'kha ba byas// ngasan tshosakyichar pa dam pa phab/ ngani nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las
rgyal/ gangasanachos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng// srid pa'iletsholas sems can rab tu bsgral// ngasan ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyonamengosam yase ga dus
0cha gyur pa// rten mang gyur cing da dung gnyen med ba dag/ srog chags nyon mongasasems gdungs zhi byes nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsal bas rim bar byas// gang phyir bskal pa du ma sngo chad/
ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis ma khyab mchod ba byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su 'tshol ban// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag kha dang mig dang rkang pa dang// yan lag
mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang// 'a dang gnor bumu tigergyan dang gsar// bzu chu dang rin chen sna tshog sabatang// stong gsum sheljon thoms cad dang// rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang//
nagasAtshal dgo dang sa lasan// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad byar brlags nas// rang tu pa'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsem par/
phyi ma'i phung bo spungs nas ni// 'di lecha gsum dbye bas nus// sa la rdul yod pa rnams// stong gsum dgan thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis la khyab pa// sems can
kun gyi u0f7a ngashes pa gang// da ni sems can gacig giragyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phyi ma bgrang bar byed n ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan m rnams
kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen lam nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang// skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang// bsal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang
du'ang bgrang bar nus go/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong ba nyid kyi le'u zhes du ba ste drug pa'o////nas rgyal po chen/
[«]1 po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po mgi mkhazang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bgosanas
bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalatshe sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamago nad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhani
gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa// byang chub sAms dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'atshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa// lha'atshogs thams cad
kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'atshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'ag rten skyong ba thams cad kyisamachod cing bsngags te brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyil
thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad mchog tu bde ba'i ba tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig
cha00/ rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad sems pa/ 'ges pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tubazlog ba/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid ba/
nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyideb/ gza' thams cad sa la ba/ mchogatu'ibar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa
sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong la ba tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo'i rgyal po 'di'akhogamed du rgya chen
yang dag bar ngashadan/ chos nyan pa chos bdud kyi khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi de dud dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi/ lha'ilus 'di gzi brjid chen posa rnam par 'phel bar
'gyur go// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang/ stobs dang/ mazu yang bskyod par 'gyur/ gzi brjidi dang/ dpal dang/ phunasum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug
bar 'gyur ro// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi ni ches dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyargyal po lags te/ datsun ba bcom ldan 'das bdag caga' chos
kyis lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad
kha snying rjeamachase pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ti
rtsa brgyad dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu// rtag par rgyun du lha'amo'i rnam par dag pami'i las 'das bas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyo/ bsrung bar bgyi/
yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slod du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jagi don skyong zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzamabu'aklong
'dir bkol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'dzoms par 'gyur ram/ mu ga'i dgon pa'i m/ nad kyi dgon pa'i m/ gnod pa snatshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa stong dang/ gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis
gtses par 'gyur ban/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cagargyal pochen po bzhese/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dos slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul khar
bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasanam bdag cagargyal po chen po bzhiserdzu 'phrul dang byin rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ban/ yul gang dang gang dumachab r gsar/
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa snatshog se brgya dang/ gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag
ba rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mkher 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gsal 'od dam pa mdo
snga'i debang ngo 'gyol po 'di yong bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal bos gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'argyal po 'dis nyanate/ thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin
ba'i dge slong de dag phyi rgol ba thams cad lasaM kun tu bsrung bar bgyidi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ yongs su skyong bar bgyiden/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag rgyal bo bzhes mi'i rgyal bo de'i yul thams cad ni gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba
dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami'irgyal bosazhamo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsten nam//
dag bstanam mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyiden/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas
pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i la khyad thams cad kyis bde ba dang/ yo khyad thams cad phun sumatshogs bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasamama'i rgyal pos dge slong ngan/
dge slonganam/ dag bsogam/ dgekhasnyan mamadosde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dag la bsdu skong bgyid/ bram r bgyid/ mgror bgyid cingemachodan/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal bochen po bzhis mi'i rgya'abadel/ rgyal ba thams cad bsaches bas stong du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ chos mi gror bgyi/ chos mchod par bgyi ste//
mul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bo chen khobazhi'o lags so zhes khyab byin ti/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs
so rgyal bo chen po khyed gang legs so legs so// 'diltasta/ khyadan sngon gyi rgyal ba'alhag bar bya ba byas pa/ dag pa'i rtsa brnagasabaskyang pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong brag mang bo la bsnyen bkur byas 'chos dang ldan pa/ chos sgrub/ chos kyi rgyal bo/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyirgyal bo byed pa'o// 'od lde ste/ khyada'i yun ring por sams
rgyu can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byaba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa// mi
ban pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub ba la brtson pa yinete/ rgyal po chen po khyod bzhasema'i rgyal bo gsega'od dam pamadosde'i debang bo'i rgyal po
[z/]'da'amachod pa dang/ me gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ longs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhe
ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal bo chen po dpung dang/ g.yog dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag dum dang bcas pa khyed bzhes 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/
daltar byung ba'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyu'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ longs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro/de nas rgyal bo chen bo dang dang/

ga shog dong/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag dum dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lham gi no dang g.yul 'gyed bzhargyal ba'i 'gyur 'og lha sa yid ms bam bka'agyu'o// 'di ltar gsar 'od dam ba medo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal por
'gyi dmagatshogs thamasacod 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyan mamado sde'i dbang po 'dzin ba de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis/
shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyod pa dang chad pa spang ba dang/ zhe bo dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/de nas
rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal bo chen po yula 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig
tu bgos nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lce ngas 'khatsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
sho/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs ba'i dusazha/ gsar 'od dam pamado sde'i dbang po 'al po 'di grong ma/ grong khyer 'am/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul
'khor ram/ podra 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'irgyal por 'gyur ba gang
lal zhig lha'i dbang po rimatshigargyal po'i bstan bcos 'osirgyal po bgyid cing/ rtag par rgyan du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyalapo 'di nyenanam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid
dam go slong ngam/ ga slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyenam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bas stong bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ mgron bgyid cing mchod/
de rtog pa rgyun du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo nyanan/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ dbung dang/ g.yog dang/ gnod
sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lho'i lus 'di dag gzakherjid chen po rnam par 'phal bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ stobs chen por yang bgyidakhar 'gyur/ bdag
cag ga ge za brjid dang/ dpal dang/ bun sumatshogs nang ma bar 'abal bar 'gyuro/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi depung dang g.yog tu bcas pa//
gnod sbyin brgyastong phrag dum dang lus baltar ma gopa'i bar bgyis te/ dalta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan grongangam/ grong khyer 'ag/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang
'khor gangan/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tumatshabar bgyi'o// mi'irgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyin pa dang/ me gro
bgyid pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs/
su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ rgyal po'i khra 'khor de dag dang/ yul 'khor de dag dang/ yulade dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yang sasu bzung ba dang/ yongs
su bskyong ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
bgyi'o// pha'ol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la' gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen ba dang/ me grol bgyid pa dang/ mchod pa
tha @#// bgyid pa de'i de zla 'dab tar rgyal bo gzhan zhig mchisol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasanam dag zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal bo de 'dasnyemadu bdag dpung gi tshogs yun
lag bzhi de dang lhan gi yul der song sta/ lul de ma bar gzhig go snyam du sems bskyedan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshoda'i dus na gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'di'i gzi
brjed kyi ye shus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyalapo de/ rgyal bo gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyadabar 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin n yang yul 'khrug khar 'gyur/ rgyal bo'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang
'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza'adang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ ul du brel ba sna tshogs brgyadag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po rang
gi la du phyin naganod pa sna tshogs brgyadang/ bro'i bsnatshogs brgyu'adi lta bu 'byung ngo// btsun pa bcom ldo'adas dgu zla 'dab nye ba'irgyal bo de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogasate/ phu

shu rol gyi demag tshogs sumachi bo'ispyod du rang gi yul nas byung sta/ dpung gi tshogs ma'og khazhib dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi'atshol ba dang/ gangan gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgya'abo 'di
gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal pochen po bzhi de dung dang yog tu bcas nga/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cige khulus/
0 mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dmachi bar bgyi'o/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de ba shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyide nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba snatshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//
bgags kyang bgyi'o// 'di ltasta/ yul der bkol gyi dmagatshogs de mchi ba ma yinusan/ mul gzhig par 'gyod pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen
po bzhi bo dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal bo chen po dag lags so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed gang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastod du
bsgrubs ba/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'un pa dang/ mi byed pa dang/ mchod pa de dag la
kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ gongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde 'gas su 'gyur bar gyis shig/
rgyal po'i pho brang 'a khor de dag dang/ grong khyer de dag dang/ khul 'khor de dag dang/ yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su
bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ lu'ade dag kyang 'jigs ba dang/ gnod bo dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar por
tsaka grubya// gyis shig/ pha'ol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlogs shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag ma 'thab pa dang/ mtshang ma'edu ba dang/ mi

rtsod pa dang/ mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shige/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi steng de dgan/ rgyal po brgyad khri
bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang/ rgyal srid kyi debang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang/ rang gin gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par ma 'tshab dang/ phan tshun rnam bar
'chi ba mi bskyod pa dang/ rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi debang phyug gis dga' ba dang/ ban tshun du yul 'jug par ma byed pa dang/ khul
gzhag pa'i phyi'i parol gyi gnod pa dag nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'a'i grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dgan/ rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi sted de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sogs su 'gyur/ byams pa'i
sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du ma 'thab/ mtshang mi 'odru/ mid/ mi 'gyod par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyun/ de'aphyori rgyal po chen bo dpung
dang g.yog tu bcas ba khyadabazhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyus par 'gyur/ legs bar 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dngams gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can
[j]du 'gyur/ dus dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ lo khyud khor thams cad kyang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ zla ba dang/ ma yang nyin mtshan du legs
par rgyu bka'agyur/ char pa'irgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs
spyod tshol dang sor snamed par 'gyuraM/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'o ma dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten du rgya bar 'gyur/ lha'i
khong khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang lalazhig ma'i rgyal por gyur la/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyalapo 'don par 'gyur
kyi= dam gro byas/ mchod pa bas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyan mamado sde'i dbang po'argyal po'adzan pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/ blam
byad/ mi gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhidapung dang g.yog tu bsus pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du mal snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gsala'od dam
ba medosde'i debang po'i rgyal bo 'di nyonan/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cagagi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po/
ku@#/ yang rnam bar 'phel// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ stobasakyang baskyed do// khyod gatha brjidi dang/ dpa' dang/ phunasumatshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel
[“”]la mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dal yang mchod pa bsam gyis khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro//
mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang/ khyad bsam gyis ma khyab pa rgya che ba yang sapa thams cad
kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des n mi'i rgyal po de la bsrub chen po byas pa 'gyur// des n mi'irgyal po del kun tu bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab ba dang/ yongs su bzung
ba dang/ yongasasu bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhab dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyu'e// btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ btsunamo'i 'khor thams
cad dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ longs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi
kha dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khon gnas pa'i lho thams cad kyang chos gzi berjid dang ldan pa dang/ ches stobs dang ldan pa dang/ bde ba dang/
yid bde ba bsam gyisam khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshog samyong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang/ yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsungasapar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs
bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgramed par 'gyur/ bkol gyi demagatshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ 'khrug pamed par 'gyur ro/
de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das largyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen pomag mi
bzang de dag gas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami'i rgyal po gang la la zhag gsa'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang
bsrung bachen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsunamo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang/ btsunamo'ikhor gyi tshogs rnams la'ong bsrung bachen po bgyid 'tshal bar
'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'i brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bachen po bsam gyisam khyob ba mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa blo na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tsha'adi
la bdag girgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyi sam khyab pa rnam par 'bal bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po 'di bsam gyisam khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
[z ]@#/ tugamachis pa yongs su 'dzi'i 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yulaThams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ longs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi lul/
nakhanod bam mchis pa dang/ dgra mamachas ba dang/ rol gyi dmagatshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang/ nad 'go ba mamachis pa dang/ 'khrug bamamatshes bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyuzhu/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasam rgyal po des g.yo da bamamachis pa'i sems dang/ gus pa dang bcas pa dang/ modang bcas pas gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'dibs stong
du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi'o// gsar 'od dam pamadosde'i debang bo'argyal po 'daminyan pa 'i slod du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags pa gzhi der bgyi'o//

der mchis naas kyang rgyal bo'i pho brang sosachab sna tshogs kyis chagachag gdab cing ma tog ba selemasnatshogs dgram par bgyi'o// grosachab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa dang chos kyi khrimethon
porgyanasnatshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan bar bgyi'o// ba'i rgya'abo des
'alus bkru bar bgyi'o/ gos dra reb tu bda' ba gos gsar ba medzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshog sakyisabargyan par bgyi'o// bdag bstanar datu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de lamachis
nas rgyal po'agyigs pas dregs par ma bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags pa mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa thams cad rnam par sbyangs ba'i soms
kyis/ gsol 'od dam bgadosde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'ganyanapar bgyi/// dag slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bcud bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dusan btsun
mo dam pa dang/ rgyal ba rnams dang/ rgyal po'abumo rnams dang/ btsunamo 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu
rnams dang/ rgyal bo'i khyim rnams 'tshig snyan pa sgyu bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad 'ol tshigastan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyasam khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po
bde bar bgyi'o/ bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' bachen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyod nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyiso rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen podog de'i tshe de'i dus nami'i rgyal po des gos
[… ]@#// thams cad dkar bo sar pa mdzes ba bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag 'gas par brgyan par bya'o// de'i phye'i gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o//
[” rgyal po'amathu chen po dang/ rgyal bo'i kod pa chen pos bkra shiso ba dad ba snyatshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byang l/ chos skya ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de
spyi ci'i phyir yin/ mi'i rgyal bos der gom pa ji snyid bor ba de snyad kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pa stong gi 'khor pa phu'i bsnyel bar 'gyur/ de snyad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal gis bya ba
khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyad du/ tsho 'di'i rgyal srid kyi debang phyug chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ skal pa bye ba khrag khrag
ba stong phrag dug gnas langs shing rgyatshab lha'i galamed khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal gsalha'i rgya che zhing rab brgya stong phrag dum thog pa/ra
'gyur/ skyo ba thams cad du dbang phyugachan bo thob par 'gyur/ tshang bar 'gyur/ yuna'adi du'atsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshag gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/
grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjob shin tu rgyar bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os bar 'gyur/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yan du bcas ba'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lhadang
mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya cha'ang rgya chab thob par gyur/ stobasache bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyis shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes ba dang/ blta na sdug pa/
dang/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad bar 'gyur/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod
nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di ltabu'adi dag mthong nasama'irgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du ches smra ba bsu
bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dang ga tshad stod du mang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyod par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur go// dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur 'o// dang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shakya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten
thams cad dngamamathun bamanyan par bya'o// deng bdagachos manyan pa 'dis bla'amad ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// ding bdagags de bzhinagshegs/
ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mamanyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das ba dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
a rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgyatshab byas par 'gyur ro// dang bdag gsesems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'askye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi

sdug bsngal thams cad shane tu rgyudachad bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gisatshangs ba'i dbang po'i rgyal bo nyid kyis bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum thob pa dag gi dag ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
pa 'gyur ro// deng bdag gos brgya byin nyid kyi lus khye ba khrag khrige ba stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtso ba'os bon bskyod par 'gyuro// deng bdag gse 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal

po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mkho ba khag ga ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyura'o// deng bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dumar 'khor ba las longs su thar par byas kha'agyur// dong
bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa blanAmad pa yangs shing blo ma ba bsam gyisam khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur// deng bdag gis btsunamo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la
pasrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i brang 'di'i zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyisami khyab pa mchog tu 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng
bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyure// yongs su bskyangs ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang dgra med pa dang/ thago'akyi demagatshogs thams cad kyisam brje
ba dang/ nad 'go ba med pa dang/ 'khrug pamedabar 'gyur ro snyam du sems skyed par bya'o// rgyal bo chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan nam/ dge
bston ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal bo'adzin pa dog la/ ma'irgyal bo de dag chos la gus pa 'di lta bu s bstistang byed/ blamar byed/ mgo byed/ mchod pa byed
cing/ rgyal bochen po khyed bzhi debung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ lha'i tshogs de dag dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag dum dag la shas kyi dog pa bzhin/ ma'i rgyal po de bsod
namasu mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang/ tsho'adi'ilus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyugachen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/
tsha'adi lo rgyal po'agatho brjid chen pobasam gyisomi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang/ phun sumatshogs pa dang/ gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyi'i rgol/
ba thams cad dang/ dgrathams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod ba'agyur ro/// de skad ces bka' sa'al pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal
dpochen po bzhi bo de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal la zhig ma'i rgyal por gyural/ de chos la gus pa de lta bu s gsar
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal bonyal/ dge slong ngam/ ga slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ ga bstanamamadosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bstastong
blo bgyid/ blamer bgyid/ megror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'api khrang de shin tu dag pa phyag bdar bgyid/ sbyosachab snatshogs
kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cagargyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cag thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cinge/ bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dag pa'i rtsa ba'i shas chung zad
cig sbyin pa brgyaden/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi ston la mchas ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du sprosachab
snatshogs kyis bdug par bgyi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsor 'od dam ba medo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de lamachod pa'i slad du bdug bsabadugasamathug tu/ sos snatshogs
rnams las spros dang bdug pa snatshogs kyi 'khrishing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po babadag cag bzhi'i'i rang gi khong pa'i steng gi bar snangal/ thos
dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'obringeshing dag gi gdugasa rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri chen po yang manam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba

des bdag cag ga khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de lamomajed kyi bdag po tshangs
ba dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ lhamochen mo dbyangs can dang/ lha mo chen mo brta nam dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi

sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'ga' rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo nor bu bzang dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i

'khor dang ldan pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pochen po rgya mtsho dang/ de dag rang rang ga khong pa'i steng gi bor snang 'byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing/
gdugasa rnams su gnas par 'gyur// spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam pa 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gsar du snang ba'abyang bar 'gyur zhing/ snangab des gnas
thamasacad snang ba bgyis par 'gyura'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po
dgargyal pochen po byed bzhi'i ring rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snangal/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugasa rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de'i
yizhin/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'amachod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis da dugs ma ba gtul na bog snod gcig
thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams byung bar gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'a'ogirten gyi khams 'di thams cad
nag na zla ba bye ba phrag brgyadang/ dge ba phrag brgyadang/ rgya mtshochen po bya ba phrag brgya dang/ ri skye'abo ro'i ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang/ khor yug chen
bo bye ba phrag brgya dang/ gling bzhipa chen po'i gun gyi khams bye ba phrag brgyadang/ rgya'achen bzhi'i res ka bye ba phrag brgyadang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lho bye ba phrag brgyanas/ 'du shes
mad 'dushes modaman du tu bar song ba'i bar gyi lho bya ba phrag brgyadang/ stong gsum gyi steng chen de'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'ogis phye ba phrag brgya
bo thams cad n lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dritso dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ciding/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshog sa rnams kyis rang rang

rnams su gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur 'ange/ snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas pa 'gyur ro// rgyal che na pa dag nga gsar gyi stengar po'i
'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi stengag bar snang la/ sngos dang dadug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de nga'i du/ gsur 'od dam pa mad
snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des gros chab sna tshogs de dag gso ba dugasam thag tu gsar da dam pa mdo sde'i debang nge 'i rgyud po 'di'i gzi brjed kyi mkhrus/
gros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'ajig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad dag gi sangs

rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la gang+ga'i klo gyi bye ma snyad dag gi bar snang las/ spos dang bdug par sna
tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la/ sbosaM dang ga pa snatshogs rgya ring rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur
gsal gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung ba'agyur zhing/ snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ga'i klong gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par
'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dgacungs gtu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrage ba stong phrag du mgablo'i klung gi bye ma snyodi dge chos skya ba di la dgongs par 'gyur/
skyes bu dmang legs so legs so/ skyes bu dam pa khyod gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mo snang ba 'di lta bu/ yan
tan bsam gyi sem khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'ad byed char yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang 'degs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gsar 'od dam pa mdo
sde'i dbang po'i ba 'daten ba 'isanas can de dag kyang dga'i lta ba ngan don dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ 'chad pa dang/ klog pa/
dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston blta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ skyes bu dam pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'di thosom thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
grwa'aphags pa gsa'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang ngo kharkyel de zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med bam po gsum pa/// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi 'ang bar khag

khrig brgya stong phrag dum gang+gA'i klong gabye ma snyad dag na/ de bder gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi'ang na bzhugs pa dag gas de'ir de'i dus na rig gtsug
dang/ ngag gcig dang/ skad gcig gis/ dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skadacos bka' stsal to/ sa bu dam pa khyod la 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying
por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste shing ba rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po khrams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa//
sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtulazhugs dang/ dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bya ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag du ma dag ston pa ra 'gyur
skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad yongs su slob par 'gyur/ snyan
bdam pa khyod shang gi rgyal po'arung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi snga bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jiges ltar 'dug ba/ mi sdug pa ston pa gzugs mi sdug pa sags
dag lasargyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying bo mchog dam par song ste/ bla med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpa med pa rab tu zhi ba/
rdul dang dral ba bab ma mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor 'argyal ba thamasacad kyis mngon par
bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ blan med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod ches kyi tshon po blan med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos
kyi dong bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyodachos kyi rgyalamtshan chen po bslong bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma blon mad pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi cher bla na med pa 'babs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dag stong phrag du ma lasargya'abar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod soms can bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs surung ba 'jigs pa chen po' rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyas lu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrige ba stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo/
las yongs su thar pa'i byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum dgamanyes par byed pa'i gyura'o/
stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami'irgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'a rgyal
po'i yon tan tsha'adu deng ma 'ongs ban 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthob/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dgo ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa/ bsad nams kyi phung po dang gduld pa longs
su 'dzin par mthong nas snyang brtse ba'i spyododu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi debung dang g.yog tu banus pa dang/ gnod spyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rangagi
khang pa namachis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa snatshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugasakyis bskul ma thag tu lus ma gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsigs pa phrag pa
ma bgyis pa legs par phyag pa bgyis pa/ sbos chab snatshogs kyis tag chagalegs par btab pa/ rgyan snatshog kyis 'gas brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos manyan pa'i slad
dumachibar bgyi'o// mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya ba'i dang/ lhamachin mo dbyangs can dang/ lham chen mo dpal dang/ sa'i lha mo brtan m
dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyugachen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag/
[s/ ]@#// na rdo rje dang/ gnod spyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang/ 'brogam bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho dang/

lha bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'irgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan snatshog sakyis brgyan pa da ga la ba dang/ chos sgrub de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyun sna tshogs/
kyis 'gas par brgyan pa/ ma tog bkrum pa'is la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slod dumache bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cab/rgyal po chen po
dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgyastong phrag dum de dag thamAcad de mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par brgyad pa// blun
mad pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'das tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung
ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ rgyal po'i pho brang de dang/ grong khyer de dang/ yul de yang kun tu bsrung
bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pasrang bar
yang bgyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod ba dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
mi'irgyal por gyurati/ mi'i rgyal po de'i lul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'argyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami'irgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyenAm gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo'argyal bo 'di'idzin pa dag la ba ste skong ma bgyid/ bla ma mi bgyide/ ma gro mi bgyid/ mchod
pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cagargyal bo chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la chos manyan pa 'di deng/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'disatshig par mi bgyide/
me gro ma bgyide/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid kyang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ stobs kyang mi bskyod/ bdag cag gi
lus lags bod dang/ dbal dang/ phun sumatshogs pa yang rnam pa 'phel bar mi bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cagargyal po chen po bzhi dbung dang ga log tu
bcas ba dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag tsag gis yul de yul khar bor na/ yul
na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yal bar 'dor ba'agyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der
a1 yula rnams 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skya bdang/
mtshang 'dru ba skye bar 'gyur/ rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ bsngog pa dang/ 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang/ gza' dang/ nad rnamapa snatshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs//
tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun ma mthun por gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda'i bar 'gyuraM/ zla ba'i
gza' dang nya me'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ 2ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun du sa bgacan zin gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' 2
gzha'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bor 'gyur/ su yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnasapa' khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag
bo' bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmagatshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de yang phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag
kyang nyon mongs pa mang par 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyu'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin
brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ tshulan gnas pa dang/ cha rnams kyis yul de yal bar boran/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgyadang/ gnod ba stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
datsun pa bcom ldan 'das ga la'a'agami'irgyal por gyural/ dbadaganyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'abade ba sna tshogs yun ring por myonga'atshal bar
gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i soms kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yun gnas pa'e sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag
tshogs thams cad 'pham ngar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad mun ng du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshalabar gyur/ rang gi tshul yang 'jigs
pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'irgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar
gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'damanyan par bgyi/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyan ma mdo sde'i debang po 'dzin pa de dag la/
thubya/ yang bsti stang bgyi/ blamar bgyid/ rim gro bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yogatubacas pa rnams kyang chos ma3 na pa'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di deng/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po lang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
zhan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasama'i rgyal po des gdonami 'tshal bar gsala'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'argyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasatshangs pa'i
dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa snatshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcosa rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed
bstanar dag dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa ldacan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag ga don gyi spyod du 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jage rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa/
sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas chos mchog/ chos khyad du 'phags pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'din/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasatshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag
stong de dag dang/ brgyabyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrige brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du
'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgyacher yang dag par bshad pa lags so// ji ltar na'adzakhu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mnems kyi rgyal ngo sa
rgyal po nyidi bgyi ba dang/ jaltar sems can thamasacad bdekhar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang ji
ltar yul thams cad n gnod pa dang dgramamachis par 'gyur ba dang/ ngaltel ba la gyi demagatshog sarlams 'bam ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ngaltar yul de dag na nad 'go
bamamachas shing 'khrug pa mamachis par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pamamachis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar ma'i rgyal po de dag gser nga rang
khul rnams su chos kyi sgron mchan bo 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang/ ngoltar lha'i khang khyim thamasatsod lha dgu dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang/
ltar bdag cag rgyal bochen bo bzhi der nga dang g.yog tu panas pa dang/ gnod sbyin brgyastong phrag dum dang/ 'dzam bu'i glingen gnas palha'i tshogs thams cad tshan pa dang rim gro bgyid
bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjidichen pos rnam par 'bal bar 'gyur ba dang/ ltar bdag cag ga shes la brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/
mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang riltar bdag cag gi lus 'gazi brjidi dang/ dpal dang/ phun sumatshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar
[“”]'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na la legs shing nyams dga' la skya bo dang mas gang bar gyur ba dang/ ltar 'dzam bu'ageng thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur pa dang/
kyi dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar samasacan thams cad paskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum lha dang mi'i bde ba rgyu zhide chab myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhacag gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ba de shams
cad de ltan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs
rje chen po'astobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi ba dang/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi lhashes pa bas ches 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang/ drang
srong mngon pa shes pa lnga can rnam pa snatshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad ras ches 'phags pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar
ca rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi spyod du gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang pa'i rgyal bo 'ase 'a ga de rgyanye nga dag par btu bshad do// mi'i/
rgyalapo'i dgos pa dang/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang/ rgyal po'i bgyi bo gang dag 'dzam bu'agleng tha2 sa cad namasapa dang nga dag bsems can 'di dag thams cad bad bar/
'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs 'is sargyas kyas/ gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dire'u bar
bstan/ yongs su bstan/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyud dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'ad gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ gus pas mchod par bgyi'o de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal
po chen po bzhi'i 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyi'i rgyal bo chen po khyed bzhi dbung dang galag tu bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal bo gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal 'di
nyan pa dang/ rim gro byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba char gyis shigo/ rgyal bo chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dag bstanam mdo sde'i dbang po'adzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang/ de dag lha dang/ mi deng/ lha ma yin du bcas pa 'jig rten 'di la
]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyalapo 'di rgyatshel yang dag par rab tu 'chad bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhes ni nas mngos le dbang nga
'dzin pa'i dog slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dag bstanam bsrungs pa dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ nad med pa dang/ 'khrug pa me da pa dang/ [– ]ngas
'gyur khang/ gsal 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba dang/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag pasnyan m/ dag bsnyan ma mde snga'i bang
'di'adzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs 'gyur ba'o/
denas rgyal po chen po rnam thosakyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen po mag ma bzang stan
las 'das te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgosanas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum tshul
tsamadang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa' dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri mesad pa'is// rgyal ba me 'od gzer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+mangumemed pa'i/
sbyin/ rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul mdatshams// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// na pochen duma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtshoye shesachuyiso gang// ting 'dzani
brgya phrag stong gas kun tu gang// rgyal ba'i zhabs 'khor ler bris pa ste// khor yugamu khyud de bzhin rtsub ma stong// phyag dang zhabasan dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dri ba dang pa'i
dbang po bzhi/ gser gyi'o bo lta burarab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gsar gyi ri dbang go/ 'on tan thams cad ' ri bo 'dra ba ste/ sangs rgyas 'i dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla'adra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chagasamad pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal la
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi latshigs su bcad de bka' stsalal/ stobs bcu dag gagasar 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'adebang bo rgyal po rab mchog 'di/
'jigerten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyisani// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// mdo sde 'di ltar dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed dang//
sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i mi// 'dzamabu'i gling 'di'i luna'ang gnas bar 'gyur// 'altag stong gsum gyi nistong chen gyi// 'jig rten dgan
ngan song sdug bsngal dang// sems can dmyal bsems can rnams kyin// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'agling 'od zhi yang// 'dzam bu'i gling
gnasargyal po thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' bachen bo bskyed nas// chos rnams kyisoni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang// shin tulalegs
nyamasakyang dgar 'gyur zhing// 'dzam bu'i glingashi themasacod dag na yang// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bgyis// 'di nam ye debang po gang rnams ni// yul la/
dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang// rgyal sridenum pa 'byor la dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan khaM bya// ba'ol dga'i yang dag zad byed pa// pha rol dgratshogs
zlog pa dag byed pa// mchog tu 'jigs pasa'aphongs pasal khyad ba// mchog tu dag khyadamado sde'i debang bo 'di// ji ltar ran chen shing ljon ra ba medzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung
khyim n yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang// mdosde'i dbang po mchog 'dodi ltar blta// jaltar chu grangaskom pasalakhyedapa// tsha bas nyam thag tsho ni rnyid pa
tsam ltar// yon tan dag gse skos ba'i rgyal bo la// mdo sde'i debang po'a mchog 'di de bzhinano// ji ltar nican thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rinachen snod lig mthil yod pa ltar//
ma yu dpang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdosna'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jig
rta skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi pa dag gis kun tu bsrungs ba yin// phyogs bcu dgan sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nirteg tu dgongs// mdo sde'i deb
bo 'din pishod pon// sangs rgyas rnams kyis lags zhes brjod pa bzhi/ gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tuu la yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga'
zhinger pa tumagu soms kyis// mdo sde'i debang po 'di me1na par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par 'gyur ba yi// lha yatshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag
kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'i rten par byed// chos rnams manyan par bya ba 'di yisani// gzi brjid dang nistobs dang brtson 'grus dang// gzi brjid chen po yisani
lha la lus// shin tu rgyas ngesnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lasatshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos dang/
tha kya/ mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyute/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig dus nas mchim phyis te// de dag lus 'phar/
yan lag kun 'adar zhing dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba bsal gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das la lha'il togaman+dar ba dag gis gtor mngon
par gtogo gtor mngon par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
[– ]de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen kho bzhi/ rgyal po chen po'i 'i yang gnod

phyin lnga brgya lnga brgyadang/ chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhane'aphrang bar bgyi'o// gsar 'od dam pa'i do sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba stabadun pa'o/// de nas lha mochen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
ngasalabatsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad cesagasol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhamechen mo dbyangs
tsawacan bdag gis kyang/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs ba nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag pa/
ba/ ge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi gsar 'od dam pa medisde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di los tshig gam/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dgacig yongs sunyams
bar gyur tam/ bskyedan bdag khas dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsol bskrun ba'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'od dam ba medosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i glingan mun 'ang du gnas shing myur du nub par ma 'gyur
ba dang/ samasacan dum de ga gis gsar 'od dam pam sde'i dengang po'argyal po 'di thos nas shes rab rno ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa dag pas 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyi phung po bsam
gyisemi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ tsha'adape tsho bun sumatshog sab rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ srog la phan gdags pa dang/ bsod nams kyi phung bo dbagatugamachis
parab tu 'dzin par 'gyur podang/ thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ bstan bcos thams cad lamakhas par 'gyur ba dang/ bzo'i bgyi be sna tshogs phun
00/ @#// sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bskyud pa mamachis par bgyi ba'i slad du de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos skya bde dang/ sems can chos
nyan pa de dag gdon gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi 'os brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skya ba dang/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rnyog
pa dang/ 'khrug glong dang/ khrag khrug dang/ rma'es ngan pa dang/ log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ byed dang 'o las thams cad 'batuzhi bar 'gyur/ gang gsemakhas
pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ shudag 'gi'u wang 'bu sug dang// sham sham shirisha// dbang po'i log dang skal khache// dz+ham shing tsa a karu//
shib tu dang srani gyis// gu gular sa sha lag gi/ rdo dreg 'domargya spos dang// tsan dan dang ni lding res dang// 'ga'u wur bcas ru rta dang// gur kum glasgang yungs kar dang// sbyimang
sugamalan la da// nag go sar u sha'i// 'di deganalenyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la brtags par bgyi// phyem lani sngagasatshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi//
tad+yathA/ su kri te/ kam lan la/ dzan kar te/ ang ka ra khe/ in dradzA la/ shad kad te/ bshad rje/ a par rtaka sa ke/ na kuta ku tA/ ka ba la/ ki lo ma ti/
0 kI la ma ti/ san d+hi/ d+hu rUm pa ti/ shi ri'i/ sad t+ya sI ti sAhA/
lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// ma togasal na dgram par bgyi'o// gser gyi snod dang dngul snod
kya ka yags ban/ khazhazhig dar yang gzhag bar bgyi/[….]rab tu brgyan pa'i bam bzhi/ na nan nas 'bagadad sul/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ ga mo yig[- ]
rtse sna sbal bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang bcad bar bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos ba brtsam// sngags kyi lasani 'di dag gis// mtshams bcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// spyod ya the dan/
ar ki/ na yan/ hil/ le/ ga'i/ kha ba le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snyam lags su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas khrus kyi 'bor sbyo'o//
tad+yathA/ sa ga ze ba go de/ ba go tA ba ti sAhA/ phyogs bzhi dag zhu ba dang gas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis srungs shig/ btsus pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang/ phung bo las kyi 'jigs
'byung dang// 'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyi dang// 'jigs pa ma bzad zhigyur cig/ tad+yathA/ sam/ gze ma sA/ sa la/ bi ga khe b+ha de swAhA/ sa gar/ sam
b+hu'u tAya swAhA/ skan d+ha ma tA ya swAhA/ nIl kan TA ya swAhA/ a par dzi to b+hin+d+hA ya swAhA/ a ba ti sam b+hu'u tA ya swAhA/ an mi la bag tu ya sAhA/ namo b+ha
ga ba ta brah+maNanam/ sa'i sUr+ya sid d+hunatuman trapa dI/ tar tupe tsi/ tamabre nu ma nutusAhA/ dag slong chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang/ chos mnyan pa de dag dang/ ya ger 'bri/
ba de dag gi don gyi slad du khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang
der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// jaltar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'an pa de dag gi srog la phan
gdags par 'gyur pa dang/ 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phur ma ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du blun
med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar gza' dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ btsas ba'i skar ma'i ginod pa dang/ rnal/
ngan ba dang/ log 'dren gyi bonod pa thams cad dang/ byad dang/ ro langs thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can
la lhamo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang bo la phan ba dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i par zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa na legs
so legs so zhes bya ba byon no// lha mo dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalanas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas slob dpon lung ston
ba bram bko'u nas lha mor byangs can dkug go/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can machod 'os dka' thubache// 'jigarten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tanache// rtsor gnas mdzesam dang/
mat+ta rtswa la gos bgos pa// dang b+hartswa ya gsagye rkang pa gcig ga gonas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'atshig shod lce khrol
gi/ spyod ya the dan/ mu ra ri'i/ a badzab ti/ hing gu la/ mang gul/ mde gu le/ pang ka la/ mung gu we/ mdAtsi/ sA ma ti/ daShA ma ti/ ag+ni/ mA
I ta'o/ ti ra tsa ba ti/ ci'i di shi reli// marAny+tsi/ pra Na ya laka/ dza hU~M/ lekaTi'i/ lo kapra ya/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+hilo/ ma bde na kha ni/ a pra ti
hati/ a pra ti hetabud d+hi/ na mu ci mahAmutsi/ mahA da'i/ prati gIn+d+he/ namasaran/ bdag gi blo thogs pamed par gyur cig/ bsten bcos dang/ tshags su bcad
pa'i rgyu dang/ sde snod dang/ snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi 'ogi sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+yathA/ mahApa b+ha bA/ hal halaM/ mi'i
malo/ bcom ldan 'dusaoM lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam pa brgyul bar gyur cige ka Ta/ kazhu'i/ ke yu'u wA/ bte/ hi lanolo hal me la/ ha'o hri
la sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ dbang po'i dan ba dang/ chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen m dgug bar bya'o// gang dag 'jig
rten na bden par smra ba de dag gi ngo den pa dang/ bden pa'i tsheg gis lha mochonamo dgug par bya'o// tad+yathA/ hi'i hi'i/ hi ma lo/ hil me la/ bdaga rnam par rgyu bar gyur
cig/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal la/ bdag la gsang sngags kyi chog rnams 'grub par gyur cige swAhA/ danas slob dpon lung ston pa khram ze ko'u danus/
lha mo chen mo dbyangs can latshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan bar gyis// lha dang dri ba lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
bud med dam balhago mchog gi ba gang yane// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan
ni yang sashi nga bsod nams 'bar// dumed la shas mtshon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// ri chen snatshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par de
bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub khyad pa dang/ yang dag bsngags dang yon tan byed pa dang// dri meda mchog dngapad+ma'abar ba dang// mi mchog dang dmag gi dem pa dang/ dag
ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang// yon tan bsam du med bas brgyan pa dang// zla ba 'dra dang dri med 'od dang// yang shos 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang// seng ge mchog dang mi
'don pa dang/ lag pa brgyad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhol// yad du 'ong ba'i dag dang dbyang saM snyan dang/ shes rab zab mo dang nildan pa dang//
dgosa mchog sgrub byed sems can dam ba dang// lha dang lhaman tshogs kun gnas brjod dang/ 'byung bo'i tshogs kyis gnas rtagamachod pa'i phyi'i sAhA// bdag cag lha ma 'di la phyag
bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par krung skyo'acig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/ ya gardzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag/
na// nang bar langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thamasacad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba chen thob par 'gyur// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po las/ dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mtshan mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lhamo chen mo dbalabadag gis kyang ci nas chos sgruba'i dge slong de yo byad bamAtshadagsum tshogs bar 'gyur ba dang/ bral 'khod pa ma mchis pa
thob par 'gyur ba dang/ soms brtas pa'i gyur ba dang/ sams bad bar gdugs mtshan khas par 'gyur ba dang/ gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang
ya gu rnam pa tha dad pa dgachub par 'gyur ba dang rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas ba stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun/
pa'i sems can de da ga gi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'do dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'adzamabu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing/ myur du nub bar mi 'gyur ba dang/
sems can rnams kyang gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'darkyen par 'gyur ba dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phragadumar lha dngamo'i bad ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ mu
gam mchas bar 'gyur ba dang/ le legs par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/
'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/
dud 'gro'i gnasaM dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thamasacad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar ganga'adi gos dang/ thos dang/ mkhacha dang/ kha'i gsos sman dang/
yo byad dang/ 'tshog chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rina chen me tog lan tan
rgyu mtsho'i khyung dang/ gsar gyir kha dog bzang po gsar du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang gang
du sems pa dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du blta ba dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba//
thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang/ skom dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ 'gron bu dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tagi dang/ bzhuchu dang/ dung/
dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram dang/ lo khyod gzhan dag gis kyang mi'i thongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yakhyad thams cad 'byor par
klu// 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dbal gyi mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo
chamo dpal gyi me zhes kyang lan gsum brjod cing/ de la gros dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog kyang byin l/ ro sna tshogs kyang bzhin/ de'i 'obu'i phung po chen bo rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa las ya bcud gnamakhara'aphol// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bul tog ldum sdong ldan lha rnams/// la tog
shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyod// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la/ lha mo chen mo dpal sems par 'gyur// de dag la dpal
chen gyi dpar 'gyur ro// lhamo chen mo dpa' ni lcang can gyi pho brang 'khor na skyadamos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ban/ rin po che sna bdulas byas pa'i khang pa dam
ba gsar gyi rgyalamtshan zhes bya ban gnas te/ mi gang la' 'bru'i phung po sgrol bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya khrus legs pa bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma
bgo bar bya/ gos dra'i gtub bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ma tog yon tanargya mtsho khruts+tshe dang/ gsagyi
khe dag bzang bo gsar du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi la gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyod/ ma tog dang/
bdug pa dang/ gros kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo'i rgyal bo'aming la lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha
mo chonamo dpal la langamachod cing/ ma tog dang bdug ba lad 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bulan/ gsa'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po 'di'i thus/ de'i lha
mochen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bu'i phung po yang rnam par 'phalakhar 'gyur ro// lha mchen mo dbal 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di
dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalale// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal to/ de dag la phyag 'tshalanasarig pa 'di degal sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cage/ spyang
la kha dan/ pra ti pu'unan ba ra/ sa man tadarani/ mahAbi hAr gti/ saman ta/ baman ta/ mahAk+kAraprati/ pra bani/ sad tA arbasam tanu pra pu'u'ia yAnad+ha
tAmahi/ pi gzhi/ mahA topasung hito/ hitaMsang gi samar gnu pA 'an/ 'di dgan spyi bonas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi rig

a gcig tu bon yang dag par grub pa sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can ba ma 'asbyod pa rnams dag pa'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis 'tsho bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag
pargyad ba'i bstan par gnas pa la bstenate/ bdag dang sems can kun thamasacad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga drodang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cud lam/
tog dang sngos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di'abyor par gyucig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shan
tugatsang mar byas la lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma yang gdang bar bya'o// sa lam tog gi si'o ma bkramanas bsdod par bya'o//
da nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'ongs nas dar gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin cad khyim snyam/ grong dam/ grong khya'am/ grong rdal lam/ gtsugalag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas
su nam yang brel cing 'phongs pamed par byed do// 'gron bu dang/ gser dang/ rin po che dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ yo byad thams cad 'abyor pa dang/ bde bar sbyor pa thams cad
kyis bde ba la 'gyur ro// dag pa'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lhago chen mo dpal lashas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ des na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur
bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gser 'od dam ba medosde'i dbang po'irgyal bolas/ dpal gyi lo'u zhes grub ste dgu pa'o////
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshala'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'ichen 'od gzar snang ba'i
tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gsar du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs la gsar du snang ba'i snying bo la phyag 'tshal lo/
de bzhinagshegs pa de lo brgya'i 'od gzer snang ba'i snyade po la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsa' dang ni kho tsho'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin
gshegs pa gsar gyi ma ga 'bar ba'i 'od gzur gyi tog la phyag 'tshala'o// de bzhin gshegs ba sgron mchan bo la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshags pa'in chen tog la phyag 'tshal
lo/ byang chub sems dpa' madzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang/
byang chub sems dang ba rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba dang/ ya phyogs de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa zhes
bya ba dang/ lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa zhi chen tog ces bya ba dang/ nub phyogasan de bzhin gshegs patshodapagamed ces bya ba dang/ byang phyogasan de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya
sta sugs 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin nam/ ga gam/ khong du chud
par byed na de rtag tu rabs dran par 'gyur ro//danas bcom ldan 'das la// sa'o lhamo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsar
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di de lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal m/ ljongasasam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljong
na/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngan/ grong khyer na/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ gon pa'i phyogs sam/ 'i sman ljong ngam/ pho brang 'khor
de'i btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lhamo brtanom bdagamachibar bgyi'o/ khacom ldan 'das gang na gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par
'gyur ba dang/ sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba pa'i chos kyi khri gshom par 'gyur la dad/ gang dang gang du chos skya ba stana' mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa ma de sde'i dbang
po'i rgyal bo 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan m dag sa phyogs de dang de dag tumachi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar/
chos kyi khri'i 'og legs su mchis te/ yan lag gi dmar mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mtha' nas brtan par bgyi'o/ bdag kyang chos manyan pa dang/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis
tsham par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o// bdagatshim par gyur/ me gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i
phung po dbag tshad stong drug cu rtsa brlud po 'di zhes sa'i ga'ardo rje la thug pa'i bar du/ sa'i khorud kyis rnam por 'bal bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par
bgyi'o// stong du yang rgya mtsho'ametha' la zug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'daso'i bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di reb tumadangs dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam
bu'agling 'dire rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags lasna tshog sa rnams mdangs dang ldan par 'khrungs par 'gyur/ kun dga'i ra ba dang/ nags tshal dang/ shing
ljon pa thams cad dang/ lem dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog rnam pa snatshogs thams cad kyang rab tumadangs dang ldan par 'gyu/ dridangarab tu
ldan pa dang/ snum pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang/ zhim por 'gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug ba dang/ rab tucha ba'a'agyur ro// sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang bza' ba ma pa sna tshogs de dag
'tshal nas/ tshe dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dung/ dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzi bodi dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzugs dang ldan par
nas kyang/ sa lamachis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong du ma dag bgyid bar 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyid pa'i las rnams
bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasargyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi ba dang/ 'galegs pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ mi'i skye bo mang po sa
gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzamabu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshog sakhyong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ kha
dog dang/ gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gas 'od dam ba medo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i srid du dge slong ngam/ dge slongag 'am/ ga bstananam/ dge bstanam mdo sde'i
[4 ]dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi snyan lamachisaba'i gan dumachi bar 'gyur/ mchesanas kyang sems rab tu dang pos sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gsar
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'khas par 'gyur ro// ci'i slad du zhen/ btsun pa/
bcom ldan 'das gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal bo 'di'i pa tu bshad na/ sa'i lha mo brtan m bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu gdangs dang ldan pa dang/ rab tustobs
dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjidIdang/ dpal dang/
phun sumatshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dasetsham par gyur/ gzi brjide dang/ stobs dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ [” ]shugs chen po thob par gyur nas/ gzhon po dang gatshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzamakhu'i gling 'dasa'i ricud chen pos rnam par 'phal bar gyur/
sachen po mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phal zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ chen por yang
'gyur ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang longs spyod dang longs su spyod pa sna tshog sal spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba yang myong bar 'gyur/
