de dag thams cad bza' ba dang/ btang ba dang/ bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ gos dang/ malachadang/ gnas dang/ khang pa dang/ gzhal mang khang dang/ dmos tshal
tshu dang/ chu bo dang/ rdzi dang chumag dang/ mtshe'u dang/ mtshodang/ lteng ka dang/ 'di lta bu yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs sa la gnas pa// sa las byung ba/ sa la brtan/
pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyuro/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bas pa gzo bar bgyi'o// gdon ma 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo
snga'i dbang po rgyal ba 'debs stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ blagar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
gang gi tshesems can de dag chos sba ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du li sa tha dad pa dang/ khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung stamachis nas/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'argyalapo 'di nyen par
gyur la// thos nas kyang rang rang gi rogs dang/ khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong rdal tha dad pa dab/tu zhugs Mnas/ rang rang gi khyomen gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skyedas/
[s ]bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa khrab mo 'os so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo// bdag cag gis chos nyan pa des de bzhin gsheg
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dgamanyes par byas so// dang bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'das sems can dmyal ba las yongasasu thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten dang/ yadegs kyi yul 'das yongs su thar te// deng bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ tsha rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mar skye bar yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur/ khyim tha dad pan gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'dalasal na dpa
gcig brjod dam/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dilas zan le'u gcig gam/ sngon 'byung ba gcigegs/ than byang chub sems dpa' mong ngo// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ ban tshe bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ rig gcig cige nyananam/ sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/
than gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po 'di mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston dom/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sa ma sa can rnam pa tha dad ba de dag sa phyogs rnam
pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtamatshigs rnam pa snatshogs 'di lta bu 'di deg gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam rgyud brjod na//
[«]1 btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shan tumadangs dang ldan pa dang snam par 'gyur// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phur so'i bcuda rnam pa sna
rogs dang/ u bad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/ rnam pa'i phol kher 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bodi bar 'gyur ro// nor
chab dang/ longs sbyong che ba dang/ sbyin pa 'chos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyura'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis/ sa'olham brtan galadi skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo brtan m sems can gang la la dag gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo 'argyal po 'di las thazhatshig gcige
nyanan/ de dag ge'i 'gen 'di nas shi 'phosanas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lho'i ra sa kyi nang du/ lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhigetu skye bar 'gyure// sa'i lha mo sems can gang
lal dag gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di le mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs par brgyan par byed dam/ na gdugs gcig gam/ bdan gcig gam/
ras bcos bu gcig gis ga legasan/ sa'ilhamo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'ded ban stod pa lha'i sa bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin pache sna bdun gyi ga'alamadu khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs
par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshesems can de dgan me'i 'jig rtena'od nas shi 'phos te 'an po chesna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skya ba de'atshi/ sa'i lha mo/
ni po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de der ya lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro/ lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang med bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka'
stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das des n sa'i lho mo brtan m bdag dag slong chos smra ba/ chos
kyi stan la mchis pa de'i chos kyi snyan gyi 'og legs kyis phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsan pa'i sems can
de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'argyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams kyang gsala'od
dam pa mdosde'i debang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bsal pa ba ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa myong bar 'gyur
bdang/ da bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs por 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i gyi gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba lus mgoda' bar bgyis te/
dag slong chos smra ba de'i sked pa la lan lag gi dam pamagos brten bar bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lhamo'ale'u zhes bya ba ste bcupa'o//
de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lang dgashes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
ngas la btsugs to/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma
'ongs pa'i dusan gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyalapo 'di grodangs/ grong khyer na/ grong rdal lan/ ljongs sam/ gon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i smonaljong
ngan/ pho brang 'khor gang du'abyung bar 'gyur bder/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ba/nod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyashertsa brgyad po de dag dang
tsal ba/ lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri smon ljong ngam/ pho bang 'khor der mabar bgyi'o// lus mi gda'/
bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung bar bgyi'o// longs su bskyab pa dang/ longs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde
legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyas ba'am/ bud mad dam/ khyolu'ag/ bumo tshes nyan pa de dag thams cad dang/ gang su dgagasar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rkyel po
'di las thanAtshig bzhi po'atshogs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang/ tha na tshig gcig dang/ than gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'al po 'alas byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcige
gam/ de bzhanagashegasala'i mtshan gcig thos par gyur te bzung ba dang/ than gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'di'aming thos par gyur te 'byung ba de dag thams cad
kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
rigs de dag dang/ khyim de dag dang/ grong de dag dang/ grong khyer de dag dang/ grong rdal do dag dang/ dgon pa de dag dang/ pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o//
yongs su bskyab pa dang/ longs su bskyang pa dang/ yongs bzung ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde 'gasasu 'gyur bar bgyi/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'adus rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lang dag shesazhes ming du chags par gyur can/ 'din detsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mongo sumamo// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang/ chos thams cad ji lta ba dang/ gnas pa gang lags pa dang/
chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi rigs gang lags pa dang/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adasachos thams cad bdag 'a mngon sumatsho// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
chos thams cad la bdag gi yi shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis khyab bo// ye shes kyi ngag gsal ba bsamagyis ma khyab bo// ye shes kyi sgrub bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi phung bo bsam
gyisam khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi legs shasakyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis khyab bo// btsun po bcom ldan 'das thaltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag
bar 'tshal ba dang/ gang dag par yongs su brtags pa dang/ yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang/ yang dag par rnam par bltas pa dang/ yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu
des n/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gsedag klo tshos sgrub pa'i tshig brgyan par bgyi
ba'islad du shobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nasachos smra ba de lus l de'akhar 'gyur ba dang/ lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ rab tu dga' bar skyakhar 'gyur ba dang/ gang
gi slad du sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dag ba'i lto ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'argyal po 'di 'dzam bu'ang du yun ring du gnas shing
myur du nub ba'am 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams kyang gsang 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'di nyen par 'gyur ba dang/ ya shas kyi phung po bsam gyis ma khyab pathob par
'gyur ba dang/ shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ ma'ongs pa 'dusan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar
lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ikhyang
tshub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ba dang/ samasacan dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'ogerten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad
par 'gyur ba de'i spyi'i bu ga rnams sumadangs stsal bar bgyi'o// de'ilus lamathudang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus chen bo bstod par bgyi'o// de'i ye
a shas kyi snang ba bsam gyisom khyab par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o// de cher spro bar bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yang dag shes kyi le'u
zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig kha'o/ 'a phags pa gsega'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po bzhi bo//
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rinechen ma tog yon tan mtsho khrun dang gser gyi kha dog bzang po gsar du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal

bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongo phrag dums sku lags par brgyabag chos kyi sgronam 'di 'bar ba mdzad pa shAkya
thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// lhamoche med pal yon tan gyi 'bru dang bkra shis dpag tu mad pa phun sum tshogs pa de la phyag 'tshalal// lhamo chen mo dbyangs can shes rab kyi yon tan dpag
tumad pa 'dus pa dol phyag 'tshalal// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi debang bo'i tog gis/ bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la dbang bskur nas rang po ma len pa rgyal srid la gsar du

tsa gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu gang ngas sngon dbang bskur nas nga pom lon pa zhigen yaba mchog gi debang po'i tog las blangs pa rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'adematshigecas bya ba zhig
yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'debang po'i dam tshig des l te khri'i bar du rgyal potade byas par gyur te/ tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam gyi tshod kyang sngon tshesam yin pas phyogs 'ga'/
zhag la gnas par ma shes so/ bu rgyal bo'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dmatshig ces bya ba de gang na/ de nas rigs kyi lcamo de'i tshe de'i dusanargyal po stebs kyi dbang po'i tog gis/ bu
rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la rgyal bo'abestan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dematshig ces bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsargya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sems can kun la phan byed pa//
tsom thams cad gcod pa bo// nyes byas thams cad 'jige byed ba// rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya// rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la//
lha la dbang po 'diratshig kun// thalamo sbyar te mnyanapar byos// rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri debang 'dir// lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang lan dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rten
skyong ba rnams kyang las// khyod ni lhogatsotshongs pa ste// khyodan lho rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod ni bdag cag tha tshom gcod// bdag cag dogs pa gcod du gsol// ma'i skyes pa
sa rgyal po la// ji lte kun sgyu zhes bya// gang gi rgyus na rgyal bo la// lha sras zhes zhi bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lhun ji lta bur// mi lo 'ge rten 'di'i skye
zhing/ mi bdag gyur te mnims la// rgyal po nyiden bgyid bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de skad yongs su dris pa dang// lha yagatso bo tshangs pa des/
'jagerten skyong la 'doskad smras// deltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// da ltar bdag la dris pas na// sems can kun la ban ba'i phyir// bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan//
ma yo gnas su skyes pa yi// rgyal bo rnams kyi skyo bdag/ gang gis na yul rnams su// rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad pabya// lhadabang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// ma yi rum
du 'jug 'gyur to/ lha yis sngar na byin brlabs nas// phyi nasamangal du 'jug par 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur/
bas na// des n lha yi sras zhes bya// khyodan lho kun bu yan zhes// sum nurtsa gsum lha dbang gis// rgyal po'i skyel ba khyin nas ni// mnems kyi ni dbang por sprul// nyes par byas
b rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin pa zhage pa dang// sems can legs khyod dgongs pa dang// lha yi gnas su brgya ba'i phyir//mi yi deng bo mi shig dang/ lha shes dang dri ba'igs gdol pa'i shas dang
0 srin shas kyis// nyes par byed pa zlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams la// mi yo de bang po pha ma'i shas// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yas rgyal por byin
gyis brlabs// tsho'adi'i tshigs par byas pa dang// nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi// rnamasmin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phu// lha yas rgyal por byin gyis brlabs/ yulan nyis
byed gnas ba dag/ gang tsho rgyal pos yal bor zhing// sdig pa can gyi spyi bo la// mthun pa'i chad pasam gcod cing// nyes pAr byed pa yal bor bo// de chachos min shin tu 'phel//
'thab me dang na g.yo rnams kyang// yul 'khor der ni phyi'i 'byung// sum cu rtsa gsum khang pan// lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// mul la ltas byed gnasab dag/ gang
tshargyalakhos yal bor ba// de tshe g.yon bzad pa// drag po rnams kyis yul 'dzoms 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs lhagasanasasu// yul 'khor de ni rnam pa'i gi/ longs
spyoda rnams dang 'gis kyang 'jig/ gangag nor bsags yod pa yang// g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du na 'brog pa tsho'agyur// bya ba gang gis rgyalapo nyid// bya ba de mi
khyod na// glang chen dbang pos ljang bu bzhin// rang gi yul 'khor kam par 'jig/ mtshungs pa larlung ldang zhing// ma'angs pa yi char ba 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang// gza'i dang
rgyu'am rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yul bar bor na der// sa khon le tog tog 'bras// legs par smin par la 'gyur zhing// mu ga dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/
yulan nyes byed gnas pa dog/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// de tshe lha rnams khang pa na// yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// lta rgyal dbang po de dag kun// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te//
tshesaman phyogs la gnas ba'o zhes// phan tshun du na smyo bar 'gyur/ rgyal 'dase 'ang bor mi thogs par// lha rnams 'khrug bar byed pa/'gyur// lha rnams ring du 'khrugs pas na//
da yi lulan rnam par 'jage lul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing// mtshon chas kyang/ 'jig par 'gyur// g.ye rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang// nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur//
lha la dbang po rab khros shang// lha rnams kyis kyangoyal bar 'dor// yula 'khor de na ldem par 'jog/ rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed// spunanam yang na bu yang rung// sdug
ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur// sdug ba'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// mang na bu mo'achi bar 'gyur// skar mda' dag kyang ltung bar 'gyukaM/ de bzhin tami 'dra ba 'byung// pha 'o
gyi ni dmag tshogs dang// chu gshin tu 'byung ba'i 'gyur// de ya glong po 'phangs pa dang// blon po 'phangs nga 'tsha de'i 'gyur// de yi 'og tu rta mon// 'phongs pa dag kyang
'amanger 'gyur// khyim dang longs spyod rnams kyang// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du mtshon cha yis// phan tshun dag tu 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab mo dag
dang rtsod dang gol// yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul 'khor dun gdon 'jug cing/ ma bcad pa yazhed kyang 'byung// de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang chos daldan ba ma gyur// de te kho
dang blon po la// chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang ma ldan skya bo 'a// de ya bo gtumachod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan ba'i sems can la// rtag tu chad pas gcod bar 'gyur//
chos dang ma ldan skya bo bkur// chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung// rnam gisum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur// chos min skyo bo bzung bsan/ dam chos
ra la snying po medangs// sems can mdangs dang sa ya bcud// dngos po rnam gsum rnam po'agi/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkug cing// su bodam pa smad pas na// 'chi dang rtsi 'bab mug
dang// rnam pa gsum de 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu le toge dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu mad par 'gyur// sems can nd pa mang po dag/ yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
dngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag lul rnams nan med pa yang// kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang// chung ba dgan nyid du 'gyur// rtsa dang dgod dang dga' ba dang// sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos po
[&zs ]@#// dang// dga' ba nyams na dga' 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yas rnam par 'khrugs// lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi// snam dngos khu ba zad pas na///
Dalus dang khams dang dbang po// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyu/ sems can rnams medog ngan zhing// mthu chung shin tu rid par 'gyur// khachasamang po zis kyang ni// rim pa'i gyur
'am yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang// de yi 'og tumadapar 'gyur// sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag/ yul rnams sun 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad
'a kyis gzir pa la// sems can nd mang 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i// gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos ma'i phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal
po chos dang mi ldan bs// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshargyalapo phyogs gnas te// zhes khyad lo' bar 'dor ba'i tshe//
'di 'dra'i nyes pa dum dag/ ul rnamusu 'byung bar 'gyur// dgos pa gang phyir lha dbang gis// rgyal pa khyon gyis brlabs pa la// rgyal po nyaden ma byed cing// nyes byed pa la bar
'do'o zhan// legs par byas pas sems can M rnams// lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye// nyes par byas pa ya degs dang// sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye// gang tshe rgyal po'i
[f ]tshul rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sumacu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas// nyes pa byas pas ltung bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyidan ma byed na// de ni bu la ngam yin la// lha
yi rgyal bo rnams kyi// gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur// g.yon shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyiri lha yi dbang po yis// ma gnas
rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// ltos pa byas pa zhi bya'i phyir// legs par khyod la 'dzud pa ste// tsha'adi lon sems can l// rnam smin spyod pa rgyal po yin// legs byas dang ni nyes
byas kyi// las kyi rnam par sman ba'i 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang/ yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/
lha tshogs rnams kyi bon gyis brlabs// lha rnams dag kyang sa yi rang// yul 'khor rnams skyo ba'i// sdig can ga lan can gdul ba dang// yul gyi chos kyi don gyi po'i srog
dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang// chos ma yin pa bgrod byed cing// shes bzhin yal bar 'doran ni/ yulan 'jigs pa ma khezad pa// de 'dragazhanan yod ma yin// jaltar g.yo//
rnams byung ba la// g.yo byed chad pasam bcad na// yul dushanetu mi bzad pa'i// g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyi rdzong chen bzhin// yul 'khor
de nim par 'ge/ lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bsan// de
'i sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i me bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyis yula 'khor bskyang btu// chos ma yAne ba snyadam bye// srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing// nyes mgon bya
bar mi bya'o// skyo bo gnyenadang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skya bo thams cad la// rgya'apos phyogs kyang gcige bya la// phyogs su lhung ba gyur tare// rgyal pa chos dang ldan pa yi//
grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na// lha yi dbang po dga' 'gyur te// 'dzam bu'i glingan nged kyikhu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos kyis
yul 'khor der bstan nas/ legs pa byed l skya bo dgod// rgyal po de ni le gas byed pas// skye bo dgan dpe'agyodad// lha dang lha ma khu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snyam
mo chos kyis yul 'khor der bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang gyur pas// mi yi rgyal po de la bsrung// nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyaskar
legs par bar 'gyur// rlung yang de bzhin ldang 'gyur zhing// char pa'i ng dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnams su la 'gasakhyid//
[&sz/ ]lha dang lha yi khu rnams kyi// lha la gnas rnams gang bar byed// de lta bsan rgyal po las// bdag gi 'bangs pa'i srog gtang gi/ gang gis 'jig rten bder 'gyur la// dkon mchog
chos n mo btang ste/ yon tana rnams kyis gang brgyan pa// chos dang ldan pas bstan par bya// rang gi skye bosartag dga' kha// rtag tu sdig ba rnam par spangs// chos kyis yul 'khor
bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la sems can dgod// nyes byed las bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin 'dul bar byed
ba'i tshe// yul 'khor du lo legs shing// rgyal po'i khe zi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing// skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar sbyong/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo
snga'i dbang po'irgyal po las/ rgyal bo'abistan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dmatshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste btuganyis pa'o///gang tsho 'khor lasasgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur//
de tsho mtshor bcas pa'iso rnams btang/ gling bzhichonagang bar banus pa yang/ sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas lul la// chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyi'i/ gang sngon yod du
'ong zhing 'bangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngasan mo btang med// bskal po dumar 'phangs pa'i srog kyang btang// ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar
gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs de yi// bstanal legasabyung zhes bya'irgyal po byung// de na gling bzhi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur// rgya mtshor thug
a pa'i sa lar ba tu ston// rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal ba'i pho brang na// de tshe rgyalapo dag gnyid kyis lego/ molag duzhusang sargyas yon tan thos// chos sgarinatshon sogs ba gnyis bsul
sgyu na rnamakhar lhang nger mdo sde'irgyal po 'di// rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar gyur// rgyal po de nage nyid kyis leg las sad// de la lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur// mgu
nas rgyal bo'i khab nas mngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun mchog de gnas su song// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams mchod byed cing// 'phagasaba'i dge 'dun 'di ni 'an chen sogs//
yon tan ldan pa'i dge 'dun gang 'od ces// chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// da yitshan rane chon sogs ban// phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur to// mdo sde'irgyal po 'di
zla nanis sbalal// kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'gro/ dag slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gza brjid dpal gyisor ba 'bagazhang/ bug gzhan zhig gnang na 'dug gyur
ba de yitsho na rgyal po de la bstan// 'dan chos smra rin sogs pa 'di/ rgyal bo'i spyod yul thabago 'dzin pa ste// gsal 'od dam pa zhes bya ba la// mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po
rtag tu ston// na chen sogs pa'irkang la phyag 'tshalate// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du
gsol/ rgyal bo legs par byung ba de nyid la// ni chen sogs pas khasan glengs pas na// stong gsum pa yi 'ogirten thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur//
de tsham lo debang bos sa phyogagasan// gtsang zhing mchogatukhyad par 'phags pa der// rin chen chu dang sos chus chag chag btab// ma tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos
khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang// dar yug stong phrag dumasulegs par brgyan// rgyal pos khri dil tsan dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// lha dang klu
da lhamanama'im// gnod sbyin dbang dang mkha'alding lta'abu ches// lha yime tog man da ra ba'ichar// khridi'anamengon par rab tu phab// chos 'dod lhan bye ba khrag khrig stong
bsam gyis ma khyob gang dag lhags gyur pa// ne chen sogs pa mngon pa phyung ban// sA la'am tog dag gse mngon par 'thob// chos sgra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang/ shin tu
lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos te// khri der nye bar song bar byas nas// thalatsho sbyar ba byas te phrug kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dug nas me tog/
mnadar// char pa 'babs shing sa la snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis ma khyab rab tu sgrogs par byed// rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos skades// phyogs bcu dag na
sangs rgyas bya ba stong// bsamagyis ma khyab pa dag dran byas nas// de mngon pa'i dzegs te 'dug pa gyur// sems can kun la snying brtsa bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sams kyang yang dag
bskyod byas te// rgyal po legs par byung ba de lani// de yi tshon mdo sde 'di bstagate// rgyal bo thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su// tshag gcig gson rjes su ya ring ste// chos kyashugs/
kyis mgo nas mchem byung// ded ya lus n dga' bas khyab par gyur/ mdo sde'al mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe rgyal po lags par byung ba las// yid bzhin nor bu rinachen rgyal po blangs//
sems can rnams pa'i smon lam btab pan// nechen bdun dang ldan ba'arkyen rnams dang// gang yang 'adzam bu'i klong 'dar sems cano rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'anor buchen po la//
chag pa de ring 'dzamabu'i gling du phob// de yatsho'anichen sna bdun dang// dpung brgyan dang nadishal na cha mchog/ de bzhan zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang

gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam glididu/ 'chon char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas// gla ba'on chen gang bar bcas pan// ranechen gtsug tor can gyi bstan laphul// de
bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga// rgyal po 'gas par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi deg le chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshang sa yengs su btang// gang gis rgyal po legs
par byung de 'a// de tshe mdo sde 'dane'ib bstan pa// rin chen sogs dachos smad ge slong de// de bzhan gshegs pam 'khrugs dar gyur to// ngas gang de tshomado sde 'di thos shing/ tshig
gcig gsonarjes su yi rang ste// nga ni dge ba'i lasani de nyid dang// chos manyan pa dang rjesasu li'ong bas// gsar gyi mdog dang bsod nams rgya yamtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mangs

la= lha stong bya pa rab tu dga' ba byed// skye bos mthong na dga' khus rtag tu thob/ khasal padag na bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu banu rtsa dgu'i 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa ba stong du ma
mang bor yang// ngasan khacas rgyal po mang bar gyur// bskal pa bsamakyis khyab brgyabyin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no// gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i//
stobs bcu bgame las name rtas par byas/ ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang du// bsod nams phung po de ltatshang mdamang// bsam pa ji bzhin ngasan khyeng chub thob// chos sku dmar
yang na nges thobago/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo 'argyal po las/ legs par 'byung ba'ile'uzhes du ba sta bcu gsum pa'o//
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhag 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da lta byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis//
mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shang rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing 'das pa dang/ ma'ongs pa dang/ @# daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul zab
mo longs su shes par 'dod pa des gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang lags r 'od dam pa mdo sde'i ngobang po'i rgyal bo 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston ba'i phyogs/
der des gdon mi za bar g.yengs pa med pa'i sems kyis rna blags te/ gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'irgyal bo 'di mnyen par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phure da'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang 'gasangs rgyas thams cad l// bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing// sangs
rgyas kun gyi spyod lulag/ zab mo yang tu shes 'dod pas// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam// ganganagasar 'od dam pa la// mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro
bar bya/ mdo 'di khesam gyis ma khyab ste/ yon tan rgya mtshomatha' yang yas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dum las// sems can thams cad thar par byed/ mdo sde yon thogs dang//
da sadang de bzhin thams shing// mdo sde'i dbang po rab zab ste// 'di'i dpan yid m yin// gang dang ni sa rnams dang// rgya mtshodazhimamakha' la// gunasapa'i rdulan gang yang rung//
dpor bya ba na me nus so// chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug pa yis// de yi tshig 'jug pa bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten// zab rab brtan gang yin pa/ mchod rten du yi dbusan ni
rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong// yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su// mdosde 'di ni reb tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye ba ji snyed pa// lha ya de ni mesnems
kyi bde ba dag ni rjes su myong// gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyen pa// de ltar bdag gis bsod nams kyi// phung po bsam pas bsgrub snyam du// de tshades ni de ltar shes// mas
gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yaso// dpag tshad brgyadag 'da' byed cing// tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo sde mnyan par gang nus pa/ gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du//
zhugs nas de ma thag tu// sdig pa rnams named par 'gyur// rmongonamtshan nyid thams cad dang// gza' dang skar gnod pa dang// byad dang gdon mi bzad dang// zhugs nas
dam thag tu na// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis// rmi lam bstan pa 'dra bor// der ni pada'adra ba'i khri// de lta bur lang bshamapa bya//
khri de la'i du gnas su// mdo sde 'di'i rig tu bstan// ma ger bris pa klog par byed// de bzhin yongs su chub par bu/ khri de lasa'i pe bas nas su// yul gzhan
[“”]song bar gyur na yang// khri de lan yid pa yi// cho'aphru'a rnams kyang snangabar 'gyur// chos sgrub gzugs su yang// de na'os 'ga' snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' sangs rgyas
gzugasasu ste// res 'ga'akhyang chub sems dpa' yang// res 'ga' kun bzang po dang// de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs suste// ris 'ga'akhyams po'agazugs su yang//
khridi lan snang bar gyur// resa'aga'a'od zhi'iba' zhig snang// sa 'ga' lhan ms snang bar 'gyur/ lud tsam lhage na der snang nas// de nas mi snang par yang 'gyur/ sangs
rgyas mthong an bsngags par 'gyur// thams cad du yang grub par byed// 'bru dang bkra shis phun sumatshogs// mtshan masangs rgyas sprul pa yine// rgyal dang dpal dang grags par
byed// phyi rgol ba yang zlog par byed/ pha'ol dgu tshog sar btu'ajoms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// rmingan thams cad zho khir byed// sdig pa thams cad lag tu 'gi/
sdig pa thams cad rab zhi khyed// g.yul 'gyed pan rgyalakha'abyed// 'dzamabu'i gling 'dathegos cad du// grags pas rab tugang ba'agyur// de la degra rnams thams cad ni// ni
00cu'aphan pa nyid du 'gyug/ rtag tu dgra ni chom par 'gyur// sdig pa thamasacad rnam par sbyangs// g.yul ngo'irtsilas rnam par rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs
dpang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang// de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang// lag na rdordzoganod sbyin dbang// rgyal ba'i khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang// da bzhin
dun rgya mtshodabang// mi deb nyi dbang man dbang// de bzhinanam mkha' ldang da bang bo/ de dag las nasogs pa dang// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang// chos kyi mchod rten bsam
yasal// rtag tu mchod pa khyad par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'isems can rnams// mthong nas shanatu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'di snyam
sams par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang// phan tshun dan smo byed pa// bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la ltos// dge ba'i rtsa ba
sbyangs ba gi mi rnams do dga' 'i lhags te/ gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di// nyan ba'i phyir no 'od lhags pa// dad pa bsam gyis ma khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang
cas// de dag 'jig rten snying rjer ldan// dedag sems can ban byed pa// de dag zabamo'i chos rnams kyis// dam pa chos kyi ri la snyed// chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug pa yis// de
dga' tu 'jug pa yin/ gang dag gsar 'od dam pa'i mdo// dag pa dam pa 'danyenapa// de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams l mchod pa yin//
dge ba'i rtsa ba de yison// mdo 'di+in pa de dag la// lha dbang rgyal po de kun dang// dbyangs can dang ni dod bzhin du// dpal dang rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi nems
dang/ gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrulaldan rnams kyi// phyogs bzhi de ni kun nas kyang// srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// dbang po zla ba gshin rjadang//
rlung dang chu lhanyid dang ni// skamakhyed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang// sbyin sreg za dang skya dgu dang// stobasachen pha rol gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang// nyin mtshan g.yel
bad bar na// de dag rnams la srung byed pa// stobasachen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang// srad yod bu dang dbang phyug che// yang dag shes la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang nyi shu
brgyad dang// gnod sbyin brgyaphrag stong bo dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad na// de dag la srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin
dpang// gnod sbyin dgon lnga brgyadang/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyang// de dag lan srung bar byed// gnod ni dbang po nor bu bzang// de bzhin gang ba bzang bo dang///
ci'i jags dngan 'brog gnas dang// dmar ser dang na ser skya dang// gnod sbyin dbang po re re yang// gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gsen// gang dag mdo sde 'di thob pa// de dag rnags la
srung byed 'gyur/ dri ze sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba'i khyu mchog rgyal bo rgyal// nor bu'i mgul dang ngasam na dang// de ba zhanechar pa'i bdag po dang// khams po ched nganag po/
dgo/ de bzhin gsar 'dra'i skadang/ ldas rtsin dang ni rkang dang// de bzhin skal ba chen bo dang// yur ba can dang chos skyong dang// spre 'u de bzhine'akhra byed dang// khabakyi
spudang gtatshe bshes dang// de bzhin ni chen sku dang/ lur checan dang byasemed dang// 'dod pa'i'atsho btsan dan dang/ mthu bo che dang gangs can dang// bde ba'i 'o nyid de bzhin
stobs chen pa'il gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag kyang/ gang dag mdo sde 'di dag la// de dag lan srung bar byed// klu la dbang po ma dros dang// de bzhin
dun rgya mtshodang// a la'i 'dab dang btung bzung dang// dga' bo to dga' gnyis ka dang// klun brgya phrag stod po dag/ stob gachanardzu 'phrul sngon nums kyang// 'jigs shing
sgrig pa thams cad las// de dag la srung bar byed// stobs can sgra gcan ma gtong dang/ thags zangs se dang bde mchog dang
lha min dub nga gzhan dang// lha min brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/ 'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las// de dag la ni srung
[“”]bar 'gyur// 'byung bo'ame mo' phyogam/ lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang// 'dug dang nyal dang 'a'i mi// dedag lan srung bar byed// gdol pa mo dang gtumamo dang/ de
zlo bzhin gnod sbyin khog tum mo dang// mdung can dang sa brtsegs dang// sems can kun gyi gzi'aphrog ma// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang// thogs/
bzhi dag ni kun nas su// de dag rnams la srung bar khyad// dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams/ lha mo bsam gyis ma khyab dang// dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha mo dag
ni thams cad dang// sa yi lha mo 'di dang// lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang/ kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas ba dag dang krung lha dang// lhan ms de dag thams cad
'di'i// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyisogi/ gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dga rnams la srung bar byed// tshongang mdog dang stobasa rnams la// sems can dag na sbyor bar byed//
lo dpal dang bsod nams gzi rjid kyi/ phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dag/ de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// rgud dang sdug dang ngon pa// de dag
sa thams cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen ldan pa la// sa ya lce mo nyid kyang ni// gsar gyi 'od kyi dem pa yi// mdo sde'i debang po'i 'i yase chem// dpag tshad dag na brgya yi brag///
stong phrag dru gzhutsA brgyadanas// derdzo gnas la thug bar du// sa yi bcud rig tu 'phel// dpagatshad brgya 'tshong ba la/ 'og tus la bcud song ste// de'i phyir yang log nas// sa ya
stong dag snam par byed// mdo'adi nyen pa'istobs kyis// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang// gser gyi'od 'dim pa la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ris tshami 'gyur// mdangs dang ldan/
pa'i ba 'gyur zhing// de bzhine'ab tu stobs ldan 'gyur// bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur// 'dzamabu'i gliba'odi thems can// 'bras bu lo togonags lha rnams// sna tshogs
rolas tshig 'gyur zhing// shin tur tu dga' ba'agyur// mdo 'di'i ri lasatshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang// ma tog rnam pa snatshogs dang// 'bras bu'i
shing ljonasnatshogs kyang// kun nas rab tu skye bar byed// 'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang// kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams// me tog rab tu 'gas byed cige/ sna
tshogs drin rab tu 'byin// ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang// 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi// rtswa dang nagasatshal thams cad dag/ sa la stongan skye bar byed// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di
thams cad na// klu yi bu mo bsamam khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sams gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du khyer song ste// rdzing bu rnams thems nad du/ ku mu da
ma dang pa dadang// ut+pal dang de bzhin du// bad+madakar po sna tshogs skye// nam mkha' la ni du ba dang// sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag/cun pa brtul cing rnams btudogs 'kho// nye mo 'od
lci gza' stong ldan yag/ 'od gzer dra bas 'od kyang mdzes// snang ba dag zab mo yis// rab tu dga' bar 'bar bar 'gyur// dbang po nye me lha yi bu// 'dzam bu'i gling gi gsar
gyi// gzhalamad khang na 'dug pa yang// mdo sde 'dis red tu chem// dbang po nyame'ab dga' nas// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'char byed cing// 'od gzer mtha' yas dra ba yis/
kun nas rab du snang bar byed/ desher ba tsamakyis kyang// 'od gzer dra ba rab gtong sheng/ rdzing bu sna tshogs khebs pa// pad+madagan kho yang 'byed// 'dzam bu'i klonge 'dathems
cad du// ma tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs// yang dag longs su smin byed cing// sarnalas thams cad tshim par byed// zla ba dang na te me yang// nga tshakhyad 'phags sna nga bar 'gyur//
rgyaskar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing// rlung sang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling de thams cad du// kun tu yang legs gyur te// gang namado sde 'di yod pa// yul 'khor de ni
khyad par 'phags// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo las/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu bsrung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste banu bzhi pa'o//
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyi ltatsho byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par
gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po 'asogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcudag rgyu gang dang/ rgyan gong dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci'adrab dang/ gang bgyis shing bsags pas skyes bu dam pa
gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas de ltar sum cu rtswa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'ispyod du mchis pa 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' madzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'deme 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bgrang ba las 'dus ba grangasa'amachis pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum 'das pan/ 'gi
rten gyi khams gsar du snang bar bag med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyo nub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas l byen ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
sha/ bcom ldan 'das gsar dang ni po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugasazhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// tsaman bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[“”]la mang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang ni po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs de yongs su mya ngan las 'dasaMnas dam pa'i chos nub ste/ de'i bstan pa yong de thams cad du
nub par gyur ban/ khye'ud dul gyi tog 'ad de bzhin gshogs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas gsar 'dzam bu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od tsos bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// dzitsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas gsar 'dzam bu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de longs su mya ngan las 'dasanas/ 'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub pa'i khor du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od
'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams sbyor zhing/ 'jib rten gyi khamasardul dang bral ba'i rgyalamtshan de nyid du blan med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas makhyan ba dang zhabs su ldan ng// bde bar gshegs// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
thabs skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od gzer gsar du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung
ngo zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bu namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzengod kyi

rgyal bo la sogs ba lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag nadi tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs pocher ya nga 'gyur/ sngon pha rol tuphun pa drug po dag la sdudaskad kyam ganga'/ lag pa dang/
rkang pa dang/ ga dang/ lan lag gi dam pamago dang/ budang/ chung mo dang/ bumo'abangs bo dag sngon yongs su btangoskad kyang 'akheda'/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ 'gron
bu dang/ gsar dang/ ne bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bzhusladang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram dang/ rinapo che rnams sngon longs su/
gtang skad kyang mi gda'/ bzakha dang/ btung ba dang bzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ ma'achadang/ khang khyim dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ kun dga' r ba dang/ rdzong
dang/ steng kudag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ glang po chedang/ ba glang dang/ rta pho rgod dang/ bran po dang/ bran mo sna tshogs sngon khongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'
'di lta ste/ byang chupa sams dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grongs mamachis pa phrag dum de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams las/ khazhin gshegs/

pa'i ming du lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa dumanas/ bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag grangasamamachis pa dum dgazhi
mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong bsam gyis ma khyab pa phrag dum gang/ yo byad thams cad kyisemachod pa bgyid/ yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongs su gtong
lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mge dang/ yan lagag dem pa mgo dang/ budang/ chung ma dang/ bumo 'phangs pa yongasasu gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong/ nor dang/
'bru dang/ 'gron bu dang/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mutig dang/ brtung dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bu ro dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bgyi
brtswa mas kyang yongs su gtong/ 'bra' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ mal chadang/ khang khyim dang/ gzhalatshad khang dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ skyid
mos tshal dang/ rdzing bu dang/ lteng ka dang/ glang po che dang/ ba glang dang/ rta pho rgod dang/ bran po dang/ bran mo sna tshogs yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong zhing/
'am gyis phalol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ rim gyis pha ro' tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs nas/ bde ba brgya stong phrag mang po yang myong bar 'gyuran/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das rgyugang dang/ rkyen gang dang/ dge ba'i rtsol sbyangs pa mu'adra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gozi brjid kyirgyalapo la sogs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag bcom ldan
nasal chos nyan pa'i/da du mchis pa 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bskalapa bye ba khrag khrig brgya songasamad pa duman/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la'i deb

po mthon po'i rgyalamtshan zhes bya ba de nyid du 'ges dang nus gcig pa dang/ mang gtuge/tu mgyos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyang ra 'gyur te//
rab tu dang ba'i zhol ut+pala'i dri brtsigs pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jigerten du 'byung ste/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha losgyur/ dran dpa/ lhadang mi rnams kyi bston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur 'o/ zhes da ltar blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
bstan to/tsa de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gis kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lhaso
kha @#// 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi go ba bod kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag pa tu po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos manyan pa'i phyir/ da lta sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas
[“?]nas 'dir lhags pa de'i de la sbyangs pa long yod de/ 'gro yod/ de'i byed pa yodade/ rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum gyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thosanas/ thos

ma thag tu gsal 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu mi byed kyi ngo dga' bo dang dang pa thob par gyur to// de tsam du bzlumudramemed pa ltar longs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur
tongodAmemad la shani tu rgya zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pa'i sems rab tu dad pa dang ldan bar gyur to// bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur
te 'gos kyi lhamo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag/ de tsam du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'argyal bo 'di thos ma thag tu lhag khor
mi byed pa dang/ 'batu dang 'thob pa 'gyur to// de tsam du bzhuchu du ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'isams dang ldan par gyur to// de'i phyi'ang bstan pa'i sa rjesasu thob bo// rigs kyi
lhamotshesamanyan pa'i dge ba'ico ba bsags pa 'di deng/ sngon gyi smon lam stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyigazi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag/ da ltar
04/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa rjes su thob bo// gas kyi ltemo sngon gyi smon lam de dag gang zhen/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang bo'any+tsil po las/
lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o////rigs kyilhamo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan bskal pa grangs med pargyas pa bsamagyisam khyab pa/ tshad
mod po gyur pa de'atshada'i dusan/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas Mmkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs l/ 'jig rtenamkhyen
pa skye sa bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur kha/ blan med pa/ lhadang mnems kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasaranechen gtsug tor can zhes bya ba'ajig rten du byung ngo// ges
kyi lhamo de'i de'i dus na/ de bzhin bo/shegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rinichin gzhug tor can de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'ichos nub par gyur te/
dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur ban/ rgyal polha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis bya ba/ chos can chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis rgyal skyong// chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ yulakhams
cad nag nas ba'isamasacan rnams kyi bon lta bur gyur ba zhig byung ngo// gos kyi lhamo de'atsho de'i dusan/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi tshul du tshong dpon la lapa'i dzices bya ba/
ku/ sman pa gso ba byed ba/ khams la mchog tum khas pa// tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// kyi rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dusan/

[«]1 tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu tshong dpon gyi bu chu'abebs zhes bya ba gzugs ba phang ba/ mdzis pa/ bstan sdugapa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa tre bstan bcos sna tshogs
la mkhas pa// bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa// yi ge dang/ grus dang/ lag rtsis rnams ngashin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i
san rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug khod de'i yul den/ sems can brgya stong phrag du mnad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing/ nadasna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir to// sdug bsngal mi

bzad pa rtsub pa drag pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar gyur to// rigs kyi lhamo de'i tshe de'i dusan/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de sems can nang sna tshogs kyis brtab pa/ nad sna tshogs

kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi don gyi phyir snying rje chen po khri sams skyes par gyur to// sems can brgya stong phrag du ma ded ni/ nad sna tshogs kyis btabacing/ nad sna tshogs kyis
gzir to// de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub padrag pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi phatshong dpon ral ba 'dzin sman pa gso ba byed pa/ khams la mchog tu mkhas pa tsho'i
[s ]ga byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyudad ldan pa 'di rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs/ lam du zhugs/ na tshod rjes su thob/ 'khar ba la rten cing 'darate/ grongadang/ grong khyer dang/
grong rdal dang/ ltos dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro mi nusan/ sems can nd sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phragadu
ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs shu thar par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song nas/ nad kyi phyir khams la mkhas par bya ba yongs su dus te/ khamasal mkhas
bar bya ba dris pa des/ bdag grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang sems
can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nadasna tshogs kyis gza'i ba brgya stong phrag du ma dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi
bu chu 'babs rang gi pha ral pa'i dzinag la bder song ste phyin nas/ rang gi pha ral ba 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
phyogs gcig tu'adu gnas kyang tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ rang gi pha tshong dbon ral ba 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsi khams la mkhas par bya badris pa/ ji ltar
dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing// khams kyi rnams kyang yongs su 'gyug gong gi dusan lus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dus dang sa
man zas bus ga dzalta bu na bde bar 'gyur// gang gi lus kyi nang du gi/ lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang/ 'dus las gyur dang bad
kan gyur// nad rnams zhi bar bgyi slad du// ngalta buralegaso bar bgyi// gang gis mi la gnod 'gyur ba'i// rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo// gang gi dusan mkhris pa g.yo//
bad kan gang gi dus na g.yog/ de nas tshong dpon ral ba 'dzin gyis tshongadabon gyi du chu'abebs la tshigs subacad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas bar bya ba rnam par bstanatod
bla gsum dabyar te zla gsum ston dus/ gsum ni de gun tagsum ni dpyad yin no// deltar zla ba'i go rims 'di sa dusani drug lagacig lan zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum
gsum dun tshigs rnams bsdus pa'i shes/ zla ba gnyis gtis shin dus su bstan/ sa dang skomanadi ltar 'jug par bgyi// sman pa da na khams rnams dus kyang bstan//
dbang po de na khams rnams de dag kyang/ lo gcig nang tshags tshogs yongs su 'gyur/ dbang po dgan yongs su 'gyur ba'i dus// lus can rnams la sna tshog sand kyang 'byung//
[s]de nyid lan sman pas zla gsum bzhi// tshags kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni// khams drug mkhas bar bya ba shes par bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te// rlungagi
shas che'inangan debyar na ldang// ston du gyur pa na namakhris pa g.yo// dgun gyi dusan de bzhin 'dus ba ste// bad kun shas che'i nang na dpyad ldangang// dbyaran snum dri lan tshu skyur ba'i
ro ston ni dengar dang snum dang bsil bag go/ dgunanadengar dang skyur dang snum pa ste// dpyid kyi dusan nub dratsha ba 'o// bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang// mkhriso ba tsheba'ong ba'i
dusanaldang// rlung shas che ba zhum thag tu ldang// khams gsum g.yo ba de nidi lta bu 'o// rlung gi bodag nyid la ni bcud kyis so// bkru sman gyisanamakhrisapa bsal bar bya/ 'dusal
lan gsum dang mthun ldan pa// bad kan tshigs su baban skyags smanu gtang/ rlung shas ches dang mkhris dang 'dus pa dang// bad kan shas cheb tshigs pa rnams shes bar bya// dus gang khams/
gang lus seng yin pa// de la sman dang bza' btung bstan par bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhag yos su bris pa sa/ tshab rags
byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to// rags kyi lha mo de'i tshe'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang/ grong khyer
0 grubya// dang grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'kher dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du song nas/ sems can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa
nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la kho bo nasmin pa'o// kho bo na smin pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/ kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar
par bya'o nas dbugs phyung ngo// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig de brjod pa thos ma thag tu/ srog chags brgya stong phrag dum de dag thams cad rab tu dga'
slob chen po skyes par gyur to// dbugs phyin pa red nas kyang dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshade'i dus na sems can nad
sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gatha'i ba brgya stong phrag dum de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar te/ nad med par gyur nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang/ stobs dang/
brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzer ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas/ gang su dgand
drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dbon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dongonas phyin pa dang/ sems can nd sna tshogs kyas btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzer ba brgya stong phrag du ma
[8]de dag la/ tshong dpon gyi buchu 'bebs kyis sman dpyad gang bstan ba des/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas so// nad med pa dang/ nad nyung bar gyur/
nas kyang snga mkho bzhin dumathudang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi u'an grong dang/
grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs
kyis ga za'i ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyasind sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar byas par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po/
las nad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdabam po lnga pa sta pha ma'o// rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis sems can thams cad nad med
par byas pas na ba nyung zhing snga mkho bzhin du spro ba dang stobs dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur to// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod
gdong sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/ bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la'ang/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu'abebs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur/
cig/ sman pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyin dagaso ba/ mngon sum du byang chub sems dpar sa pa// tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do/

rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu'adebs de la chung ma chu'i bad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi lha mchu'i pad+mo'i snying po de la khye'u gnyis yod de/ gcig gi mngon chung gis zhes bya/

gcig gi ma ni chu'i snying bo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi buchu'abebs khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul/
'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'grogo rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog dgon pa zhige tu phyin to// de nas 'brog dgon pa der sha za ba'i
khyi deng spyang ki dang/ wa dang/ khA dang/ bya dag gangan dgon pan rdzong zhig yod pa der rgyug bar mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ rtsi'iphyirasha za ba'i khyi dang spyang ki nas/ bya'i bar

'di dag phyogs 'di'i rgyug snyam go/ de'ang 'di snyam du soms te/ bdag khyi dang/ spyang kidang/ wa dang/ khA dang/ bya rnams phyogs gang du rgyug pa'i phyogasader 'gro bar byasnyam mo// rigs kyi lhamo'i

[ro]nas tshong dpon gyi buchu 'bebasa mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ste/ dgono bzhi dzing zhig yod pa de ga la bden na to// jing chen po dan nya khri zhig gnas te/des ded nya brgya phrag mang po zhigachu dang bral ba

mthebs/de de la snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pa dang/ den ltamozhig shing la lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthang ste/ lha mo satshong dpon gyi buchu 'babs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//

gang gi phyir chub bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis 'bod rnams la chubyin cage/ rnam pa gnyis kyiphyire chu 'babs zhes bya ste// gang du'abebs pa dang/ gang musbyin pa'o// de bas na rang gim dang mthun pa'i bya bakhyosashige chu 'bab/

kyis slar smras ba/ lhamo nya 'di dag la ji snyid cig mchis/ lhamos smras pa/ nya khri them pago/ rigs kyi lha mo danas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'babs cher mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes so// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe dgon pa/

na yod pa'i rdzong chen bon chu'i lha la cung zad tsam zhig lus te/ de nas nya khri 'chiba'i sgor zhugs ngo/ chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyug go/ shis kyi lha mo des tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu'athibs kyis phyogs

bzhi'i brgyugs pa dang/ 1 khri po dag tshong dpon gyi khye 'u tshul babs phyogs gang du'agroba'i phyogs de logs suchu'adebs snying rje rjeltar blta'o// rigs kyi lha mo danas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs
bzhir brgyugs tachub tsal kyang chu ma red nas/ phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang/ sa ha cang thog mi ring ba gan shing ljon pachen po ma zhig mthong nas/ shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te shing gi
g.yal ga rnams bcad nas// shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te rdzong chen bo ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ shing gi yal ga de dag rnams kyis ta khri po de dag la shin tu
bsal ba'i grubs byas so// rigs kyi lha mo dran s tshong dpon gyi khyabu tshu 'debs rdzong dar chu 'bab pa 'tsholate/ gang nas chu 'bab cas de phyogs bzhir brgyugs kyang zhum red nas/ de gyur

y+Yo ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi rjes su song sta/ rigs kyi lha mo dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing der chu 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i klung chen bo dolas/ der tshu 'bab pa'i klung de yong de'i tshe sdig pa can zhig gis 'khri/

pa po do dag gi phyir/ ci nas kyang phyis tade dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi g.yang sa chen por klungad phab bo// de nas de mthong nas bsams pa/ klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang
srol de nyid du dbab par mi nusan/ bdag gis lta dbab par ga lanus snyam nas de'i phyi 'bag go/ gos kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye bu chu 'bebs ris pa ris par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug
bod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bas mtshodad phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyus nas smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chab 'og tu grong dang/
grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang ba khor thams cad du sems can rnams kyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkuman/ gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bden
ca 7 dgon pan yodapa zhes bgyi ba'i rdzong zhig mchis pa len nya khri zhig gnas pa de chab dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis te/ jiltar mi rnams la stsal ba ltar can s dud 'gro'i skyo gnas/
su gyur pa de dag la yang srog stsal bar 'tshalan/ lhas glang po che nyashu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal pochen po la glang po chanyi shu zhig byin
cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can chen po glang po tsho'i lhas ga la bar sodal/ glang po che shu khrid de sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang

bde ba gyis shig/ ragis kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rang gi buchu'i gegs dang/ chu'i snying po dang lhan ci tu glang bo che nyi shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i jo bo las baglang gi rgyal pa/
brgya blangs te/ slar log nas chu bab ba ces bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song sta/ rkyal ba de dag chus bkang nas glang bo che'i rgyab tu chub kal te/ myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod/

pa'i rdzong ga la ba der song nas phyin ng dang/ chu de glang po che'i stong nas phab sta/ phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs phyogs gang

dang gad du 'gro ba de legs su nya khri bo dag kyang rgyug go/ de nas 'gos kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu'adebs 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyire nya khri po 'di dag bdag ga la ba de logs su rgyugasnyam
mo de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 1 khri po 'di dag na bkres pa'i mis yongs su nyananas bdag la bza' ba slong du res kyis/ bdag gis ba zas sbyin par bya'o
[“”]snyam nas/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis// rang gi bu chugs la 'di skad ces smras so// bu glang bo che thams cad kyin na mgyogs pa ba mchog la zhen te/ bdag
zla cag gi khyim du song la myur ba myur bar song ste mes po tshong dbon la/ kye mas bo tshul debs kyi mched nas/ khyim 'din pha ma dad/ spun dang/ sring mo dang bran po dang/ ban
modang/ las bgyid ba rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba gang tsa mchasi ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gso glang po tshal zhan pa'i lag tu myur du rdzogs shig ces mchi'o zhes de skad gyis
shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang bo che de la zhen nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing brgyugs te/ rang gi khyim ga la bder song nas phyin pa dang de dag gis rgyus kyis zhib tu smras te/ de
! nas khye'u chung gis kyis sngar smos pa'i zas sbyar ba de dag thams cad glang bo tsho'i rgyab tu bkal nas glang botshade la zhen te/ dgon pan yod pa'i rdzong ga la ba der song nas/ chu 'babs kyis
rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas dga' mgu sto/ bu las zas blangs nas phul te dzangader gtor nas/ 'a khri po de dag tshim par byas te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na
ba ba dgon pa'i gnas shigan/ dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las su 'chi ba'i dus kyitshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du
skya'o zhes thos kyis/ bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
chon gtsug tor can de'i mtshan yang bsgrags par bya'osnyam mo// de'i tshon 'dzam bu'i gling de na sems can rnams kyi lta ba gnyis su 'gyurato/ kha cig na theg pa chen po la mngon par dad do//
kha cig ni smod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ de'i tsho sde de der rkang pa gnyis ka'i pus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ces ched du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chiba'i dus kyi tsho/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phosanas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par
skyo bar gyur cig ces smon lam do skad btab bo// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod
u// ba'i phyir 'di 'byung/ 'di skyes pas 'di skyo ba sta/ 'di ltar ma 'gi ba'arkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyikyin s rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes
pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skya mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa// rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa// sred pa'i
rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don bdang/ sdug bsngayo ba dang/ yid mi
bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag

bar 'gyur ba nas/ de lta sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di'i bab zhag kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dusan/ tshong dpon gyi khyi'u chu 'babla
kyis dud 'gro'i gnas su gyur pa de dag la ches dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brdzon gnas / rang gi bu chu'i gos dang/ chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang ga khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o/
denas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas tshang gis ro sta malan nyal ba dang/ de'i tshade'i dusan ltas chen po byung bar gyur te/ mtshan mod 'das pa
na nya/phub de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thal gtude dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag
cag dgu ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyam mo// de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling na nya khrir gyur te/ bdag cag du
'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa las/ tshong dpon gyi khyabu chu 'bebs kyis chumang po dang kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/ bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i tshos kyang bstan/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nichen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pas/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang rkyen des bdag cagalha rnams kun ng
'dir skyes kyis// bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu lu po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang
nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi buchu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/ de'i tshatshong dbon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la/ lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi sa mo de
khrin mgo'i thad kar bzhag/ mu tig gi sa mod khrani rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ mutig gis mo de khrani ge yas 'gas su bzhag/ mu tig gi sa mo de khrin g.yon lags su bzhag sta/ pus
mo nub tsam du ma tog mnadar ba'ichar chen bo yang phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas// sa 'dzam bu'i gling ba thams cad kyang sad/ tshong dpon gyi
khye'u chu 'bebs kyang sad do// de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag kyang nam mkha' la dong ste/ lha'i bu de dag rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang/ gnas gzhan du yang me tog mnad
ra ba'i char 'bebs shing/ dgon pan yod pa'i rdzing chen pog la ba der dong nas/ de dag gis rdzong chen po dar me tog mnadar ba'i char chen po phab ste/ de nyade du ma snang bar gyur nas/ slar
yang lha'i gnas su dong sta/ dan 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bo dag gso dang 'a zhing rtse sta/ dgab dgur spyodacing dpal dang skal ba bzang bo chen po dag kyang myong ngo// 'dzam bu'i glingang nam
langs ba dang/ de nas rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis/ skur mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams la smras pa// ci'i phyi'i mdang sum ltas 'di dag byung/ dedug gis smras pa// lhamkhyen par

mdzad du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gi sa mo dbazhi khri'i cher bab cade/ lha'i ma tog man da ra ba'i char yang bab bo zhes byas pa dang/ khyod deng la tshong dpon gyi bu

chu 'bebs la snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig/ de nas skar mkhan dang blon bo tshan bo rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas// tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu'abebs la 'di skad ces smras so//

rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od 'di khyod la 'bod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ba dang/ rgyal pos/
smras kha/ bu chu 'babs mdang sum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung bde ci ltas shes sam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu'abobs kyis/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od l 'di skad ces smras so//
lte bdag gis 'tshal te/ nya khra po de dag 'chi ba'i dus bgyis par nges so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'babs kyis smras pa// lhatshu'i gos ji der nya khri po de dag gum/
mam ma gum bltar stsal to// rgyal posasmras ng/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khya'u tshu 'babs kyis/ khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so// bu song la dgon pa/

yod pa'i rdzing bu'i nyakhri bo de dag shi 'am shi ltasashig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar dagon pa na yod pa'i rno nge chen bog la ba der song ba dang/ nya khri po de dgashi ba'idus su gyur cing
ma togamanadar ba'i char chen po bab pa yang mthong nas/ slar log ste pha la smras pa// 'chi ba'i dus su gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos las tshagad shes pa/
dang/ rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas/ de dag rgyus nas zhib tusmras te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ nyakhri pa de dag thams cad ne shi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum
du rtsa gsum kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ dedag dang bdag gi mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung sta/ bdag gi khyim du yang mu tig gi i mo de bzhi
[“” ]khri dang lta'am tog man da ra ba'i char yang bab bo// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu ste ya ring bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub
yang dag bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lta mod tshoda'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sogasan/ de de ltar mi blta'o/

daci'i phyi'i zhen/ shAkya lagan be con can de'atshida'adusan rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tsho'i dusanatshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig

yin snyam du khyed sems na/ de de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyibazhin/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tsho'i dus na tshong dpon ralapa 'dzan ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi khyecachu 'bebs

zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du byed sams na/ de de ltar ma blta'o// deci'i phyir zhen/ nga de'i tshe de'i dusun tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'babasazhes bya bar gyur to// gis kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na

chung ma chub pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gyur ba de gzhan zhig yane snyam du khyedasamasan/ dade ltar mi ngalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshodo'idusunatshong dbon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs
xxx

de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khri gyur pa de dag gzhan zhage yisnyam du khyod somasaMn/ de de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'bar ba'i khyad bar gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i
tshade'i dusan takhris gyur te/ gangadag sa chudang zas kyi mchog gso tsham par byas shang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i tshos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i ses rgyas rin chen la gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyus pa'i gan du 'dir lhags te/ des na da ltar glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
bstan to// rab tudag 'a ba dang/ rab tu dang ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ gus par tshos mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par gyur to// gas kyi lha mo de'i tshade'i

dus na shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam dukhyod sems na/ de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo rnam
grangs 'dis na 'khor ba na 'khor ba'itsho/ sa ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i
sa thob par gyur pa 'a 'gig par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po las/ chu 'bebs kyis nya btulab sngon byung ba'i bu zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun
[«]gas kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' ni ba gzhan la phan pa'i phyir lus yongs su gtong ngo// de ji lta zhen/ drim med cing shin turgyas pa'i yon
tana rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od gzeras dang lha yul rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang/ stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das dge slong gis yongs su bskor

[W ]yul lnga lenagyi ljongs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas nags tshogs shig tu byon bdang/ der des rdo zhing 'jam la mthang kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos ma tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu
rgyu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs shig gzigs so// gzagesanas kyang bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bos phyogs 'din mdzes pa ste/ bon
gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis/ dade bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan thing zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan bting ngo// gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
la 'dices gsol to// gdan bting/ gsan bcom ldan gtso bo mchog/ ma la mchog stsol dam pa srid btsanges grol// bzhugs te mal smanaslad mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mchid
dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs te/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa
rnams blta bar 'dododam/ daskad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dasal/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying bo pa//
ba bod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing// blo gros dran dag ba yon tan dang ga med gnas gyur gyi// rus pa bdag cag blta ba'adus lags de legs shod/ nas
bcom ldan 'das phyag gi mthil 'khor la rtsa nges stong mo can dang/ ma tog ka ma lab gsar du kha phye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ngos la brdabs te bsnun ma thag tus rnam pa drug tu
g.yos te/ nor bu dang/ gsar dang/ dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig nga nas byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo mchon rten 'di phya zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas mchod rten phyi ba dang/ dogade ltar gsar gyi 'phra can gyi nor budang mu tig gis
babs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog cig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog dgacig mchis so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad bya zhig/ de bzhin du thams cad phye ba dang/ des der rus pa'i kha dog ma tog ku mud dang 'dra
bdag cig mthong// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag cig gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo
[” ]skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer shog/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bas rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa
rnams ba sna mas te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du bzhag nas bka' stsal ba/ rus ba 'di dag yon tan mchogarab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod par spro ba grags
ba dam pa mchog/ phyir zhing byang chub 'di la rtag tu blo gros ldan byas shing// spro brtan mos dang blo gros rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba'i yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi yongs su bsgos pa/ mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du
gyur pa rnams la phyag tshol zhig/ de nas dag slong de dag gas thal mo sbyar te 'dun pa'i yid kyis nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas thal
[4 ]mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pan 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa// sems can thams/
cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/ jiltar de bzhin gshags pa nyid nus pa 'di dag 'a phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal te/ kun dga' bo nus pa 'di dag gas nga bde ltar myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo
sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ rgyal bongashing rta chen gzhis bya ba bzhen pa dang stabs dum dang ldan pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ da la
bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de/ sgra chen po dang lha chen bo dang/ sems can chen po'o// de nas rgyal bo rtsa ba'i phyir skyed mos tshalagyosar byung ba dang/
gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing m rtog 'dod pa sa phan tshun rgyu ste/ nags stug po chen po bcu gnyasisu zhugs so// danas rgyal po'i bu dge dong ba dang
gzhonanu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bsladanas phan tshun dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyadamos tshal chen po'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen ngos/
gnu bo gnyis la smras pa// kho bogi di 'jigs pas donan/ 'di bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog lha chen pos smras
pa/ bdag la 'jigs pani ma mchis na/ skya bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i stod du gyur to// sems can chen pos smras pa// thub pas bsngags pa'i nags
khrod dben pa 'di// bdag ni mi 'jigs mya nam mchasikyi// shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam sta// bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de
la dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyuban/ stag mo bu phyung nas zhag bdun len pa zhig tu lngas bskor te bkrigang shengoskom pas nyam smad nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar
gyur ba de 'dra zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam bdun zhig len par gyur la/ da ltar bsam red pas yang na ni rang gi
! bul za bar 'gyur/ yang nani bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// sems can tshan ngos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i thos ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'di ltar gdan
sar pa dang khragadron mo yod na/ de ni stag dang/ dom dang/ drodadang/ sangag rnams kyi bras yin no zhes zer ro// lha chen pos smras pa// 'do'i nyen mengasam 'di bkres pa dang skom
[6 ]bdang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/ rab tunyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'di zas skom 'tsholan minus na/ 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi 'ag/
yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgrachen pos smras pa/ kyirang gi lus yongs su gtong ban bya dka' ba'o// sems can chen pos smras la/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par
chags pa/ blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya deka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa// gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams lan dka' ba ma
lags so// yang snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rad snyam ste/ gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dga' ba'i yid kyisan// 'gyur ba mang
par 'are ni rnam pa brgya yis brtsa// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nud shin tu mi dga' sta/ stag mo de la mig mi 'dzum par dang zhibe tu bltas nas songang// de nas sems can chen po 'di snyam du
sams te/ ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su ga ta ba'i dus la bab bo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jig cing bgyis pa'i chos can mthar byed mtha' ngan pa/ rnagacan lus 'di zas dang skom dang
mal cha dang/ bzhon nga 'os pa chen po dag gis rang bas kyang// snga med rang gi rang bzhin ma 'dor byas don med// yang thams cad du mi bgatsang bar gyur pas na de'i 'tsho ba med kyis//
bdag gis de las bzang po la sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyi bdag skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro// yang 4 snying bo med lus dbu
ba 'dra' srin bu brgyas gang byas bachud gsonapa// 'bras 'dra'i sridi pa brgya ldan gcin dang spyases gang ba 'di btang ste// mya ngan med cing 'gyur med thung mad driyod bsam gtan la sogs
yon tan gyis// kun tu gangaba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba theb par bya// de ltar snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brtul nas khyedaganyis gshegs su gsol/
bdag ni rang gis bgyi bzhag gi slad du nags stug po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste stag gi gnas
su song nas/ nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de// gzhan gyis gtong bar dka' pa'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur
ba med ba'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub rim med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtshorab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten
gsum po bsgrol bar bya// zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal kha dang/ de nas byams ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dapa' la stag mos
ci yang ma byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kyi ma phyogs 'din nyem chung bas mi nus so snyam nas las te// snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsalan gang nas kyang mtshon chamared/
nas de 'od ma'i yal ga brgya len pa sra ba zhig blangs te// bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyelal// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tuchu'i dbus su son
pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin dus 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang phyi ma dang 'dres
pa'i ma tog gi char yang bab bo// de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can
rnams khyab ste// mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di btang bsan// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba gnas kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyed kyis 'dir na
tshigs med ring por mi thogasared// de nas stag mod byang chub sems pa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bltas nas/ ud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig las par byas
