go/ de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de bsamanas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tugayos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni
med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs bsan// dag zad bdag gi nu bos rang gi'usan btang yang dag/ lha chen pos smras pa/
jiltar snying rje'i tshig smras la// bkras dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyus gtses pa/ shin tu nyamachungarang gi bu la yang// za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs// de nas
ts+tsu rgyal bu gzhonanu de gnyis rab tumya ngan gyis non nas/ mchims mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar lag nas stag mo' dung du phyin pa dang/ gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la
pa gzar rus pa rnams ni bya zhing bral/ khragan rdzob tu gyur/ skran phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor bar mthong ngo// mthong nas brgyal te rus pa'i stong du 'gyel nas rang
zhig len pa dang/ 'dushes red de lasanas lag pa bsgring sta nyam thag pa'i sgra byung ngo// kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang// de bzhin du na bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma/ pad+ma
'dra ba'i mog ring khyed kyis garab zhag ces// man bdag cag la yang bachung 'dri bar 'gyur/ kye ma bdag cagagasen sa phyogs 'di nyid du// shen legs kyis gsonan de ltam yin no// soms

can chen bo mdas bdag cagal// pham dag gis ji ltar lta ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis kyis snying rje dzeskad du rnam pa mang ngos nas dang go/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gong mas

kyang gzhon nu 'tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang/ gcig gis gcig mthong nas gzhon nu ga gzhon nu gde yi ri'o po'i tsho btsun momal na nyal ba'i rmi laman/ sdug pa dang bralab rmis pa 'di lta ste/ num gnyis

bcad pa dang/ so phyung ba dang/ bri ba'i phrug ga skrag pa gsum zhig redapalas gcig khras khyer ba mthong ngo// zhag btsun mos g.yos bsasnying dngasate/ mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung bo'i rinam mtsho'i

gosazhana' ni kun tu rab g.yo zhig gu/ timo 'od zer med par gyur pas nag yi snying 'amya ngan 'gyur bar ston// nga yisan zhum zhing mig kyang ba/yolarang gi num bcang rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dini rtsi'i dong

ba la dgu bar 'gyur ram ge/ de nas do snyam bsams pa dang/ bran mo yang snying myos te 'ongasanas btsun mo la smras pa/ dzom gzhon nu'i dmagropa dang gzhonub mi grob dag gzhon nu 'tshol zhing mchasin/ do soskyo

ces gda' 'o// de skadatses thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing yig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gis bu sdug bstar tshes thos so// rgyal po yang snying 'dar shing ni tu

myos te kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral blta zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir ngagazhanonubatsalabanan tan du byed kyis/ bzong momya namabyed cig/ deragazhananu'atshol ba la zhugs ngan/

skya bo'i tshigs dag red red bor gyur to// de nas de bom len pa de rgyal posargyal bu gzhonanuganyis rgyang ring po nas 'od ba mthong ngo// mthongosakyang smras r/gzhon nu gni 'ongan thams cad nam yin te/ kyicud budang bral ba
zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral ba gyur na la de ni mi'i dag/ rnams bu med nganadi ltar dga' bas yanen// 'jigarten nani gang dag bu med pa dngashi ba 'am// mi rnams gang/

dag gsod de dag bde pa yin nam/ de nas btsunamoshin tumya ngan gyis non nas// dramogand du bsnunang bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'isgra phyung ngo/ de ltar bu dgu gsum n g.yog gi tshog sakhacas te/ ma tog rnams kyis

gangaba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag ga bu ge thachung 'os bdamagyuran// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chung dgar// des de gnyis lhags pa dang/ rgyal pos bu la dris ba/ khye'u thachudagar nas/ gzhon nuganyis

laepa dang/ de nas myurngan gyis nyamathag mi mig mchi mas gang sta/ dkan dang/ mchu dang/ khadA/ so paskamasanas cang mi 'da'o// btsun mos smras pa// khomob bu sdug tha chung dag ri// kho mo'i stobu'adi gas la thug gyur cing//

lus nam bzang rab tug phrar gyur te// kho mo'i drin ba nyam 'gyur myur du smos// de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tusmras so// de thes ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo myos par gyur te myos pa sas nas snying

ji ji skad du du zhing phyogs der dong sta/ donas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang/ khrag dang/ rgyus pa med cing/ sku phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong anas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel

lo denas nyon dang blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ tshudang pa la ya'i tsanadan gyilde gus rgya'abod btsun mo'i lus bsal bar byas so// de nas ring zhig len pa dang/ 'dushes rad nas rgyal po

langs te snying rje rje skad du 'bodapa kyi ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag da ba du ni phyir myur du song// 'chi bdag cu phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs// nga lasdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung/ btsun mo a

myos ba las sangs nas skya nag nang lagapaganyis kyis brang brdus te/ nya thabal khyu khabazhin sa'i ston 'gre ldog cing mahobe'u skor ba dang/ rngamo rje'u skor ba bzhin du snying rjedzeskadadu ngu'o// kye ma sdugaming

gces ba'i bu pho pad+ma'adi// su yis sa yi steng dushig nas rab tugator// yid 'ong mgi ldan zla 'dra'i banIn can bdagag bu// bdag gi dgu bo gang gsedir dus 'dir bcom// kyems 'dzarebu mchog bsada mthong
na lus 'di phyir de ring zhige ma gyur// sdugabasngal 'di 'dra mthong yang m gas pas// bdag ga ste 'di lcagasan yin yang dag/ de ring mi'amadun bdag ginum 'ga' zhig gnorel gyis bcad// lo yang phyung

bsadi ring bdag gi ba sdug de myur dum rungs gyur// bdag gis thob phrug gu gsug tshul med pa gcig 'di'i ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag ni bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig nadi ring 'chi bdag khyer// kyi

ma'o sngagi bcan gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa yin no/ de nas rgyal podang btsun mo sA+e rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smra 'di rgyan thams cad bkol nas skye bo'i tshog sachen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i nus pa lamachod pa

byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go/ kun ga' bo de de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhan nu sems can che napo zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod seman/ de doltar mibalta'o// de ci'i
phyir zhen/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu ba gzhon nu sems can chen bo zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dag bgo 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug las mos su mgrol bde'i
yang sams nadmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las sa 'grub bon la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nga ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sem

[@]1 can ' pa'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams subaskal par gnas aba'aspro zhing/ skya ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par bsgral la// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa snatshogs du mas 'gro bamatha' dag la ngan
btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'ad/gsus so/ byang chub mchog 'di yongs su 'tshol ba na// bskal bam por ngasan lusu btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po dang ni

rgyal bu gyur/ de ltar ngs ni lus rnams yongs su btang// sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes dran ta// shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po khyung// de la bun ge/tong ba ldan pa// sems can chezhes bya ba dam pa yod// de la

bu pho dag na gnyis yodad/ mang na sgrachen po dang lhachen po// spyanatshogs de dag nags tshal stug por dang// de dag stag mo bkres pos gabar ba mthong// de la sems can mchog 'di snying rje skyes// stagamo 'di'i

bkres skom gaba'i bsan// stag phrugade dag khrab r 'gyur 'ong gis// de ltar bdag lus dag ni gtang bar bya// shing rta che bu sems can ches// stag mo bkris mthong stag phrug rnams// thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis//

00 ris gza nas mchongs pa dang// sa na ri dang bcas su g.yos/ bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'tho'o// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di// mun pas 'thibs bor gnas par gyur// de yi bu pho sgra chen dang//
de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags mchog chen po dar bltas na// sems can chen po ma redanas// shin tumya na zug rngu'i snying// dran m nags kyi nang na rgyu// nu bo don yongs 'tshol zhing
gdong la mchibaganags khrodargyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis// stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba// der na nye bar song ba dang// stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag
gi mchu la khrag chags mthong// skradang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong// de yi khrag gi thigs pan// nyung zhags la yod/'gyur// rgyal po'i buned gnyis kyis//
khrag chags pa yis de mthong// reb tu brgyal te sa del// 'gyel nas yid na nyams par gyur/ lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gas// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag
gi ni 'khor rnams kyang// snying rjer du zhing mya ngananen// de dgachus nib 'thor zhing// lag pa bsgring ste du zhing gnas// denA'agyel ma thag tu yang// btsun mo gtses mchog
skyod pa'i ma/ bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang// pho branangan bde 'dug pa/ nusor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// khom khrag tu 'byungazhinga'adzag/ dayalus dang yan lag kun/
khab kyis pa/tsags pa bzhin du tsha/ snying rje rab tu mya nganagang// bubral mya ngan dragamadas phog/ rgyal po'igan du nyer song ste// mya ngan ba gdung yid mi
dga'/ 1 snying rje'i sgra yis ba du zhing// rgyal po shing rtache la smras// mi dbang rgyal bo bdag la gson// bdag lus mya nganame yis 'tshig khag ginusoraphu gnyis
spyi nas ta'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung// bdag lus kha kyis ga tsags bzhinatsha// bdag gi snying yang gsal thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams// phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i/
[+ ]ltasadapodag gi bu rnams de lta'i 'tshal// thugs rjesamadzod de bdugasregasol/ de ring bdag gi rmi laman// thob phrug gu gsum redan// bdag gi blob phrug gu ni// sdug cing yid
'ong gang lags pa// der ni khramachis badrag gini// thib phrug gu de khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra yis// mya n gnas nyinga'adir rab tu zhugs// sems zhim ngan bgadung bar//
bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'bum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje ldan pas bdag srog stsol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyalanas sader 'gyel bar gyur///
dran nga 'i dbang po rnam par nyams sems kyang stor zhing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang// snying rje'i skad kyis rab tung// btsun ma dam pa brgyal gyur to//

[s ]sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/ de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de// bu dang bral ba'i chunganadon// blonabo dang ni 'khor rnams kyang// gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dang// grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag/
tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod/ ngu zhing gdong nas mchil zag/ lam kar snying stobs cheda'adri gson nam 'on te shi'amanaM/ sems can chen bo de gar song// bdagacagadi ring nang
zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dgag/ de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing// yul 'di'i chungan ma khaphrad myong// sgra ma phyin cing sbyamatha' yas// drag po'isgrar bcas ljang nag gam
rgyal po shing rta che langs te// myang n non cing dubazhin du// btsun mdam bsar 'gyal la// bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'ther// ji sridadron redaldan 'gyur ba// de srid du ni chu yis gtor//
bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyisaM'adrib ra byed// rgyal po shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang// gzhon nu
rnams nA'itshol phyir dang// khyod ni reb tu yid zhumazhing// rtag tumya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo dmapa u0f97bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas//
myan nyen cing ngu bzhin du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid ni rab zhumalus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang bo yang// duzhing mchog zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu
[h]@#/ rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung// rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni/ rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'abrang// rgyal po shing rta chen po/ gre ba khyer
[”]nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i bun blta ba'i phyir// rgodapa'ig gis phyogs su bltas// mgo khrig yanalag khrag sbags shing// lus l rdul gyis gos gyural// gdong la mchi brag du bzhin/
du/ 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang// rab tu mi bzad mya ngan gnas// ngu zhingagadong lamachim khrags// lag ba bsgang sta du zhing 'dug/ de nas brenapo gzhan
zhig gis// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs// 'ongasanasam dbang rgyal poni// shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang shugasangan ma mdzad cig/ khyodosras yid du 'ong ba mchis// ring por mi
thogs khyod kyi gna'adr-ini// sras mchog yid 'ong 'chib khyod kyis gakhrigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang/ de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// 'chags dri ma can gyi gos
[0f7c ]na cing// mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyed kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan mi yis rab tugadungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyed kyi srasamatshegagacig mi gda'//
sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyisazin// stagamobubyung ring poram len pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong// de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ces// snying rje chen po ldan pas sems

chan par ngos gzar nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas naon ba de las te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la shamid byas// rgyal po'i buni rus pa nyitshe lus// marus payi tshiganadi thes nas/
rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nasasams kyang stor bar gyur// myang n mnishin tu mi bzad 'bar// 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyisani// nguzhing mya ngananon
bzhin de dag kyang// chus 'thor lag pabasgreng ste rab tu ngu// blon po gsum pas rgyalalasnasapani// bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag/ nags chen den rab tu brgyal gyur cing//
sa la 'gyel te sams kyang stor mong nas// dran pa red de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyisachab kyis rab tu gter// phyogs bzhi dgan kun nas 'bar ba mthong// yud tsam 'greng
skoslar yangs la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smrasngagasarab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa bsgring ste gnas nas nii// nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod/ rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhumazhing//
bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mu ngan rab tu gdung zhing sna sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongasasu sems// bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig pu ni// sems
can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis khrin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang// mya ngan meyis srogani thad 'ong gis// 'di ltar bdag ni myur du der song la// mthong na dga'/
ba'i bu dag blta bar byas// bzhon pa mgyogs pa rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab myur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams skyed pa'i ma yisnying// chungan mi yis gas par 'gyur du 'ang//
rgyabu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob 'gyur te// srog dang bral bar gyur pam yin ne/ rgyal po blon po'i tshigs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhen te bu rnams blta phyir song// bu gnyis snying
rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing// chu bo'i ming 'bod lamanas 'ong ba mthong// rgyal pos bu de gnyis n khrod nus su// rab tung zhung khyim du song nas ni// de yis skyon pa rol ger myur du yang// btsun
mol ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga// sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yo// bu ste sems can chen pi mchog gyur cing// gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa
yu yin/ rgyal po 'dibang pa'i dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo 'ang datsuname dam pasgyu mar gyur// sgra chen po nikhyams par gyur payin/ rgyulagu
lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur ba skyadagu'i bdag mo che// stag phrug rnams ni dge slong lta bor gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang//
bas btsunamos snying rje bar sne sngagasa rnam bang po sten nas/ rgyan thams cad bkrolate/ skya bo'atshigs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nasasems can chen po'i rus pa 'di dag
sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhegaste/ nipache sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'dibyas so// sems can chen po 'dis stagamo la lus yongs su btang nas// lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyis ma
'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grang ba las shun tu 'dus pa rnams su yang/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdupa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btabab// bstan pa 'di
bshad pan lhadang mi bcas pa'iskye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bran mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rtan 'di 'dir bstan pa'i
rgyun 'di yon no// rkyen ni 'di yon no// mchod rten de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/stag
mal lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes byabaste bco brgyud pa'i////de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gsur dang rin
bo che'i 'byunga gnas gdugs btsugs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsar dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang/ byang chub sems dapa' brgya stong phrag du mde dag gis
lamasbyar te/ de bzhinagshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso
ma'i gsol 'dra ste// sku lus gsar gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'/ gser gyi ri dbang lta bu gsar gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar pa gsaramadog can// bzang po'i
mtshan gyis skulus rab tubargyano// dpe byad snatshogs bzang pos sku lus spras// gsaragyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra/
tshas pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangasaba'adabyangs// seng ga'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrogs pa'i dbyas// yan lagadugacu bsgrags sgra dri med sgra// rgyal du dus rma byaka la bing
ka'i sgra de shin tu dri mdadribral gzi 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis brgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med du brel mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan
kun ldan ri rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse mchog/ 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal bdamapa'i don rnams ston pa ste// myang n
'das pa'i be de la 'dzud bu lags/ 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba sol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chi bamed pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde
ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i mchog/ rgyal ba 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar par madu// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skyo dgu sgrol/// zhi ba'i lamal sku dgu rab tu 'dzud/ skye dgu
rnams la bdo ba kun stsol ba// khyod la dang ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i yon tan ye shes mtsha// srog chags kun la khyod kyis thugs rje dang// byams pa'i
stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang// khyed kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye bstong phrag mang por yang// yon tan thig pa gcig tsam rab bstanapar/
lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang du nus ma mchis// yon tana'atsholas yon tan thigasablangs te// da ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag gi bsod nams gang
bsags de yis sems can de dag kyang chub mchog rog shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
bstod pa'o'i 'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lu ngasal btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad
ba 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'dasal mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya yis mtshan// dang la stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan//
kha dogargya chen mchog zhi bra ston// nyi mastong ltar 'dun rnam bar 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas bod kyis khyab// kha dogasna tshogs dang bas rinachen 'dra//
sngon pa dkar po gsar dang bdun// zangs dang skya rengs shelagyi 'od lta bu s// rdo rje ri dbanga'i reb thal mdzad cing// zhing rnams bye bdu mar snang mdzad de//
sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad// bad ba mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdeg dang dbang po sal bkabalta na mdzes// gzugasabaltasami
ngomasaskye bo bstan dga'// rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang po gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis
brgyan// ting 'dzin khyoms pa bsod nams dam pa bsags// dbo byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lagayon tan brgyan/
khyed ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad// bde mdzadu bdu ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung// yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// zhing rnams
bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste// sa yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar nam mkhar nyidakyil rdzogs pa bzhin// ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par///
'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'// ban ku mu da dung zla 'drazhing// kha ba'i mdog dang dkar bo 'brang 'dra 'a// tshims kyi 'phrod bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes
pa ngang pa'i rgyal pos bar snang ji pe zhan no// khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams gnas zla ba 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil cing khong chud 'dra ba lags// bzhum 'dra spu 'od
dkar rnams kyis// nam mkha'i dkyilan nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod
bca'e 'u zhes bya ba stanyishu pa'o////de nas rigs kyilha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ nga'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa// ma par dag pa'i tshes la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid bloma' zhing// srid dang srid
min mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blomada' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// kyama'i kuga'os su rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te/
kyama'o [”]ma'i rgya mtsho dang ni ri'i ba 'dra// kye ma'o kyi ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yulamatha' yas te// u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// samasacan dag
ni thams cad rjes su bzung slad du// gang gi mdo sde dam pa 'di 'drarab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po rags kyi go/ kyema'o kyi ma'o de btar gshegs/
pa thugs rje ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab du zhugs// ting 'dzin zab cing rdul dang bral ba'i//
rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lusu ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'i ng stong pa lags//
chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong 'gas na// sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'dzul te// rtag par khor zug tu/rgyal ba dran par bgyid//
rgyal ba ma mthong bar ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyid slad du// rtag par yapar smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid//
0 bdag ni rtag tu dogasar pus mo btsugs nas su// rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skam pas rab tu mya ngan sarasu// 'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis du ba bgyid//
bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong ba rab tu skom// mya ngan ma yis ku na bar ba'a'agyur// mthong ba'i chu bsal bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag ni
khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu sgom thugs rje'icha ra gyis bdag la rab tu sim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag 'a thugs rdzo mdzad du gsol// ni
ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod na lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba skyob pa ste// 'diltar nyan thos snums kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems
can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te// nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang 'gas// sgyu ma smig rgyudang ni chu la zla ba 'dra// 'dren pa
khyod ni stong pa che dang ldan pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la sa bzhengs te/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi
lha mo khyod legs so// khyod yang legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa/
dang/ lhamo chen modabyangs can la sogasab lhayo de dag thams cad dang/ lha mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang/
rnam shes kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dug dang/ lhadang/ mdeng/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
zla/ rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'argyal po las/ mjug bsdus
ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pago/
'phags pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa
chen po'i mad rdzogs so//
